There is a lot more randomness there and things happen which you cannot predict, which cause people to sell or buy a lot of stock.
motivation.author: Claude Shannon

motivation.quote: A lot of people look at the stock price, when they should be looking at the basic company and its earnings.
motivation.author: Claude Shannon

motivation.quote: I make my money on the stock market. I don’t make it by proving theorems.
motivation.author: Claude Shannon

motivation.quote: I even did some work on the theory of stocks and the stock market, which is among other papers that I have not published. Everybody wants to know what’s in them!
motivation.author: Claude Shannon

motivation.quote: And I juggle myself as a pastime. No great expert at it or anything. I found the dynamics and kinematics of it, if you like, the conditions and control change with gravity or change with your speed of response with one thing or another were kind of interesting.
motivation.author: Claude Shannon

motivation.quote: Jugglers are surely the most vulnerable of all entertainers.
motivation.author: Claude Shannon

motivation.quote: It all started when Betty brought home a little four-inch clown, doing a five ball shower, from the cake decorating store ($1.98). I was both amused and bemused — amused as a long-time amateur juggler who even as a boy wished to run away and join the circus, but bemused by the unlikely shower pattern and the plastic connections between the balls.
motivation.author: Claude Shannon

motivation.quote: The greatest numbers jugglers of all time cannot sustain their record patterns for more than a few minutes, but my little clowns juggle all night and never drop a prop!
motivation.author: Claude Shannon

motivation.quote: That’s his opinion and it may be a good one.
motivation.author: Claude Shannon

motivation.quote: I cannot understand how he would feel so viciously about a difference of opinion.
motivation.author: Claude Shannon

motivation.quote: I don’t think I was ever motivated by the notion of winning prizes, although I have a couple of dozen of them in the other room. I was more motivated by curiosity.
motivation.author: Claude Shannon

motivation.quote: I’ve got enough kudos for my slim appetite anyway.
motivation.author: Claude Shannon

motivation.quote: After I had found the answers, it was always painful to write them up or to publish them (which is how you get the acclaim).
motivation.author: Claude Shannon

motivation.quote: You know where my interests are, and that’s enough.
motivation.author: Claude Shannon

motivation.quote: When we began to plan our journey, Betty brought home four books relating to the culture and customs of Japan. I am not sure how reliable these were, since they were all written by Americans.
motivation.author: Claude Shannon

motivation.quote: (Shannon speaking to someone destined for California): You are going to God’s country. All you need is a great white apron, a chef ’s hat, and a barbecue, and you’ll be all set.
motivation.author: Claude Shannon

motivation.quote: An American driving in England is confronted with a wild and dangerous world
motivation.author: Claude Shannon

motivation.quote: If you yourself don’t choose what thoughts and images you expose yourself to, someone else will.
motivation.author: Epictetus

motivation.quote: Whether You Believe You Can Do a Thing or Not, You Are Right
motivation.author: Henry Ford

motivation.quote: If it is to be, it’s up to me.
motivation.author: Coach George Raveling

motivation.quote: Does your mind have control over you or are you going to have control of your mind?
motivation.author: Olympic silver medalist Galen Rupp

motivation.quote: Success is a double-edged sword. You want to shadow box with it but you don’t want to embrace it or dance too close.
motivation.author: Robert Redford

motivation.quote: Why is this so unbearable? Why can’t I endure it?" You’ll be embarrassed to answer.
motivation.author: Marcus Aurelius

motivation.quote: If it’s normal, do the exact opposite
motivation.author: Jesse Cole, owner of the Savannah Bananas baseball team

motivation.quote: Gratitude is not only the greatest of virtues but the parent of all the others.
motivation.author: Cicero

motivation.quote: I read my eyes out and can’t read half enough…the more one reads the more one sees we have to read.
motivation.author: John Adams

motivation.quote: Shined shoes save lives
motivation.author: General Norman Schwarzkopf

motivation.quote: Nothing in the world is worth having or worth doing unless it means effort, pain, difficulty… I have never in my life envied a human being who led an easy life. I have envied a great many people who led difficult lives and led them well.
motivation.author: Theodore Roosevelt

motivation.quote: Start by doing what’s necessary; then do what’s possible; and suddenly you are doing the impossible.
motivation.author: Francis of Assisi

motivation.quote: Success is to be measured not so much by the position that one has reached in life as by the obstacles which he has overcome.
motivation.author: Booker T. Washington

motivation.quote: The only thing that overcomes hard luck is hard work.
motivation.author: Harry Golden

motivation.quote: Always bear in mind that your own resolution to success is more important than any other one thing.
motivation.author: Abraham Lincoln

motivation.quote: Success is percent failure.
motivation.author: Soichiro Honda

motivation.quote: Turn your wounds into wisdom.
motivation.author: Oprah Winfrey

motivation.quote: Success seems to be largely a matter of hanging on after others have let go.
motivation.author: William Feather

motivation.quote: There’s a bit of magic in everything, and some loss to even things out.
motivation.author: Lou Reed

motivation.quote: There is no education like adversity.
motivation.author: Disraeli

motivation.quote: Believe you can and you’re halfway there.
motivation.author: Theodore Roosevelt

motivation.quote: Seize every opportunity along the way, for how sad it would be if the road you chose became the road not taken.
motivation.author: Robert Brault

motivation.quote: I hated every minute of training, but I said, ‘Don’t quit. Suffer now and live the rest of your life as a champion.’
motivation.author: Muhammad Ali

motivation.quote: Your big opportunity may be right where you are now.
motivation.author: Napoleon Hill

motivation.quote: Everyone here has the sense that right now is one of those moments when we are influencing the future.
motivation.author: Steve Jobs

motivation.quote: I made a startling discovery. Time spent writing = output of work. Amazing.
motivation.author: Ann Pachett

motivation.quote: Best advice on writing I’ve ever received. Finish.
motivation.author: Peter Mayle

motivation.quote: When asked, ‘How do you write?’ I invariably answer, ‘One word at a time,’ and the answer is invariably dismissed. But that is all it is. It sounds too simple to be true, but consider the Great Wall of China, if you will: one stone at a time, man. That’s all. One stone at a time. But I’ve read you can see [it] from space without a telescope.
motivation.author: Stephen King

motivation.quote: Planning to write is not writing. Writing is writing.
motivation.author: E. L. Doctorow

motivation.quote: At the moment of truth, there are either reasons or results.
motivation.author: Chuck Yeager

motivation.quote: If you wait to write, you’re not a writer; you’re a waiter.
motivation.author: Dan Poynter

motivation.quote: Rejected pieces aren’t failures; unwritten pieces are.
motivation.author: Greg Daugherty

motivation.quote: The big secret in life is that there is no big secret. Whatever your goal, you can get there if you’re willing to work.
motivation.author: Oprah Winfrey

motivation.quote: The key to realizing a dream is to focus not on success but significance — and then even the small steps and little victories along your path will take on greater meaning.
motivation.author: Oprah Winfrey

motivation.quote: Passion is energy. Feel the power that comes from focusing on what excites you.
motivation.author: Oprah Winfrey

motivation.quote: Align your personality with your purpose, and nobody can touch you.
motivation.author: Oprah Winfrey

motivation.quote: I believe the choice to be excellent begins with aligning your thoughts and words with the intention to require more from yourself.
motivation.author: Oprah Winfrey

motivation.quote: Doing the best at this moment puts you in the best place for the next moment.
motivation.author: Oprah Winfrey

motivation.quote: Don’t worry about being successful but work toward being significant and the success will naturally follow.
motivation.author: Oprah Winfrey

motivation.quote: If you want to accomplish the goals of your life, you have to begin with the spirit.
motivation.author: Oprah Winfrey

motivation.quote: It doesn’t matter who you are, where you came from. The ability to triumph begins with you. Always.
motivation.author: Oprah Winfrey

motivation.quote: Real integrity is doing the right thing, knowing that nobody’s going to know whether you did it or not.
motivation.author: Oprah Winfrey

motivation.quote: When you acknowledge, as you must, that there is no such thing as perfect food, only the idea of it, then the real purpose of striving toward perfection becomes clear: to make people happy, that is what cooking is all about.
motivation.author: Thomas Keller

motivation.quote: We're hoping to succeed; we're okay with failure. We just don't want to land in between.
motivation.author: David Chang

motivation.quote: We go through our careers and things happen to us. Those experiences made me what I am.
motivation.author: Thomas Keller

motivation.quote: If you want to become a great chef, you have to work with great chefs. And that's exactly what I did.
motivation.author: Gordon Ramsay

motivation.quote: I always say that I don't believe I'm a chef. I try to be a storyteller.
motivation.author: Jose Andrés

motivation.quote: There are many times in my life, when I could've thrown in the towel. Many times in my life when I was on the floor. And when you're on the floor, never allow anybody to pick you up. It doesn't matter how long you stay there, make sure you pick yourself up and dust yourself down. Whatever happens, whether you go home today or you don't go home today, that's irrelevant. What's relevant, is you take the knowledge from the experience and you grow as a person.
motivation.author: Marco Pierre White

motivation.quote: Although the skills aren't hard to learn, finding the happiness and finding the satisfaction and finding fulfillment in continuously serving somebody else something good to eat, is what makes a really good restaurant.
motivation.author: Mario Batali

motivation.quote: My philosophy from day one is that I can sleep better at night if I can improve an individual’s knowledge about food and wine, and do it on a daily basis.
motivation.author: Emeril Lagasse

motivation.quote: I tell a student that the most important class you can take is technique. A great chef is first a great technician. 'If you are a jeweler, or a surgeon or a cook, you have to know the trade in your hand. You have to learn the process. You learn it through endless repetition until it belongs to you.
motivation.author: Jacques Pepín

motivation.quote: Being involved, learning firsthand and observing the craft and absorbing all you can, makes it easier to define what you want. It will also ultimately make you a better Chef. Culinary school, or even a single class, is a great bet too.
motivation.author: Giada De Laurentiis

motivation.quote: A great restaurant doesn't distinguish itself by how few mistakes it makes but by how well they handle those mistakes.
motivation.author: Danny Meyer

motivation.quote: To me, there's no great chef without a great team.
motivation.author: Daniel Boulud

motivation.quote: I think every chef, not just in America, but across the world, has a double-edged sword - two jackets, one that's driven, a self-confessed perfectionist, thoroughbred, hate incompetence and switch off the stove, take off the jacket and become a family man.
motivation.author: Gordon Ramsay

motivation.quote: You don't go to school to become the best chef in the world right after you graduate. School is always a starting point so what people forget is that you go to school to build a foundation, and you want to build a foundation that's not going to crumble.
motivation.author: Roy Yamaguchi

motivation.quote: I've been a cook all my life, but I am still learning to be a good chef. I'm always learning new techniques and improving beyond my own knowledge because there is always something new to learn and new horizons to discover.
motivation.author: Jose Andrés

motivation.quote: I think to be a great chef you have to be a great teacher. I love doing classes with people who love food and enjoy food, bringing them all around one table so to speak.
motivation.author: Michael Symon

motivation.quote: When you have made as many mistakes as I have then you can be as good as me.
motivation.author: Wolfgang Puck

motivation.quote: To eat well, I always disagree with critics who say that all restaurants should be fine dining. You can get a Michelin star if you serve the best hamburger in the world.
motivation.author: David Chang

motivation.quote: Give a man a mask, and he will show you his true face.
motivation.author: Oscar Wilde

motivation.quote: Airports see more sincere kisses than wedding halls. The walls of hospitals have heard more prayers than the walls of churches...
motivation.author: Anonymous

motivation.quote: Some people die at 25 and aren’t buried until 75.
motivation.author: Anonymous

motivation.quote: Alive we thought beyond our lives to give our bodies as a book for you to read.
motivation.author: Anonymous

motivation.quote: I loved her, and sometimes, she loved me too.
motivation.author: Pablo Neruda’s Saddest Poem

motivation.quote: Man is the only animal for whom its existence is a problem which he has to solve.
motivation.author: Erich Fromm

motivation.quote: When I was 26, 27 years old I was running a kitchen in New York, and I was a raving lunatic. The older you get, you figure out you don't need to do that. You realize at a certain point, there's a certain gravity to what you say and what you do. If that's not enough, all the yelling in the world is not going to matter.
motivation.author: Tom Colicchio

motivation.quote: Techniques are not the most difficult to teach. The attitudes chefs take are much more important.Alain Ducasse

Once you decide on your occupation... you must immerse yourself in your work. You have to fall in love with your work. Never complain about your job. You must dedicate your life to mastering your skill. That's the secret of success... and is the key to being regarded honorably.
motivation.author: Jiro Ono

motivation.quote: Use your life to serve the world, and you will find that it also serves you.
motivation.author: Oprah Winfrey

motivation.quote: Don’t back down just to keep the peace. Standing up for your beliefs builds self-confidence and self-esteem.
motivation.author: Oprah Winfrey

motivation.quote: Where there is no struggle, there is no strength.
motivation.author: Oprah Winfrey

motivation.quote: This is how you do it; sit down at the keyboard and put one word after another. It’s that easy and that hard.
motivation.author: Neil Gaiman

motivation.quote: Amateurs sit and wait for inspiration, the rest of us just get up and go to work.
motivation.author: Stephen King

motivation.quote: Writing is the most fun you can have by yourself.
motivation.author: Terry Pratchett

motivation.quote: The best preparation for tomorrow is doing your best today.
motivation.author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

motivation.quote: Jumping at several small opportunities may get us there more quickly than waiting for one big one to come along.
motivation.author: Hugh Allen

motivation.quote: Opportunities do not come with their values stamped upon them.
motivation.author: Maltbie Babcock

motivation.quote: I must die or be better
motivation.author: Abraham Lincoln

motivation.quote: Time is the most valuable thing you have; be sure to spend it well.
motivation.author: Lyndon Johnson

motivation.quote: Nature does not hurry yet everything is accomplished.
motivation.author: Lao Tzu

motivation.quote: The whole driving situation was not particularly improved by the narrowness of English streets and the high speed of English drivers. Nor was our inner security increased by the predilection of the English for building stone walls immediately adjacent to the roads.
motivation.author: Claude Shannon

motivation.quote: I also have been interested in the possibility of life on other planets, which it seems to me is very likely true. Not on our planets on our solar system but in the galaxy which we live with so many billions of suns, many of which undoubtedly have planetary systems. It seems to me almost certainly, there are many many civilizations out there, many of them far more advanced than we are.
motivation.author: Claude Shannon

motivation.quote: Mrs. Shannon and I would like to thank you again for the very pleasant time we spent in Holland. We both enjoy tremendously the automobile rides across the dykes, and I am still telling my friends about the chess club where they drink wine and make speeches but don’t play chess.
motivation.author: Claude Shannon

motivation.quote: Inspiration exists, but it has to find you working.
motivation.author: Pablo Picasso

motivation.quote: If there’s a book you want to read, but it hasn’t been written yet, then you must write it.
motivation.author: Toni Morrison

motivation.quote: Be who you are and say what you feel because those who mind don’t matter and those who matter don’t mind.
motivation.author: Dr Suess

motivation.quote: Don’t stare at a blank page for too long, be bold, and make the first incisive stroke. The rest will come naturally.
motivation.author: James Kingman

motivation.quote: Some people think design means how it looks. But of course, if you dig deeper, it’s really how it works.
motivation.author: Steve Jobs

motivation.quote: I've searched all the parks in all the cities and found no statues of committees.
motivation.author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

motivation.quote: Perfection is not attainable. But if we chase perfection we can catch excellence.
motivation.author: Vince Lombardi

motivation.quote: Get a good idea and stay with it. Dog it, and work at it until it’s done right.
motivation.author: Walt Disney

motivation.quote: Optimism is the faith that leads to achievement. Nothing can be done without hope and confidence.
motivation.author: Helen Keller

motivation.quote: Work hard, be kind, and amazing things will happen
motivation.author: Conan O’Brien

motivation.quote: I wasn’t there to compete. I was there to win
motivation.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

motivation.quote: Someone once told me growth and comfort do not coexist
motivation.author: Ginni Rometty

motivation.quote: All the power is within you. You can do anything
motivation.author: Swami Vivekananda

motivation.quote: The place between your comfort zone and your dream is where life takes place
motivation.author: Helen Keller

motivation.quote: Stop whining, start grinding
motivation.author: Eric Thomas

motivation.quote: Everything you’ve ever wanted is on the other side of fear
motivation.author: George Addair

motivation.quote: To be a star, you must shine your own light, follow your own path, and don’t worry about darkness, for that is when the stars shine brightest
motivation.author: Napoleon Hill

motivation.quote: The question isn’t who is doing to let me, it’s who is going to stop me
motivation.author: Ayn Rand

motivation.quote: I am not afraid… I was born to do this
motivation.author: Joan of Arc

motivation.quote: "No" simply means begin again at one level higher
motivation.author: Peter Diamandis

motivation.quote: Do what you have to do until you can do what you want to do
motivation.author: Oprah Winfrey

motivation.quote: Those who truly want something will keep trying until they die
motivation.author: Maxime Lagacé

motivation.quote: Don’t worry about looking good – worry about achieving your goals
motivation.author: Ray Dalio

motivation.quote: How bad do you want it?
motivation.author: Gary Vaynerchuk

motivation.quote: If you fell down yesterday, stand up today. H.G
motivation.author: Wells

motivation.quote: The only person you are destined to become is the person you decide to be
motivation.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

motivation.quote: Conformity gets you nowhere
motivation.author: Neil Strauss

motivation.quote: Blood, sweat and respect. First two you give. Last one you earn
motivation.author: Dwayne Johnson (The Rock)

motivation.quote: Action is the real measure of intelligence
motivation.author: Napoleon Hill

motivation.quote: Be so good they can’t ignore you
motivation.author: Steve Martin

motivation.quote: Show the world how much you’ll fight for the winners circle
motivation.author: Pat Riley

motivation.quote: Everything you can imagine is real
motivation.author: Pablo Picasso

motivation.quote: Develop success from failures. Discouragement and failure are two of the surest stepping stones to success
motivation.author: Dale Carnegie

motivation.quote: Learn to be comfortable in the uncomfortable. Learn to be peaceful, not bored. Learn to be inspired, not scared
motivation.author: Maxime Lagacé

motivation.quote: You’re probably on the right track if you feel like a sidewalk worm during a rainstorm
motivation.author: Larry Page (Google)

motivation.quote: Make each day your masterpiece
motivation.author: John Wooden

motivation.quote: What you want exists. Don’t settle until you get it
motivation.author: Jay Shetty

motivation.quote: Do not wait to strike till the iron is hot. Make it hot by striking
motivation.author: William Butler Yeats

motivation.quote: Growth is never by mere chance; it is the result of forces working together.
motivation.author: James Cash Penney, founder, JC Penney

motivation.quote: Play by the rules, but be ferocious.
motivation.author: Phil Knight, founder, Nike

motivation.quote: The only strategy that is guaranteed to fail is not taking risks.
motivation.author: Mark Zuckerberg, founder, Facebook

motivation.quote: Out of your vulnerabilities will come your strength.
motivation.author: Sigmund Freud, neurologist

motivation.quote: Motivation is the catalyzing ingredient for every successful innovation.
motivation.author: Clayton Christensen, economist and Harvard professor

motivation.quote: Every problem is a gift — without problems we would not grow.
motivation.author: Anthony Robbins, motivational speaker and writer

motivation.quote: Conformity is the jailer of freedom and the enemy of growth.
motivation.author: John F. Kennedy, 35th president of the United States of America

motivation.quote: Strength and growth come only through continuous effort and struggle.
motivation.author: Napoleon Hill, author

motivation.quote: Everyone wants to live on top of the mountain, but all the happiness and growth occurs while you’re climbing it.
motivation.author: Andy Rooney, journalist

motivation.quote: Mistakes are the growing pains of wisdom.
motivation.author: William George Jordan, writer/editor

motivation.quote: The greatest thing in this world is not so much where we stand as in what direction we are moving.
motivation.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe, writer/statesman

motivation.quote: No company can afford not to move forward. It may be at the top of the heap today but at the bottom of the heap tomorrow, if it doesn’t.
motivation.author: James Cash Penney, founder, JC Penney

motivation.quote: Only those who will risk going too far can possibly find out how far one can go.
motivation.author: T.S. Eliot, author

motivation.quote: The only way you are going to have success is to have lots of failures first.
motivation.author: Sergey Brin, co-founder, Google

motivation.quote: I do not know the word ‘quit.’ Either I never did, or I have abolished it.
motivation.author: Susan Butcher, sled dog racer

motivation.quote: To be successful, you have to have your heart in your business, and your business in your heart.
motivation.author: Thomas Watson, Sr., former CEO, IBM

motivation.quote: It’s very easy to be different but very difficult to be better.
motivation.author: Jonathan Ive, Chief Design Officer, Apple

motivation.quote: Almost everything worthwhile carries with it some sort of risk, whether it’s starting a new business, whether it’s leaving home, whether it’s getting married, or whether it’s flying in space.
motivation.author: Chris Hadfield, astronaut

motivation.quote: Happy employees lead to happy customers, which leads to more profits.
motivation.author: Vaughn Aust, EVP of Integrated Solutions, MarketStar

motivation.quote: A good product manager is the CEO of the product. A good product manager takes full responsibility and measures themselves in terms of the success of the product. They are responsible for right product/right time and all that entails. Bad product managers have lots of excuses.
motivation.author: Ben Horowitz, Andreessen Horowitz

motivation.quote: The "P" in PM is as much about ‘PEOPLE’ management as it is about ‘PROJECT’ management.
motivation.author: Cornelius Fichtner, The Project Management Podcast

motivation.quote: You want to be extra rigorous about making the best possible thing you can. Find everything wrong with it and fix it. Seek negative feedback, particularly from friends.
motivation.author: Elon Musk, Tesla

motivation.quote: The utmost thing is the user experience, to have the most useful experience.
motivation.author: Marissa Mayer, Yahoo!

motivation.quote: Failure is an option here. If things are not failing, you are not innovating enough.
motivation.author: Elon Musk, Inventor

motivation.quote: It was women I spoke to, sat amongst the giant whirring computers. It never occurred to me that this wasn’t a job for someone like me. For young people to see that is I think important, and as important for young men as well as young women.
motivation.author: Rachel Andrew, Web Developer

motivation.quote: Don’t underestimate the ripple effect of what you do.
motivation.author: Leila Janah, Cofounder of Samahope

motivation.quote: It’s your inner truth. If you’re doing your best work and you think it’s work that helps other people, who can tear you down?
motivation.author: Brit Morin, Founder & CEO of Brit + Co.

motivation.quote: The broadness of my interests gives me an excellent perspective to do what I do, and I wouldn’t have it any other way.
motivation.author: Adam Savage, Mythbusters

motivation.quote: I have not failed. I’ve just found 10,ways that won’t work.
motivation.author: Thomas Edison, Inventor

motivation.quote: The more I study, the more insatiable do I feel my genius for it to be.
motivation.author: Ada Lovelace, World’s First Computer Programmer

motivation.quote: It’s really just a matter of time and resources; if you have those then anything is possible.
motivation.author: Hironobu Sakaguchi, Cofounder of Squaresoft

motivation.quote: When you do something that’s guaranteed to succeed, you’re closing the door to the possibility of discovery.
motivation.author: Milton Glaser, Logo Designer

motivation.quote: A good idea is something that does not solve just one single problem, but rather can solve multiple problems at once.
motivation.author: Shigeru Miyamoto, Nintendo

motivation.quote: I’m not a programmer at all so what I did was find some interesting programmers and collaborated with them. So you start a really good relationship between a more technical person who’s good at solving the problems in code, and someone like me who comes up with the ideas, rather than trying to do everything yourself. There’s only so much room in your head.
motivation.author: Matt Pyke, Founder of Universal Everything

motivation.quote: Design is all about finding solutions within constraints. If there were no constraints, it’s not design — it’s art.
motivation.author: Matias Duarte, Vice President of Design at Google

motivation.quote: It’s a two way process — we apply our architectural research and experimentation to these designs — but we also learn a great deal from the process of collaborating with others who lead their own industries. A brilliant design will always benefit from the input of others.
motivation.author: Zaha Hadid, Architect

motivation.quote: Creativity comes from a conflict of ideas.
motivation.author: Donatella Versace, Fashion Designer

motivation.quote: Our power has always been in our web community — we are exceptionally good at creating movements and solving things, as a community. It’s time to dig deep and put as much time and effort into helping our community as we once did fixing browser quirks all those years ago.
motivation.author: Sarah Parmenter, Web Designer

motivation.quote: I think we all have a vision for something. If you believe in something deep in your gut and in your heart, it’s probably going to be inspiring to other people.
motivation.author: Tiffany Jones Brown, Creative Director at Pinterest

motivation.quote: Nothing stays still; nothing has ever been given to anybody. The amount of tenacity, energy and patience it takes, especially today, is immeasurable. Skills and passion are a must, and of course you would have those because it’s such a hard journey that you wouldn’t try and do this without them. Just keep moving forward, that’s how I’ve got here, one foot in front of the other.
motivation.author: Simon Waterfall, Creative Director of Social Suicide

motivation.quote: Freedom is the only style. That is why I never speak about beauty or beautiful products but ‘good products’. Nowadays, we have so many challenges; it is not really a priority to care for beauty. The only way for us is to focus on an ethic and ecological behaviour.
motivation.author: Philippe Starck, Interior, Industrial, and Architectural Designer

motivation.quote: If you treat the things that you want to do in life, your actual desires, as your truth, people can’t argue with it.
motivation.author: Jessica Hische, Founder and CEO of Something, Eventually

motivation.quote: I truly put passion and soul into the design to make it feel like a living thing.
motivation.author: Ikuo Maeda, Design Chief at Mazda

motivation.quote: At its best, design is human. It’s not about does it have drop shadows, is it pretty? It’s more about the connection I have with it.
motivation.author: Jenny Arden, User Experience Manager at Airbnb

motivation.quote: It is unforgivable to do what one doesn’t love, especially if one succeeds.
motivation.author: Christian Dior, Fashion Designer

motivation.quote: Design shouldn’t be superficial — it’s an essential form of expression.
motivation.author: Joyce Wang, Luxury Interior Designer

motivation.quote: Art exists only to communicate a spiritual message.
motivation.author: Alfonse Mucha, Artist and Designer

motivation.quote: A design career is a process of learning better and better what you know instinctively.
motivation.author: Mario Bellini, Architect and Designer

motivation.quote: Every great architect is — necessarily — a great poet. He must be a great original interpreter of his time, his day, his age.
motivation.author: Frank Lloyd Wright, Architect

motivation.quote: Does innovation really help break the taboo? The answer is ‘Yes.’
motivation.author: Miki Agrawai. Product Designer

motivation.quote: It’s like being in a trance — it’s a fluid — and you almost don’t remember doing the picture. Drawing is an escape from all the unnecessary things in life that get in the way of being free.
motivation.author: Jamie Hewlett, Graphic Artist

motivation.quote: How do you know if you’re doing a good job? There’s always an external way to measure quality — being prepared, attending to the details, listening to the collective wisdom about what it means to do good work. Give a crap about the little things, and you’re good.
motivation.author: Karen McGrange, User Experience Designer

motivation.quote: Design is, in abstract terms, a sum of individual signals, which combine to produce a powerful overall signal. Good design is by no means the result of purely rational thoughts. And that’s what makes our mission so difficult. After all, design is always the reflection of attitudes towards life, views and convictions.
motivation.author: Walter De Silva, Automobile Designer

motivation.quote: The best thing you can do is stay in your studio and do it as well as you can.
motivation.author: Jasper Morrison, Product and Furniture Designer

motivation.quote: To be successful, you really have to put your ego in the background and try to be diplomatic to achieve what you want to achieve.
motivation.author: Ken Adam, Production Designer

motivation.quote: If you’re interested in design, the best thing to do is observe how people interact with each other and the things they use.
motivation.author: Julie Zhuo, Director of Product Design, Facebook

motivation.quote: I try and be as stupid as possible regarding my profession, which means I try to look at as few design magazines as possible.
motivation.author: Ettore Sattsass, Founder of the Memphis Collective

motivation.quote: Go one way, or another.
motivation.author: Adrian Fisher, Maze Designer

motivation.quote: In order to be irreplaceable, one must always be different.
motivation.author: Coco Chanel, Fashion Designer

motivation.quote: The dirty little secret about simplicity is that it’s really hard to do.
motivation.author: J Mays, Automobile Designer at Ford Motor Company

motivation.quote: Make it work.
motivation.author: Tim Gunn, Project Runway

motivation.quote: After meditating for some years, I began to see the patterns of my own behavior. As you quiet your mind, you begin to see the nature of your own resistance more clearly, struggles, inner dialogues, the way in which you procrastinate and develop passive resistance against life. As you cultivate the witness, things change. You don’t have to change them. Things just change.
motivation.author: Ram Dass

motivation.quote: We’re all just walking each other home.
motivation.author: Ram Dass

motivation.quote: The quieter you become, the more you can hear.
motivation.author: Ram Dass

motivation.quote: It is important to expect nothing, to take every experience, including the negative ones, as merely steps on the path, and to proceed.
motivation.author: Ram Dass

motivation.quote: The most exquisite paradox… as soon as you give it all up, you can have it all. As long as you want power, you can’t have it. The minute you don’t want power, you’ll have more than you ever dreamed possible.
motivation.author: Ram Dass

motivation.quote: Suffering is part of our training program for becoming wise.
motivation.author: Ram Dass

motivation.quote: The most important aspect of love is not in giving or the receiving: it’s in the being. When I need love from others, or need to give love to others, I’m caught in an unstable situation. Being in love, rather than giving or taking love, is the only thing that provides stability. Being in love means seeing the Beloved all around me.
motivation.author: Ram Dass

motivation.quote: The spiritual journey is individual, highly personal. It can’t be organized or regulated. It isn’t true that everyone should follow one path. Listen to your own truth.
motivation.author: Ram Dass

motivation.quote: A feeling of aversion or attachment toward something is your clue that there’s work to be done.
motivation.author: Ram Dass

motivation.quote: Information is just bits of data. Knowledge is putting them together. Wisdom is transcending them.
motivation.author: Ram Dass

motivation.quote: In our relationships, how much can we allow them to become new, and how much do we cling to what they used to be yesterday?
motivation.author: Ram Dass

motivation.quote: Across planes of consciousness, we have to live with the paradox that opposite things can be simultaneously true.
motivation.author: Ram Dass

motivation.quote: The strongest thing a man can do is cry. To expose your feelings, to be vulnerable in front of the world. That’s real strength.
motivation.author: Jay-Z, rapper and businessman

motivation.quote: Expressing emotion when you’ve gone through extreme pain is not weakness. It is humanity.
motivation.author: Sheryl Sandberg, COO of Facebook

motivation.quote: I’ve got my feelings in my fingertips again. I think that’s part of the human challenge: You either deny them all of your life or you answer them and evolve.
motivation.author: Brad Pitt, actor and film producer

motivation.quote: Every single day of my life, I just feel lucky. Lucky in my career. Lucky enough to have found the perfect partner. Sometimes in life, it doesn’t happen on your schedule, but you find the person that you were always supposed to be with.
motivation.author: George Clooney, actor, director & producer

motivation.quote: [Love] is the one thing in life that I think is the biggest determinant of happiness, and it’s the thing you have the least control over.
motivation.author: Amal Clooney, international human rights lawyer

motivation.quote: I felt like a door had been opened to a person who made me want to be my best self. . . . I find myself just wanting to be better by simply being around her because of the standard she holds.
motivation.author: Alexis Ohanian, founder of Reddit

motivation.quote: You’re right, but you’re wrong, too. Welcome to life as a couple.
motivation.author: Esther Perel, relationship psychotherapist

motivation.quote: ‘I’m a shepherd and I’m a warrior,’ he says when I ask about the two sides of his personality. ‘I come and go between those two. I’m a nomad, and nomads are the most real people. You can’t pretend.’
motivation.author: Hamdi Ulukaya, founder & CEO of Chobani

motivation.quote: I feel like mentally, I’m 100%, but it’s still hard to see a life outside of just being in a wheelchair. It’s about learning to treat yourself as a whole person even though your body is broken down.
motivation.author: Anthony Zhang, founder of EnvoyNow

motivation.quote: I didn’t give a s — -. I had no self-esteem. No self-worth. I thought the world would just be better off without me. I figured that was the best thing to do — just end my life.
motivation.author: Michael Phelps, 23-time Olympic gold medalist

motivation.quote: Your dreams always have to be big. And mine were huge.
motivation.author: Quincy Jones, record producer & actor

motivation.quote: You have to work really, really hard to put yourself in a position to get lucky.
motivation.author: Daniel Schwartz, CEO of Burger King

motivation.quote: I don’t think that wanting to win is at all in contradiction with our mission.
motivation.author: John Zimmer, Lyft president

motivation.quote: Don’t be afraid of your ambition, your dreams, or even your anger. Those are powerful forces.
motivation.author: Hillary Clinton, American politician

motivation.quote: It is lonely at the top. But not for everyone. It’s lonely at the top for those who were lonely at the bottom.
motivation.author: From profile on Elon Musk, CEO of SpaceX, Tesla, and Neuralink

motivation.quote: That I had made mistakes, on that we can all agree. But swimming in that sea of Aloneness was terrifying.
motivation.author: Monica Lewinsky, activist

motivation.quote: Isolation changes you; it makes you angry. You start to forget about the world outside — it’s not relevant or relatable anymore.
motivation.author: Chelsea Manning, former U.S. army soldier

motivation.quote: There are probably a lot of young dudes who hear my story and think it could never happen to them. That they’re untouchable. Man…Nobody is untouchable. Nobody in this life is immune to pain.
motivation.author: Lamar Odom, retired professional basketball player

motivation.quote: ‘It’s fundamentally about uncertainty,’ he says. ‘And therefore anyone who meets this definition is an entrepreneur.’
motivation.author: Eric Ries, author of ‘The Lean Startup’

motivation.quote: We are very comfortable in very high-risk environments with absolutely no guarantee of success. I don’t mean existing in that environment for days, weeks or months. I mean year after year.
motivation.author: Tyler Winklevoss, co-founder & CEO of Gemini

motivation.quote: I wanted to take a huge bet on myself. If we win, I win the most. But the reason I do that is because if we lose, I lose the most.
motivation.author: Chamath Palihapitiya, CEO of Social Capital

motivation.quote: I believe that the biggest problem that humanity faces is an ego sensitivity to finding out whether one is right or wrong and identifying what one’s strengths and weaknesses are.
motivation.author: Ray Dalio, founder and CEO of Bridgewater Associates

motivation.quote: The hardest person to protect yourself from is yourself.
motivation.author: Eric Roberts, actor

motivation.quote: Left unchecked, technology turns people into proxies. That’s why it’s so crucial that we integrate empathy and compassion into the design process.
motivation.author: Whitney Hess

motivation.quote: You are designing for people; you need to be well versed in the abilities and frailties of the human mind.
motivation.author: Aza Raskin

motivation.quote: To be a great designer you need to look a little deeper into how people think and act.
motivation.author: Paul Boag

motivation.quote: I’ve now been a UX designer for 3 years. Looking back, it was a tough journey — I had no experience in the world of technology or design. If you want to become a UX designer and you don’t have a background in digital, don’t panic. The learning curve is steep, but it’s doable. Getting into UX design completely changed my life.
motivation.author: Guy Ligertwood

motivation.quote: Listen to and study people. Test and explore ways to reach those people. Pick research like cognitive psychology or organizational behavior or anthropology that gives you a deep, empathetic curiosity about people. Then, marry that with action where you have to apply it — mediums and/or technologies to connect with those people. Painting, writing, photography, filmmaking, industrial design, motion, code — whatever calls to you.
motivation.author: Marisa Gallagher

motivation.quote: When people you trust tell you the truth about yourself? Moments like those? Man, that is where you grow.
motivation.author: Jay Wright, head basketball coach at Villanova University

motivation.quote: I am not fearful of the darkness. If anything, I am intrigued by it, because I think it explains human nature and people better.
motivation.author: Charlize Theron, actress & film producer

motivation.quote: The question we need to ask ourselves is whether there is any place we can stand in ourselves where we can look at all that’s happening around us without freaking out, where we can be quiet enough to hear our predicament, and where we can begin to find ways of acting that are at least not contributing to further destabilization.
motivation.author: Ram Dass

motivation.quote: Our interactions with one another reflect a dance between love and fear.
motivation.author: Ram Dass

motivation.quote: There’s much more in any given moment than we usually perceive, and that we ourselves are much more than we usually perceive. When you know that, part of you can stand outside the drama of your life.
motivation.author: Ram Dass

motivation.quote: It’s not all about what it looks like; it’s more about what it feels like.
motivation.author: Linda Andersson, Ford Punk Designer

motivation.quote: Whenever I need an extra hit of inspiration, I browse books from James Turrell, Tadao Ando, or Santiago Calatrava while enjoying a glass of scotch. I also go to museums and parks on a regular basis with my family.
motivation.author: Hector Ouilhet Olmos, Product Designer at Google

motivation.quote: Have a point of view, be creative, continue to produce new work and develop your skills.
motivation.author: Fleet Bigwood, Textile Designer

motivation.quote: Your value doesn’t decrease based on someone’s inability to see your worth. Never let someone else’s opinion of you become your reality.
motivation.author: Zig Ziglar

motivation.quote: Nothing is more exhausting than the task that is never started.
motivation.author: Gretchen Rubin

motivation.quote: The great enemy of truth is very often not the lie — deliberate, contrived and dishonest — but the myth — persistent, persuasive and unrealistic. Too often we hold fast to the cliches of our forebears. We subject all facts to a prefabricated set of interpretations. We enjoy the comfort of opinion without the discomfort of thought.
motivation.author: John F Kennedy

motivation.quote: There are people who would love to have your bad days.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: One of many problems with thinking the grass is always greener is not spending enough time watering your own lawn.
motivation.author: Jeff Weiner

motivation.quote: The counterfeit innovator is wildly self-confident. The real one is scared to death.
motivation.author: Steven Pressfield

motivation.quote: Attention is the rarest and purest form of generosity.
motivation.author: Simone Weil

motivation.quote: If you are more fortunate than others, it’s better to build a longer table than a taller fence.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: When a flower doesn’t bloom, you fix the environment in which it grows — not the flower.
motivation.author: Alexander Den Heijer

motivation.quote: There is nothing noble in being superior to your fellow man. True nobility is being superior to your former self.
motivation.author: Ernest Hemingway

motivation.quote: To forgive is to assume a larger identity than the person who was first hurt.
motivation.author: David Whyte

motivation.quote: Don’t ask what the world needs. Ask what makes you come alive, and go do it. Because what the world needs is people who have come alive.
motivation.author: Howard Thurman

motivation.quote: If you would like to be a creative person and a sane person, you cannot have some external result in what determines whether you’re proud, or happy, or satisfied. So, you have to do a lot of work to get to a place where you’re saying to yourself, "This is a success to me, regardless of how many copies it sells.
motivation.author: Ryan Holiday

motivation.quote: I think your are the hardest part of life. I mean, everyone goes on about how hard it is to be a teenager, but actually I think it’s tougher to be in your because you’re expected to be a grownup and expected to earn your own living and be successful and I think you feel like a kid still."
motivation.author: Nigel Col

motivation.quote: The hours between AM and 6 AM have a funny habit of making you feel like you’re either on top of the world or under it."
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: 22 is basically the only age you can use as leverage. Meaning that because it’s the exact age between life-as-you-know-it and what will later be known as ‘real life’ (that’s scientifically proven, of course), people expect you to make some mistakes. Mistakes like overcooking a pot-roast or dating someone who may not be right for you. And that’s okay, because heck, you’re just 22."
motivation.author: Shanelle Kaul

motivation.quote: The path to whatever your notion of success is will likely not be linear. Don’t take continuous personal growth for granted. Just because you’re older doesn’t necessarily mean you’re wiser. Your will be full of failures — let them happen and learn as you go."
motivation.author: Holden Desalles

motivation.quote: When you’re in your early your love life seems to explode every minutes or so. By the time you’ve reached your thirties, it is every five or ten years."
motivation.author: Patrick Marber

motivation.quote: At I can talk to my parents and see that while they’ve done a lot of amazing things with their lives, there are still doubts and insecurities that they’re holding on to and trying to make sense of. Answers don’t come with age. Age provides perspective, but life wasn’t designed with a point at which it definitively gets easier."
motivation.author: Jana Eleanor

motivation.quote: Positive, healthy, loving relationships in your twenties… I don’t know if anyone would disagree with it: I think they’re the exception, not the norm. People are either playing house really aggressively because they’re scared of what an uncertain time it is, or they’re avoiding commitment altogether."
motivation.author: Lena Dunham

motivation.quote: Suddenly you’re and you’re screaming along in the car to all the songs you listened to when you were sad in middle school and everything is different but everything is good."
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: I think, for the majority of my twenties, I was always so concerned with what I didn’t have, or what I still wanted."
motivation.author: Adam Lambert

motivation.quote: The secret of change is to focus all of your energy, not on fighting the old, but building the new."
motivation.author: Socrates

motivation.quote: Happiness comes out of being willing to do your work in your twenties to find out who you are, what you love.
motivation.author: Candace Bushnell

motivation.quote: If you don’t make time to work on creating the life you want, you’re eventually going to be forced to spend a LOT of time dealing with a life you DON’T want."
motivation.author: Kevin Ngo

motivation.quote: I look back on my 20s. It’s supposed to be the prime of your life, the most vital, the most beautiful. But you’re making your critical decisions and sometimes your most critical mistakes."
motivation.author: Ann Brashares

motivation.quote: Surround yourself with people who are only going to lift you higher."
motivation.author: Oprah Winfrey

motivation.quote: I thought I knew everything about love and relationships in my 20s, the ignorance of youth is bliss. As you get older, you start to realise that you dont really know anything and life is a great traveling journey. Life is unexpected…you just never know whats going to happen."
motivation.author: Reese Witherspoon

motivation.quote: Be more concerned with your character than your reputation."
motivation.author: John Wooden

motivation.quote: As a kid I had dreams about being successful, thinking it would be cool. Then, when I was in my 20s, I really thought I had it much more figured out than I do now."
motivation.author: Ben Stiller

motivation.quote: Once I hit and exited the coveted 18–age bracket, I was like, ‘Whatevs. Just wake me when I’m 30.’ doesn’t feel much different than They seem interchangeable. They leave the same impression. Both feel very young adult."
motivation.author: Ryan O’Connell

motivation.quote: A fully open mind could shatter the skull in both directions."
motivation.author: Henry Flynt

motivation.quote: In my early twenties, I had no idea who I was. And I think that’s one reason you should try different relationships. I’ve had good and bad ones, but I took away things from them that helped me become who I am."
motivation.author: Cobie Smulders

motivation.quote: If you are willing to look at another person’s behavior toward you as a reflection of the state of their relationship with themselves rather than a statement about your value as a person, then you will, over a period of time cease to react at all.
motivation.author: Yogi Bhajan

motivation.quote: We’re kind of teaching our kids that happiness is the default position — it’s rubbish. Wholeness is what we ought to be striving for and part of that is sadness, disappointment, frustration, failure; all of those things which make us who we are. Happiness and victory and fulfillment are nice little things that also happen to us, but they don’t teach us much.
motivation.author: Hugh Mackay

motivation.quote: Ring the bells that still can ring . Forget your perfect offering. There is a crack in everything. That’s how the light gets in.
motivation.author: Leonard Cohen

motivation.quote: Do not dwell in the past, do not dream of the future, concentrate the mind on the present moment.
motivation.author: Buddha

motivation.quote: Time isn’t precious at all, because it is an illusion. What you perceive as precious is not time but the one point that is out of time: the Now. That is precious indeed. The more you are focused on time — past and future the more you miss the Now, the most precious thing there is.
motivation.author: Eckhart Tolle

motivation.quote: If you feel anxiety or depression, you are not in the present. You are either anxiously projecting the future or depressed and stuck in the past. The only thing you have any control over is the present moment; simple breathing exercises can make us calm and present instantly.
motivation.author: Tobe Hanson

motivation.quote: The ability to be in the present moment is a major component of mental wellness.
motivation.author: Abraham Maslow

motivation.quote: Do not ruin today with mourning tomorrow.
motivation.author: Catherynne M. Valente

motivation.quote: Sometimes you need to sit lonely on the floor in a quiet room in order to hear your own voice and not let it drown in the noise of others.
motivation.author: Charlotte Eriksson

motivation.quote: Life gives you plenty of time to do whatever you want to do if you stay in the present moment.
motivation.author: Deepak Chopra

motivation.quote: Always hold fast to the present. Every situation, indeed every moment, is of infinite value, for it is the representative of a whole eternity.
motivation.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

motivation.quote: Be happy in the moment, that’s enough. Each moment is all we need, not more.
motivation.author: Mother Teresa

motivation.quote: I don’t know who my grandfather was; I am much more concerned to know what his grandson will be.
motivation.author: Abraham Lincoln

motivation.quote: It stands to reason that anyone who learns to live well will die well. The skills are the same: being present in the moment, and humble, and brave, and keeping a sense of humor.
motivation.author: Victoria Moran

motivation.quote: If you feel lost, disappointed, hesitant, or weak, return to yourself, to who you are, here and now and when you get there, you will discover yourself, like a lotus flower in full bloom, even in a muddy pond, beautiful and strong.
motivation.author: Masaru Emoto

motivation.quote: Your life requires your mindful presence in order to live it. Be here now.
motivation.author: Akiroq Brost

motivation.quote: Children have neither a past nor a future. Thus they enjoy the present, which seldom happens to us.
motivation.author: Jean de La Bruyère

motivation.quote: The first recipe for happiness is: Avoid too lengthy meditation on the past.
motivation.author: André Maurois

motivation.quote: If you tell the truth you don’t have to remember anything.
motivation.author: Mark Twain

motivation.quote: The two most important days in your life are the day you are born and the day you find out why.
motivation.author: Mark Twain

motivation.quote: 2a. "You have two lives. The second one begins when you realize you only have one.
motivation.author: Confucius

motivation.quote: If the path before you is clear, you’re probably on someone else’s.
motivation.author: Joseph Campbell

motivation.quote: A man’s worth is no greater than the worth of his ambitions.
motivation.author: Marcus Aurelius

motivation.quote: The price of anything is the amount of life you exchange for it.
motivation.author: Henry David Thoreau

motivation.quote: Eat a live frog first thing in the morning, and nothing worse will happen to you the rest of the day.
motivation.author: Mark Twain

motivation.quote: Don’t interrupt your enemy while they are making a mistake.
motivation.author: Napoleon

motivation.quote: If you’re going through hell, keep going.
motivation.author: Winston Churchill

motivation.quote: Everybody has a plan until they get punched in the mouth.
motivation.author: Mike Tyson

motivation.quote: always forgive your enemies - nothing annoys them so much.
motivation.author: Oscar Wilde

motivation.quote: We don’t rise to the level of our expectations, we fall to the level of our training.
motivation.author: Archilochus

motivation.quote: Good judgement is the result of experience and experience the result of bad judgement.
motivation.author: Mark Twain

motivation.quote: Speed has never killed anyone; suddenly becoming stationary…that’s what gets you.
motivation.author: Jeremy Clarkson

motivation.quote: the reasonable man adapts himself to the world: the unreasonable one persists in trying to adapt the world to himself. Therefore all progress depends on the unreasonable man.
motivation.author: George Bernard Shaw

motivation.quote: Only put off until tomorrow what you are willing to die having left undone.
motivation.author: Pablo Picasso

motivation.quote: Love nothing but that which comes to you woven in the pattern of your destiny
motivation.author: Marcus Aurelius

motivation.quote: Powerful people come from powerful places
motivation.author: K.G.F: Chapter 1

motivation.quote: If you gain courage because a thousand people are standing behind you, then you can only win a war. But if a thousand people get courage because you are standing in front of them, you can conquer the world.
motivation.author: K.G.F: Chapter 1

motivation.quote: The breath of a wounded lion is far more terrifying than its roar !!!
motivation.author: K.G.F: Chapter 1

motivation.quote: In a fight it’s not about who throws the first punch, the only thing that counts is who fell to the ground first.
motivation.author: K.G.F: Chapter 1

motivation.quote: The one who comes with a gang is a gangster. He always comes alone. Monster !!!
motivation.author: K.G.F: Chapter 1

motivation.quote: If you hit a common man, police will come in search of you. But if you hit a policeman, dons will come in search of you.
motivation.author: K.G.F: Chapter 1

motivation.quote: Mother is the greatest warrior of the world !!!
motivation.author: K.G.F: Chapter 1

motivation.quote: In the world of these new connected products, in the Fourth Industrial Revolution, in this multi-stakeholder dialog that we have here at Davos, trust has to be the highest value in your company, and if it’s not something bad is going to happen to you.
motivation.author: Marc Benioff, CEO, Salesforce

motivation.quote: What is the most important thing in your company — is it trust or is it growth? If anything trumps trust, we are in trouble…You have to choose what is really important to you. We are in a new world… and trust better be number one.
motivation.author: Marc Benioff, CEO, Salesforce

motivation.quote: A trust leap is when we take a risk to do something new or to do it differently from the way that we’ve done something before.
motivation.author: Rachel Botsman, Author, "Who Can You Trust?"

motivation.quote: Most businesses that we interact with are built around money, and money only goes so far. Money is the currency of transactions. Trust is the currency of interactions.
motivation.author: Rachel Botsman, Author, "Who Can You Trust?"

motivation.quote: As technology enables trust in new forms, we’re seeing a decline of trust in institutions.
motivation.author: Rachel Botsman, Author, "Who Can You Trust?"

motivation.quote: People think that design is styling. Design is not style. It’s not about giving shape to the shell and not giving a damn about the guts. Good design is a renaissance attitude that combines technology, cognitive science, human need, and beauty to produce something that the world didn’t know it was missing.
motivation.author: Paola Antonelli

motivation.quote: Design is about making things good (and then better) and right (and fantastic) for the people who use and encounter them.
motivation.author: Matt Beale

motivation.quote: There is no design without discipline. There is no discipline without intelligence.
motivation.author: Massimo Vignelli

motivation.quote: Bad design is smoke,while good design is a mirror.
motivation.author: Juan-Carlos Fernandez

motivation.quote: Define what the product will do before you design how the product will do it.
motivation.author: Alan Cooper

motivation.quote: No matter how beautiful, no matter how cool your interface, it would be better if there were less of it.
motivation.author: Alan Cooper

motivation.quote: If we want users to like our software we should design it to behave like a likeable person: respectful, generous and helpful.
motivation.author: Alan Cooper

motivation.quote: Consistency is one of the most powerful usability principles: when things always behave the same, users don’t have to worry about what will happen. Instead, they know what will happen based on earlier experience.
motivation.author: Jakob Nielsen

motivation.quote: Even the best designers produce successful products only if their designs solve the right problems. A wonderful interface to the wrong features will fail.
motivation.author: Jakob Nielsen

motivation.quote: …pay attention to what users do, not what they say.
motivation.author: Jakob Nielsen

motivation.quote: On the Web, usability is a necessary condition for survival. If a website is difficult to use, people leave. If the homepage fails to clearly state what a company offers and what users can do on the site, people leave. If users get lost on a website, they leave. If a website’s information is hard to read or doesn’t answer users’ key questions, they leave. Note a pattern here?
motivation.author: Jakob Nielsen

motivation.quote: Usability is like love. You have to care, you have to listen, and you have to be willing to change. You’ll make mistakes along the way, but that’s where growth and forgiveness come in.
motivation.author: Jeffrey Zeldman

motivation.quote: Art is an idea that has found its perfect visual expression. And design is the vehicle by which this expression is made possible. Art is a noun, and design is a noun and also a verb. Art is a product and design is a process. Design is the foundation of all the arts.
motivation.author: Paul Rand

motivation.quote: Design is the method of putting form and content together. Design, just as art, has multiple definitions; there is no single definition. Design can be art. Design can be aesthetics. Design is so simple, that’s why it is so complicated.
motivation.author: Paul Rand

motivation.quote: Designing a product is designing a relationship.
motivation.author: Steve Rogers

motivation.quote: Don’t worry about people stealing your design work. Worry about the day they stop.
motivation.author: Jeffrey Zeldman

motivation.quote: A good designer can create a design that accommodates all the constraints and still delivers an elegant, satisfying experience to the user. A great designer can go beyond this and create a design that demonstrates that some of those constraints weren’t really there to begin with.
motivation.author: Jesse James Garrett

motivation.quote: Problems with visual design can turn users off so quickly that they never discover all the smart choices you made with navigation or interaction design.
motivation.author: Jesse James Garrett

motivation.quote: User-centered design means understanding what your users need, how they think, and how they behave — and incorporating that understanding into every aspect of your process.
motivation.author: Jesse James Garrett

motivation.quote: Good design, when it’s done well, becomes invisible. It’s only when it’s done poorly that we notice it. Think of it like a room’s air conditioning. We only notice it when it’s too hot, too cold, making too much noise, or the unit is dripping on us. Yet, if the air conditioning is perfect, nobody say anything and we focus, instead, on the task at hand.
motivation.author: Jared Spool

motivation.quote: Intuitive design happens when current knowledge is the same as the target knowledge.
motivation.author: Jared Spool

motivation.quote: Users do not care about what is inside the box, as long as the box does what they need done.
motivation.author: Jef Raskin

motivation.quote: What users want is convenience and results.
motivation.author: Jef Raskin

motivation.quote: An interface is humane if it is responsive to human needs and considerate of human frailties.
motivation.author: Jef Raskin

motivation.quote: Design is intelligence made visible.
motivation.author: Alina Wheeler

motivation.quote: I never design a building before I’ve seen the site and met the people who will be using it.
motivation.author: Frank Lloyd Wright

motivation.quote: UI design is much more than just fitting together the puzzle pieces of a layout. To design an interface is to create function from form, to create structure while simplifying, and to illuminate while delighting.
motivation.author: Jerry Cao

motivation.quote: There are three responses to a piece of design — yes, no, and WOW! Wow is the one to aim for.
motivation.author: Milton Glaser

motivation.quote: The real issue is not talent as an independent element, but talent in relationship to will, desire, and persistence. Talent without these things vanishes and even modest talent with those characteristics grows.
motivation.author: Milton Glaser

motivation.quote: Design creates culture. Culture shapes values. Values determine the future.
motivation.author: Robert L. Peters

motivation.quote: By doing so, you make fruitful connections and develop a business model that works, which helps bolster your chance of teaming up with famous folks and ensuring goals are aligned.
motivation.author: Adrien Grenier, Co-founder, Lonely Whale

motivation.quote: A big part of our people-first culture is treating people with respect and transparency.
motivation.author: Arne Sorenson, CEO, Marriott

motivation.quote: The higher up in the chain of command you are, the harder it is to really know what’s going on, so you have to discover the right information out of your people. You have to be great at reading body language and asking questions. You have to engender trust to get to the real stuff. Leaders who are disconnected with reality are the ones who fail.
motivation.author: Dara Khosrowshahi, CEO, Uber

motivation.quote: Rocky is like fire where the enemies are like petrol. The more the enemies, the more Rocky blazes through them.
motivation.author: K.G.F: Chapter 1

motivation.quote: Who told you that I hit some random people and became a don? Everyone I hit was a don already.
motivation.author: K.G.F: Chapter 1

motivation.quote: One needs to have fear in life and that fear should exist in the heart. But the heart should not be ours but the enemies.
motivation.author: K.G.F: Chapter 1

motivation.quote: Find what you love and let it kill you.
motivation.author: Charles Bukowski

motivation.quote: if it’s not love, it’s prostitution.
motivation.author: My friend John.

motivation.quote: If you Go Home with Somebody and they don’t have books, Don’t Fuck Them.
motivation.author: John Walters

motivation.quote: If you were conscious, that is to say totally present in the Now, all negativity would dissolve almost instantly. It could not survive in your presence.
motivation.author: Eckhart Tolle

motivation.quote: The most beautiful things in the world cannot be seen or touched, they are felt with the heart.
motivation.author: The Little Prince

motivation.quote: Well, I must endure the presence of a few caterpillars if I wish to become acquainted with the butterflies.
motivation.author: The Little Prince

motivation.quote: Straight ahead you can’t go very far.
motivation.author: The Little Prince

motivation.quote: I was sad, but I told them: "I am tired."
motivation.author: The Little Prince

motivation.quote: You are beautiful, but you are empty.
motivation.author: The Little Prince

motivation.quote: In the course of this life I have had a great many encounters with a great many people who have been concerned with matters of consequence.
motivation.author: The Little Prince

motivation.quote: One day, I saw the sunset forty-four times! You know one loves the sunset, when one is so sad.
motivation.author: The Little Prince

motivation.quote: You only understand the things that you tame.
motivation.author: The Little Prince

motivation.quote: Once you learn to read, you will be forever free.
motivation.author: Frederick Douglas

motivation.quote: Not all readers are leaders, but all leaders are readers.
motivation.author: Harry Truman

motivation.quote: I read books.
motivation.author: Elon Musk (when asked how he learned to build rockets)

motivation.quote: How can any man judge unless his mind has been opened and enlarged by reading?
motivation.author: John Adams

motivation.quote: Books allowed me to see a world beyond the front porch of my grandmother’s shotgun house…[and] the power to see possibilities beyond what was allowed at the time.
motivation.author: Oprah Winfrey

motivation.quote: Books allow you to fully explore a topic and immerse yourself in a deeper way than most media today.
motivation.author: Mark Zuckerberg

motivation.quote: I cannot live without books.
motivation.author: Thomas Jefferson

motivation.quote: Reading is important. If you know how to read, then the whole world opens up to you.
motivation.author: Barack Obama

motivation.quote: Almost everything I have read has been useful to me — science, poetry, politics, novels. I have a lifelong interest in epistemology and learning. My books have helped me develop a way of thinking critically in business.
motivation.author: Sidney Harman

motivation.quote: Reading is still the main way that I both learn new things and test my understanding.
motivation.author: Bill Gates

motivation.quote: Show me a family of readers, and I will show you the people who move the world.
motivation.author: Napoléon Bonaparte

motivation.quote: As head of a global company, everything attracts me as a reader, books about different cultures, countries, problems. I read for pleasure and to find other perspectives on how to think or solve a problem.
motivation.author: Shelly Lazarus

motivation.quote: If you cannot read all your books…fondle them — peer into them, let them fall open where they will, read from the first sentence that arrests the eye, set them back on the shelves with your own hands, arrange them on your own plan so that you at least know where they are. Let them be your friends; let them, at any rate, be your acquaintances.
motivation.author: Winston Churchill

motivation.quote: There is more treasure in books than in all the pirate’s loot on Treasure Island.
motivation.author: Walt Disney

motivation.quote: My best friend is a person who will give me a book I have not read.
motivation.author: Abraham Lincoln

motivation.quote: Drink deeply from good books.
motivation.author: John Wooden

motivation.quote: Design is in everything we make, but it’s also between those things. It’s a mix of craft, science, storytelling, propaganda, and philosophy.
motivation.author: Erik Adigard, Communication and Experience Designer

motivation.quote: Design is where science and art break even.
motivation.author: Robin Mathew, Designer

motivation.quote: To say that something is designed means it has intentions that go beyond its function. Otherwise it’s just planning.
motivation.author: Ayse Birsel , Designer, Author and Co-founder of Birsel + Seck

motivation.quote: Design is as much a matter of finding problems as it is solving them.
motivation.author: Bryan Lawson, Author, Architect and Scholar

motivation.quote: Truly elegant design incorporates top-notch functionality into a simple, uncluttered form.
motivation.author: David Lewis, Industrial Designer

motivation.quote: Design is not just what it looks like and feels like. Design is how it works.
motivation.author: Steve Jobs

motivation.quote: Art is solving problems that cannot be formulated before they have been solved. The shaping of the question is part of the answer.
motivation.author: Pete Hein, Architect, Poet and Mathematician

motivation.quote: In a very real way, designers create the human environment; they make the things we use, the places we live and work, our modes of communication and mobility. Simply put, design matters. And at a moment in our history in which the scientific community has issued serious warnings about the negative impacts of our flawed designs-from global warming and water pollution to the loss of biodiversity and natural resources-designers have a critical role to play in the creation of a more just, healthful and sustainable world.
motivation.author: William McDonough, Architect, Designer and Author

motivation.quote: Experiences we have come to expect on mobile apps have created new standards and expectations for all digital media including the web. The result is websites are evolving to become more app-like in their rich functionality.
motivation.author: Raj Aggarwal, Cofounder of Stealth Startup

motivation.quote: End users not technologies shape the market. Consequently, marketers need to stay abreast not only of technological developments but also of the way people respond to them.
motivation.author: Matt Haig, Author of Mobile Marketing: The Message Revolution

motivation.quote: Mobile is the enabling centerpiece of digital convergence. Mobile is the glue for all other digital industries to use when approaching convergence, but mobile is also the digital gateway for the real world to join in this global metamorphosis of human behavior.
motivation.author: Tomi Ahonen, Author, Consultant and Motivational Speaker

motivation.quote: Good design is obvious. Great design is transparent.
motivation.author: Joe Sparano, Designer and Teacher

motivation.quote: The public is more familiar with bad design than good design. It is, in effect, conditioned to prefer bad design, because that is what it lives with. The new becomes threatening, the old reassuring.
motivation.author: Paul Rand, Art Director and Graphic Designer

motivation.quote: You can have an art experience in front of a Rembrandt… or in front of a piece of graphic design.
motivation.author: Stefan Sagmeister, Designer at Sagmeister & Walsh

motivation.quote: A designer knows he has achieved perfection not when there is nothing left to add, but when there is nothing left to take away.
motivation.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

motivation.quote: I’m convinced that without bad design, the world would be a far less stimulating place; we would have nothing to marvel over and nothing to be nostalgic about.
motivation.author: Carrie Phillips

motivation.quote: The alternative to good design is always bad design. There is no such thing as no design.
motivation.author: Adam Judge, Author of "The Little Black Book of Design

motivation.quote: Just because something looks good doesn’t mean it’s useful. And just because something is useful does not make it beautiful.
motivation.author: Joshua Brewer, Co-founder and CEO of Abstract

motivation.quote: Designers think everything done by someone else is awful, and that they could do it better themselves, which explains why I designed my own living room carpet, I suppose.
motivation.author: Chris Bangle, Automobile Designer

motivation.quote: What works good is better than what looks good, because what works good lasts.
motivation.author: Ray Eames, Designer

motivation.quote: Designers love subtle cues, because subtlety is one of the traits of sophisticated design. But Web users are generally in such a hurry that they routinely miss subtle cues.
motivation.author: Steve Krug, Author and UX Professional

motivation.quote: The next big thing is the one that makes the last big thing usable.
motivation.author: Blake Ross, Software Engineer

motivation.quote: A Design isn’t finished until somebody is using it.
motivation.author: Brenda Laurel, Scholar, Author and Researcher

motivation.quote: If you do good work for good clients, it will lead to other good work for other good clients. If you do bad work for bad clients, it will lead to other bad work for other bad clients.
motivation.author: Michael Bierut, Designer and Educator

motivation.quote: I’ve never had a problem with a dumb client. There is no such thing as a bad client. Part of our job is to do good work and get the client to accept it.
motivation.author: Bob Gill, Illustrator and Graphic Designer

motivation.quote: If you think it’s expensive to hire a professional to do the job, wait until you hire an amateur.
motivation.author: Red Adair, Oil Well Firefighter

motivation.quote: The role of the designer is that of a good, thoughtful host anticipating the needs of his guests.
motivation.author: Charles Eames, Designer

motivation.quote: The customers, the visitors, the patients, the readers, the guests, whatever you call them — their experience is what determines the company’s success or failure. So focus first on the overall experience. It’s strategic, not tactical. It’s about the people, not the tool. Focusing on the larger picture first will set a better context in which to work — later — on usability tactics.
motivation.author: Mark Hurst, Founder and CEO of Creative Good

motivation.quote: Pay attention to what users do, not what they say
motivation.author: Jakob Nielsen, Usability Expert, Co-Founder and Principal of the Nielsen-Norman Group

motivation.quote: You have to start with the customer experience and work your way back to technology.
motivation.author: Steve Jobs

motivation.quote: Art must not be concentrated in dead shrines called museums. It must be spread everywhere — on the streets, in the trams, factories, workshops, and in the workers’ homes.
motivation.author: Vladimir Mayakovsky, Artist, Writer and Actor

motivation.quote: Each color lives by its mysterious life.
motivation.author: Wassily Kandinsky, Painter and Art Critic

motivation.quote: The conception of ‘artistic work’ presupposes a distinction between useful and useless work and as there are only a few artists, buyers can be found even for their useless products. The artist’s work lies beyond the boundaries of the useful and the useless.
motivation.author: El Lissitzky, Artist, Typographer and Architect

motivation.quote: I prefer drawing to talking. Drawing is faster, and leaves less room for lies.
motivation.author: Le Corbusier, Architect, Urban Planner and Designer

motivation.quote: Painting is poetry that is seen rather than felt, and poetry is painting that is felt rather than seen.
motivation.author: Leonardo da Vinci

motivation.quote: I am always doing that which I cannot do, in order that I may learn how to do it.
motivation.author: Pablo Picasso

motivation.quote: It’s through mistakes that you actually can grow. You have to get bad in order to get good.
motivation.author: Paula Scher, Designer and Partner at Pentagram

motivation.quote: It took me a few seconds to draw it, but it took me 34 years to learn how to draw it in a few seconds.
motivation.author: Paula Scher

motivation.quote: Love blinds us. Don’t love anything — an idea, a tool, a graphic, a technique, a technology, a client, or a colleague — too much.
motivation.author: Adam Judge

motivation.quote: You can’t depend on your eyes when your imagination is out of focus.
motivation.author: Mark Twain

motivation.quote: Every great design begins with an even better story.
motivation.author: Lorinda Mamo, Designer, Blogger and Interior Stylist

motivation.quote: Accidents often produce the best solutions. Only you can recognize the difference between an accident and your original intent.
