motivation.quote: Deep Can’t wait for the day that somebody tells me I’m the best thing that’s ever happened to them and they mean it.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: Deep Be with someone who is proud to have you.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: Deep Just let things play out, what’s supposed to happen will happen.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: Deep No matter what knocks you down in life, get back up and keep going. Never give up. Great blessings are a result of great perseverance.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: Deep Heal yourself, first. The rest will come later.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: Deep Sometimes it is far braver to break.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: Deep I’m okay with knowing nothing in life is handed to me. Everything I receive is a direct result of my actions.
motivation.author: Reyna Biddy

motivation.quote: Deep I can be someone’s and still be on my own.
motivation.author: Shel Silverstein

motivation.quote: Deep Life only comes around once, so do what makes you happy and be with people who make you smile.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: Deep Everything happens for a reason. People change so you can learn to let go. Things go wrong so you can appreciate them when they go right.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: Deep One of the keys to healthy conscious relationships is being more concerned with someone’s happiness than what they can do for you.
motivation.author: Maryam Hasnaa

motivation.quote: You don’t lose when you push away the wrong people. There’s some people you truly need to take out and keep out of your life.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: Be mindful of how you treat people. Be mindful of how you handle things. Be mindful of your intentions. Be. Mindful.
motivation.author: Alex Elle

motivation.quote: You may be sad, disappointed, heartbroken or even scarred. But wake each day with a new sense of hope, a will to fight on and not give up.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: This year I only want to be around the people that love me, not the people that pretend they do.
motivation.author: Author Unknown

motivation.quote: I’ve learned more about myself in solitude. I’ve both driven myself crazy and found peace. I’ve realized the power in just letting things be.
motivation.author: Reyna Biddy

motivation.quote: Selfish people cannot understand what compromising is in a relationship neither will they ever see why it’s necessary in the relationship.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: The holidays can make many people feel isolated and very alone. Know that you are loved and supported even if it doesn’t feel that way.
motivation.author: Bri Luna

motivation.quote: Work on being in love with the person in the mirror who has been through so much but is still standing.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: Who you spend your time with will have a great impact on what kind of life you live. Spend time with the right people.
motivation.author: Joel Osteen

motivation.quote: Today is a new day, don’t let the lows of yesterday prevent you from enjoying the highs of today.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: Deep I will not beg you for your time or try to convince you to choose me, the world is too big and I have too much to offer.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: Deep The truth may be hard to embrace when your mind’s been telling you something else for years. Fight hard to overcome the lies you live.
motivation.author: Jerry Corsten

motivation.quote: Deep It’s okay to restart and recreate. Don’t spend time beating yourself up over something that went wrong. There’s always another chance.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: Deep Fear is a natural byproduct of change. It takes time to get familiar with new thoughts and situations. Don’t let it stop you from changing.
motivation.author: Jerry Corsten

motivation.quote: Deep Anyone who truly cares about you will always find a way back to you.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: Deep When you’re in love, truly in love, you never have to question it.
motivation.author: Michael Faudet

motivation.quote: Deep Life is too short to worry about what people who exist in a free app in your phone think of you.
motivation.author: Debra Lynne

motivation.quote: Deep When you build in silence… they don’t know what to attack.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: Deep You are under no obligation to be the same person you were a year, month, or even 15 minutes ago. You have the right to grow. No apologies.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: Deep You always have the choice to be happy. Learn to understand the purpose of bumps in the road, grow from them and stay positive.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: Deep Be thankful for the hard times. They are heaven sent to teach you lessons, make you stronger, and ultimately lead you to a better destiny.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: Deep Nothing is a coincidence. Everything you’re experiencing is meant to happen exactly how it’s happening. Embrace the lessons. Be grateful.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: Deep Some people just like to take without even giving anything in return. Be aware of who you let into your life and why they’re there.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: Deep I could drive around all night with someone, listening to music, talking about life and be perfectly satisfied with my night.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: Live for yourself and don’t ever stop.
motivation.author: John Tew

motivation.quote: You are so much more than what you are going through.
motivation.author: John Tew

motivation.quote: You are both the problem AND the solution.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: Deep Whatever is worrying you right now, forget about it. Take a deep breath, stay positive and know that things will get better.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: Deep Don’t wish for other people’s misfortune. Wish for your and their well being. What’s on your mind either contaminates or heals your mind.
motivation.author: Jerry Corsten

motivation.quote: Deep Be prepared to let go of familiar faces throughout your journey. Be ready to let go of anyone who doesn’t clap for you the way you clap for them.
motivation.author: Reyna Biddy

motivation.quote: Strong women still need their hands held.
motivation.author: dauvoire

motivation.quote: Deep It’s natural to be upset when faced with hardship. But try to pull yourself together. Your efforts won’t go to waste.
motivation.author: Mufti Menk

motivation.quote: Deep Everyone is breakable, but not everyone is aware that it’s a choice to stay broken.
motivation.author: Stanley Behrman

motivation.quote: Deep No matter how painful or long the process is, it’s so beautiful and amazing seeing people being shamelessly authentic with themselves.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: Deep Anything that costs you your peace is too expensive….learn to let it go.
motivation.author: Author Unknown

motivation.quote: Deep Stop worrying about someone that isn’t worried about you.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: Deep Never let anyone to tell you that you need to be positive all the time; you are not a robot.
motivation.author: Paulo Coelho

motivation.quote: Live Life Happy: A soulmate is someone who appreciates your level of weird.
motivation.author: Bill Murray

motivation.quote: Live Life Happy: Being in love means being yourself. So when you find someone who accepts and appreciates you for who and what you are, never let them go.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: Live Life Happy: Nobody can block the blessings you deserve to experience in your life. What’s for you is for you. There’s no competition or worry. Just trust.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: Live Life Happy: Travel the world. Understand different cultures. Be inspired by beauty everywhere. Make friends all over. Be a citizen of the world.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: Live Life Happy: Things didn’t work out because, well, greater things were in the works. It’s so difficult while we’re blind and hurting and don’t know which way is up. But, if you have faith in anything, have faith in the fact that the universe has a beautiful way of straightening things out far better than we ever could. You may not see it today or tomorrow, but you will look back in a few years and be absolutely perplexed and awed by how every little thing added up and brought you somewhere wonderful– or where you always wanted to be. You will be grateful that things didn’t work out the way you once wanted them to.
motivation.author: Brianna Wiest

motivation.quote: Live Life Happy: Loving yourself starts with liking yourself, which starts with respecting yourself, which starts with thinking of yourself in positive ways.
motivation.author: Jerry Corsten

motivation.quote: Live Life Happy: Don’t give your energy away to toxic people.
motivation.author: Robert Tew

motivation.quote: Live Life Happy: Everything in this world is easier said than done, nothing worth having comes easily, stop making excuses and start making positive changes.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: Deep What’s for you will always be and what isn’t meant for you won’t be.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: Deep What makes you happy doesn’t need approval from anyone else.
motivation.author: TCVVX

motivation.quote: Deep Caring about everyone doesn’t require everyone to care back. Just keep doing you and spread love unconditionally.
motivation.author: Koi Fresco

motivation.quote: Live Life Happy: If you’re reading this, I hope you find the strength to get through whatever it is that’s causing you so much internal conflict.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: Live Life Happy: A person’s energy and the aura they give off never lies. Trust in that.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: Live Life Happy: Less busy, more focus. Less news, more art. Less complaint, more appreciation. Less noise, more peace. Less hate. More love.
motivation.author: Robin Sharma Poster designed by Erin Marie

motivation.quote: Live Life Happy: Just know, you won’t ever have to force what’s real. Ever.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: Live Life Happy: Sometimes the long way is the only way home.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: Live Life Happy: There are people you haven’t met yet who will love you.
motivation.author: Bella Ashlynn

motivation.quote: Live Life Happy: Allow yourself to mourn the loss of love, and heal from those wounds. Don’t run into the arms of another lover, you will not find peace there: you will only accumulate more to heal from.
motivation.author: Tara Rose

motivation.quote: Live Life Happy: Once this day is over, we can never get it back. Your time is too valuable to waste it being upset.
motivation.author: Joel Osteen

motivation.quote: Live Life Happy: No matter what you’re going through, you’re going to make it. And when you come out on the other end, you’re going to be a better person.
motivation.author: Joyce Meyer

motivation.quote: Live Life Happy: You can’t control how other people see you or think of you… and you have to be comfortable with that.
motivation.author: Helen Mirren

motivation.quote: Live Life Happy: Everything happens for a reason. That reason causes change. Sometimes it hurts. Sometimes it’s hard. But in the end it’s all for the best.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: Live Life Happy: Someone who is truly worthy of your love will build you up and encourage your passions. They won’t tear you down out of fear or insecurity.
motivation.author: Charles Orlando

motivation.quote: Live Life Happy – Dear Strong Women: You aren’t intimidating, he is intimidated. There’s a difference.
motivation.author: Charles Orlando

motivation.quote: Live Life Happy
motivation.author: Reminder: Don’t let people bring you down.

motivation.quote: Live Life Happy: Honestly, I’m glad I met everyone in my life. The good and the bad. The good make me thankful, the bad make me learn my lessons.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: Live Life Happy: If you want to do something, then do it now, because life is short, and you never know if you’ll get that chance to do it.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: Deep People who make you feel better about yourself when you’re sad are so important.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: Deep Stop begging and fighting for people to love you the right way. Stop investing time in people who don’t mind if you stay or leave.
motivation.author: Reyna Biddy

motivation.quote: Live Life Happy: If you are reading this, I hope something amazing happens to you today. I really do.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: Live Life Happy: Do not judge, but take notice. Allow others to be, and just be…yourself.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: Live Life Happy: Don’t be afraid to fight for what you love.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: Live Life Happy: When things are going bad, don’t use that as an excuse to give up. Instead, use it as motivation to push harder. Never give up.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: Live Life Happy: Distance really knows how to test relationships.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: Live Life Happy: Believe in yourself. When you give up, you are giving up on you. If you are alive at this moment you can do anything you want to.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: Live Life Happy: We all mess up sometimes. Don’t forget all the good someone has done, just because they made a mistake. Everyone is learning and growing.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: Live Life Happy: This time, last year, everything was so different.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: Deep May you receive what you’ve been praying for.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: What’s meant for you will never miss you, and that which misses you was never meant for you.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: Stay low key. Not everyone needs to know everything about you.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: Don’t feel guilty for doing what’s best for you.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: Marry someone you want to annoy forever.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: Never did they want you more than the moment they couldn’t have you.
motivation.author: Jeff Hood

motivation.quote: Live Life Happy: I hope you attract someone who appreciates you in your entirety. I hope you’re able to dodge those that see you as a temporary blanket.
motivation.author: Billy Chapata

motivation.quote: Live Life Happy: You’re not crazy if you talk and have conversations with yourself, you’re crazy if you don’t.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: Live Life Happy: Your inner peace is the greatest and most valuable treasure that you can discover.
motivation.author: Akin Olokun

motivation.quote: Live Life Happy: Everything in moderation, including reality.
motivation.author: Julz Millar

motivation.quote: Live Life Happy: So many words were said, so little was heard.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: Live Life Happy: Life is about evolving. Don’t stay in a situation that’s not helping you grow mentally, spiritually, and emotionally.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: Live Life Happy: When you worry about what other people think of you, you give up the power to enjoy you. Your opinion of yourself is your key to happiness.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: Live Life Happy: Don’t underestimate the role you play on this planet. Without you, the world would not exist in the exact way it does.
motivation.author: Nick Susi

motivation.quote: Live Life Happy: If something feels off, most likely something is off. Trust the vibes you get.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: Live Life Happy: Go up to your friends and family tonight, give them a hug and tell them that you love them. You never know when it could be your last chance.
motivation.author: Nick Susi

motivation.quote: Deep You don’t need to fit into society or reform in order to make an impact. Be you, spread love, raise your vibrations
motivation.author: that’s what’s important.

motivation.quote: Deep Sometimes it’s better to move on than to hold on to a person who doesn’t understand you. Your absence will teach what your presence can not.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: Deep You have to be happy with your own company before you try to accompany someone else.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: Deep Leave who you were. Love who you are. Look forward to who you will become.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: Deep If someone isn’t available during your most crucial time, then their presence any other time is useless.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: Deep I love when people that have been through hell walk out of the flames carrying buckets of water for those still consumed by the fire.
motivation.author: Stephanie Sparkles

motivation.quote: Deep Understand that the universe is giving you challenges to help you to become the greatest version of yourself.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: Deep Don’t pollute your body by absorbing the negative energy around you.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: Deep Work hard for the things you want in life, shortcuts don’t always make you a winner.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: Deep Every next level of your life will demand a different version of you.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: Deep I miss how everything used to be so simple.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: Deep Life doesn’t change, but people do. So learn to accept that not everybody is who you thought you knew.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: Deep Everything that happens helps you grow, even if it’s hard to see right now.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: Deep Always be kinder than necessary. What goes around comes around. No one has ever made themselves strong by showing how small someone else is.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: Deep Old doors close so new ones can open. Don’t get stuck on what fell apart just because it hurts. Transformation requires growth and letting go.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: Live Life Happy: Always remind your loved ones that you love them. Over and over again. You just never know.
motivation.author: Reyna Biddy

motivation.quote: Live Life Happy: Don’t let your past define you, destroy you, or defeat you. Let it strengthen you.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: Live Life Happy: Positive thoughts and feelings are what make your happiness. You are in control of your happiness, always.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: Live Life Happy: It breaks my heart how well the misunderstood understands others.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: Live Life Happy: It’s amazing how 3 minutes with the wrong person feels like an eternity, yet 3 hours with the right one, feels like only a moment.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: Live Life Happy: Don’t fight, resist, or avoid the changes that are happening in your life. Learn to allow and let go, so blessings can start flowing to you.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: Live Life Happy: Never pay for anything with your self-respect.
motivation.author: Jeff Hood

motivation.quote: Live Life Happy: If they take way more than they give, they shouldn’t be in your life.
motivation.author: Robert Tew

motivation.quote: Live Life Happy: If you can’t find a reason to laugh every day, you’re taking life too seriously.
motivation.author: Koi Fresco

motivation.quote: Live Life Happy: If you died tomorrow, would you be happy with where you are today?
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: Live Life Happy: Being told you’re appreciated is one of the simplest and most uplifting things you can hear.
motivation.author: Sue Fitzmaurice

motivation.quote: Live Life Happy: Surround yourself with people who appreciate you for you.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: Live Life Happy: Sometimes you just have to appreciate where you are. You came a long way and you’re still learning and growing. Be grateful for the lessons.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: Live Life Happy: There’s no such thing as a coincidence. Notice how every major event in your life somehow leads up to the next.. it’s all connected.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: Live Life Happy: Sometimes you want to protect someone who doesn’t care about you, while there’s another person quietly protecting you.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: Deep Consistent progress. Learn and improve every day. You’ll always look back and be thankful for the effort that you put into yourself.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: Deep Find someone who will love your soul more than your body.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: Quote – It is impossible for your relationship with your partner to be any better than your relationship with yourself.
motivation.author: Neil Strauss

motivation.quote: Quote – Not everyone will understand your path, but that’s okay. They’re not supposed to. Your path is the one you create for yourself, not for them.
motivation.author: Koi Fresco

motivation.quote: The good news is I survived knowing you. The bad news is… you were something I had to survive.
motivation.author: Fortesa Latifi

motivation.quote: Quote – Let us be grateful to people who make us happy.
motivation.author: Marcel Proust

motivation.quote: Some people we just outgrow. Relationships might end with no real explanation as to why. And when that happens, respect the shift. Honor the growth and understand that not all roots can stay planted in the same soil forever.
motivation.author: Alex Elle

motivation.quote: No one has your experiences, the order of those experiences, your relationships, your perspective, your talents, and your drive.
motivation.author: Mary Karr

motivation.quote: Whatever you may be missing right now – a person, a place, a feeling, maybe you are injured and missing running – whatever it is, have peace and take heart – remember that any goodbye makes room for a hello.
motivation.author: Kristin Armstrong

motivation.quote: My dear, our souls met long before our eyes did.
motivation.author: a.p.

motivation.quote: I knew better, but I did it anyway.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: Deep Give yourself something to look forward to that isn’t a person.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: Stop torturing yourself over things that don’t matter. Let it go.
motivation.author: Alice Brockes

motivation.quote: Go, because you want to. Because wanting to leave is enough.
motivation.author: Cheryl Strayed

motivation.quote: Being single doesn’t mean there’s anything wrong with you.
motivation.author: Kate Bolick

motivation.quote: I’ve been ignoring everyone lately. Don’t hate me, I just have no energy.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: Do not drown in your own emotions. Take a breather, regain your strength, do not let what worries, control you.
motivation.author: Leon Brown

motivation.quote: Stop entertaining arguments and drama. A person cannot argue unless you’re arguing back. So, hush and let them fight with themselves.
motivation.author: Heather Lindsey

motivation.quote: Don’t lose your hunger. Stay focused. Keep grinding until something happens.
motivation.author: Robert Tew

motivation.quote: I never would have thought that things could change so much in only a year. I wonder what next December will be like.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: In the midst of your struggles, you WILL find a reason to keep going. Don’t give up!
motivation.author: Robert Tew

motivation.quote: Be with someone who looks at you like Kate Winslet looks at Leonardo DiCaprio receiving his Oscar.
motivation.author: misjudgments

motivation.quote: Live Life Happy: Souls recognize each other not by the way they look, but by the way they feel.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: Live Life Happy: Stay weird. Stay different. Have fun.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: Be good to everybody; be kind, be sincere, be considerate. You never know who you’ll see on the way up, or on the way down.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: Once you bring kids into the world, it’s not about you anymore.
motivation.author: Tony Gaskins

motivation.quote: Mark me like a passage from your favorite book, then open me there again and again.
motivation.author: Tammy Brewer

motivation.quote: The most destructive thing I’ve ever done was believe someone else’s opinion of me.
motivation.author: Teal Blue Jay

motivation.quote: Live Life Happy: Talking to someone with an open mind is seriously one of my favorite things because there’s never an end to what you can talk about and learn.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: Live Life Happy: Give people time. Give people space. Don’t beg anyone to stay. Let them roam. What’s meant for you will always be yours.
motivation.author: Reyna Biddy

motivation.quote: Live Life Happy: Sometimes you have to take your own advice and apply it to your own problems.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: Live Life Happy: We have enough in life against us already, don’t be against yourself.
motivation.author: Joel Osteen

motivation.quote: Live Life Happy: Tell her why you love her. Not how much you love her.
motivation.author: Jeff Hood

motivation.quote: Let’s raise children who won’t have to recover from their childhoods.
motivation.author: Pam Leo

motivation.quote: Some days are like this. And the only way to get through them is to remember that they are only one day, and that every day ends.
motivation.author: David Levithan

motivation.quote: Proud of all the things I’ve outgrown that once weighed me down, the people as well.
motivation.author: Ambera Dedic

motivation.quote: Never be ashamed of how much you love, or how quickly you fall. Love fully, love completely, but most importantly, love naturally – and don’t you ever apologize for it. Don’t ever be sorry for loving the way your heart knows how.
motivation.author: D.W.

motivation.quote: Live Life Happy: Shoutout to the people who go through a lot everyday and still manage to keep their cool. I see you.
motivation.author: Brandon Nembhard

motivation.quote: Live Life Happy: Quit listening to other people’s opinions when it comes to you. It’s not how everyone else views you, but how you view yourself.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: Live Life Happy: I water you, you water me; we grow together.
motivation.author: Brandon Nembhard

motivation.quote: Live Life Happy: You. Are. Worthy. Stop saying that you are too old, or too damaged, or too fat, or too broke… just STOP.
motivation.author: Charles Orlando

motivation.quote: Live Life Happy: Texting is a brilliant way to miscommunicate how you feel, and misinterpret what other people mean.
motivation.author: Stanley Behrman

motivation.quote: Anyone who isn’t adding positivity to your life, shouldn’t be in it.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: Live Life Happy: Once you learn how to create your own happiness, no one can take it from you.
motivation.author: Robert Tew

motivation.quote: If you expect something in return for being a nice person, you aren’t a nice person.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: Be with someone who looks at you like they look at a menu.
motivation.author: misjudgments

motivation.quote: One day you’ll be at the place you always wanted to be.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: Breathe. You’re going to be okay. This pain you feel is going to pass. Maybe not this moment or today or tomorrow, but sometime soon. The hurt will fade. Don’t give up before things get better. You may be wounded, but you aren’t broken. You can and will heal.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: Many people don’t know this, but it’s possible to read something you don’t agree with on the internet and simply move on with your life.
motivation.author: Michael Rock

motivation.quote: Everything heals. Your heart heals. The mind heals. Wounds heal. Your happiness is always going to come back. Bad times don’t last.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: Live Life Happy: Next time I lose my mind I swear I’m not even going to look for it anymore.
motivation.author: Sue Fitzmaurice

motivation.quote: Live Life Happy: Pay attention to the quiet ones, because they’re the ones that pay attention to you when everyone else is gone.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: Live Life Happy: Nothing in life is ever random. Everything that happens is supposed to happen. Trust the process.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: Live Life Happy: Having more than you need is a blessing, but only the ones that are willing to share truly appreciate that they are blessed.
motivation.author: Stanley Behrman

motivation.quote: Live Life Happy: I want to know the person you are when you’re alone. Just being you. Alive inside your mind.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: Live Life Happy: It’s amazing what you can do when you stop worrying about failing.
motivation.author: Anne Sweeney

motivation.quote: Do not define your identity based on the lowest points in your life.
motivation.author: Mike Cernovich

motivation.quote: You lose a lot of people when you’re focusing on yourself. Find no shame in evolving.
motivation.author: Billy Chapata

motivation.quote: Inspirational Accomplishing goals in silence.
motivation.author: Billy Chapata

motivation.quote: The ones with power doubt themselves.
motivation.author: Khensu Neferhetep

motivation.quote: If you truly mattered to them, they would not have set up every obstacle between you and the knowledge of yourself.
motivation.author: Khensu Neferhetep

motivation.quote: Deep It may get worse before it gets better, but it will get better.
motivation.author: Mike Rawlings

motivation.quote: Valentine’s Day To all the people who refuse to settle and are spending today alone, enjoy your day and treat yourself. When it’s right, you’ll know.
motivation.author: Skye Townsend

motivation.quote: You know you’ve changed when what once would make you mad, now makes you laugh.
motivation.author: Tony Gaskins

motivation.quote: One of the main reasons people don’t end toxic relationships is because they’re afraid to be alone. There’s a deep-seated fear in many that to be alone is to be a failure, to be lost. If they don’t have their partner, a partner, any partner, they have no plans, no aspirations, no dates to keep. They identify as being one half of a whole, rather than being whole all by themselves. I prefer to be a complete individual, first.
motivation.author: Colin Wright

motivation.quote: Don’t be afraid to distance yourself from everyone and everything – and recoup. Sort out your thoughts. Listen to your heart. Breathe. Read a book. Write about how much your life has sucked – then write about how much you can’t wait to see the positive changes. Relearn yourself. Accept all the hurt you’ve been through. Forgive anyone and everyone who’s hurt you. Even if that means doing it within, and never physically or verbally reaching out. Let go and rejuvenate. Take a step away from the chaos, and find peace within.
motivation.author: Reyna Biddy

motivation.quote: Be true to who you are. Today. And everyday.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: By letting go of the wrong relationship, you give the right person a chance to enter your life.
motivation.author: Charles Orlando

motivation.quote: She knows she is lonely, yet she has no problem with it. She prefers to spend her time alone instead of dealing with people’s lies and games.
motivation.author: Hazel Ozbek

motivation.quote: What they say is great. But it’s what they do that counts.
motivation.author: Charles Orlando

motivation.quote: You deserve to be happy. You deserve to be emotionally spoiled. Stay away from anyone who only cares to make you happy in their convenience.
motivation.author: Reyna Biddy

motivation.quote: Smile more, worry less, be happy.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: You cannot make everyone think and feel as deeply as you do. This is your tragedy, because you understand them, but they do not understand you.
motivation.author: Daniel Saint

motivation.quote: Let it go, let it leave, let it happen. Nothing in this world was promised or belonged to you anyway.
motivation.author: Rupi Kaur

motivation.quote: It’s like you have to be strong for everyone else, but you keep forgetting about yourself.
motivation.author: Hazel Hira Ozbek

motivation.quote: It’s time to let go of the past and embrace all that awaits you. Value your time, and make your present moment the most precious.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: Trust your instincts. Often times what you felt first is what carries you when everything else fails.
motivation.author: Malanda Jean-Claude

motivation.quote: Everyone’s looking for the love of their life, but rarely does anyone set out to be the love of someone else’s life.
motivation.author: Scott DeLong

motivation.quote: Break-up: The event that occurs when the Universe takes away what you think you want so you can receive what you actually need.
motivation.author: Charles Orlando

motivation.quote: I pray that everything works out in my favor and a list of blessings continue to come my way.
motivation.author: Moriet

motivation.quote: Be the hardest working person you can be. That’s how you separate yourself from the competition.
motivation.author: Stephen Curry

motivation.quote: Most of the things people worry about never happen.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: When you know your own value you only put up with other people’s bullshit for so long.
motivation.author: Sue Fitzmaurice

motivation.quote: Care for yourself and people around you and life wont just be worth living, it’ll be worth dying for. Love yourself. Love others. Just love.
motivation.author: Chris O’flyng

motivation.quote: Don’t limit your view on life by a past experience.
motivation.author: Ernest Holmes

motivation.quote: I remember the days I prayed for the things I have now.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: Life is tough, my darling, but so are you.
motivation.author: Stephanie Bennett-Henry

motivation.quote: People are more important than things.
motivation.author: Randy Pausch

motivation.quote: It is okay to want your own happiness. It’s okay to care about yourself the most. You are not obligated to sit there and smile and swallow every bit of shit everyone heaps on you. You are more than furniture, you’re more than window dressing, you’re not their shiny toy. You’re human, and you have the right to say "That was shitty of you". You have a right to protest your own mistreatment and set boundaries for respectful interactions. The rest of the world doesn’t realize you have this right, and they will act offended and appalled when you exercise it, but it is yours.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: You’ll have moments when you feel like a lion, and moments when you feel like a mouse. Just know that no matter how you feel, you still have a heartbeat and a soul worthy of love, so learn to roar even when you feel small, because you are more than the feelings you may have.
motivation.author: T.B. LaBerge

motivation.quote: Note to self: If you were able to believe in Santa Claus for 8 years, you can believe in yourself for like 5 seconds. Okay, you got this!
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: Being single is smarter, easier, and more fulfilling than being in the wrong relationship.
motivation.author: Charles Orlando

motivation.quote: Those who desire love try to find their soulmate. Those who desire happiness find themselves… and then their soulmate finds them."
motivation.author: Charles Orlando

motivation.quote: Be proud of your pain, for you are stronger than those with none.
motivation.author: Lois Lowry

motivation.quote: The key to a woman’s heart is to accept her for precisely who she is—without conditions, judgments, or wishing she would change.
motivation.author: Charles Orlando

motivation.quote: I don’t like to feel so crazy about someone. I don’t like to feel like my happiness is so tied up in another person.
motivation.author: Gabrielle Zevin

motivation.quote: Here is the simple truth about people: Love the ones you want to keep.
motivation.author: Iain Thomas

motivation.quote: In the end all that matters is that you give your best, do not compare yourself with others, just give what comes natural.
motivation.author: Leon Brown

motivation.quote: It’s better to be alone than to allow someone else to split your self-worth into pieces, and watch you recollect yourself again.
motivation.author: Izien Ovbiagele

motivation.quote: So many men think women want money, cars, and gifts. But the right woman wants a man’s time, effort, passion, honesty, loyalty, smile, and him choosing to put her as his priority.
motivation.author: Charles Orlando

motivation.quote: Shout out to those who are having a hard time right now. This is only temporary.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: Don’t lose yourself trying to be everything to everyone.
motivation.author: Tony Gaskins

motivation.quote: If you want better for your life, you can have it. Make a decision. Then take action. It’s never too late.
motivation.author: Tony Gaskins

motivation.quote: You’re a beautiful combination of stardust and ocean waves, you are human and it’s okay to mess up.
motivation.author: Katherine Murphy

motivation.quote: Never make fun of someone’s passion because that’s the thing that saves them from the world.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: Sometimes, you don’t need a reason for doing everything in your life. Do it because you want to. Because it’s fun. Because it makes you happy.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: Find balance in your life. Work hard but don’t let work take over your life, you will lose yourself. Love, but love for the right reasons. Life is too short for anything mediocre. Know who you are and know that you are worthy of reaching your dreams and that it is never too late to start creating that life you have always dreamed of. Do not compare yourself to others, that’s just deadly. No two souls are the same. You are your own person, you are beautiful and you are unique. Put your trust in the universe. Some things are just meant to happen, and some are not. Let go of whatever is stealing your happiness, it’s hard but it is worth it. Embrace change. Embrace life. Everything happens for a reason, sometimes you just need to breathe, trust and let go.
motivation.author: Charlotte Freeman

motivation.quote: Never take them for granted. No matter how much someone loves you, everyone has their limit of feeling unappreciated.
motivation.author: Charles Orlando

motivation.quote: People are meant to be part of your world; not the center of your universe.
motivation.author: Leidy Vazquez

motivation.quote: You need to be content with small steps. That’s all life is. Small steps that you take every day so when you look back down the road it all adds up and you know you covered some distance. It took me a long time to accept that, but it’s true. You need to have patience.
motivation.author: Katie Kacvinsky

motivation.quote: Like a wild flower; she spent her days, allowing herself to grow, not many knew of her struggle, but eventually all; knew of her light.
motivation.author: Nikki Rowe

motivation.quote: I grasped two things: I wasn’t as happy as I could be, and my life wasn’t going to change unless I made it change.
motivation.author: Gretchen Rubin

motivation.quote: If you really love someone, time and distance will not make you forget them.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: You attract what you put out. Be mindful.
motivation.author: Alexandra Elle

motivation.quote: A real man only lies to his woman when he’s surprising her.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: Listen closely: the only time it’s too late to change yourself is when you’re dead. Until then, you’re simply making excuses or lying to yourself.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: Don’t question what you feel when your heart knows it’s real.
motivation.author: #LLH

motivation.quote: Life is only as good as your mindset.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: Even the smallest lie can break the biggest trust.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: I’ll be amazed when I meet someone who thinks like me.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: All good things take time.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: I want to grow with you, to see how much we can thrive together. I want to help you fight for your dreams, and see them come to life. I want to be there for you, when it all seems too much, I want to be the voice that reminds you of hope. I want to make you smile and laugh, to experience joy every day. I want to be real with you, to open myself and lay down my armor. I want quiet nights, filled with sweet nothings. I want days filled with you, and I want to continue seeing you, in your weakest or in your strongest, I want to be there with you.
motivation.author: T.B. LaBerge

motivation.quote: Don’t listen to the crowd. Listen to your own soul.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: No decision will pay off more than prioritizing your life and giving extreme focus and energy to the things with the highest return.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: Instead of getting angry, just let go. You’re only hurting yourself if you don’t.
motivation.author: Robert Tew

motivation.quote: Stop stressing over it, just let it be, everything will be okay.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: Learn how to be a critical thinker without having a critical heart.
motivation.author: Sarah Bessey

motivation.quote: Happiness looks beautiful on you.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: When it feels scary to jump, that’s exactly when you jump. Otherwise you end up staying in the same place your whole life. And that I can’t do.
motivation.author: Abel Morales

motivation.quote: And every day, the world will drag you by the hand, yelling, "This is important! And this is important! And this is important! You need to worry about this! And this! And this!" And each day, it’s up to you to yank your hand back, put it on your heart and say, "No. This is what’s important."
motivation.author: Iain Thomas

motivation.quote: Getting over it doesn’t mean forgetting it, it just means reducing the pain to a tolerable level, a level that doesn’t destroy you.
motivation.author: Kevin Brooks

motivation.quote: I don’t want to be the other half of your soul. I want to be the one who reminds you that you’re already whole.
motivation.author: G.S.

motivation.quote: Know who you are. Know what you want. Know what you deserve. And don’t settle for less.
motivation.author: Tony Gaskins

motivation.quote: So many people in this world have trust issues because people say "I’m here for you" and then run away as soon as things start to fall apart.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: Maturity is being able to have your opinions and beliefs challenged, without feeling personally challenged or attacked.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: We all make mistakes. We have to simply remember to forgive ourselves and keep moving forward in order to progress.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: Some days are tougher than others, many times stress can seem insurmountable. Hang in there, never give up, and always be proud of YOU.
motivation.author: John Cena

motivation.quote: Sometimes, we have to fight for what we love and care about. Other times, we have to find the courage to let go of the things we love most.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: Don’t see bad things as problems, see them as lessons. Maybe without them, you wouldn’t learn and grow.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: When a flower doesn’t bloom you fix the environment in which it grows, not the flower.
motivation.author: Alexander Den Heijer

motivation.quote: You can do 99 things for someone and all they’ll remember is the one thing you didn’t do.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: Owning your story is the bravest thing you will ever do.
motivation.author: Brené Brown

motivation.quote: My heart is at ease knowing that what is meant for me will never miss me, and that which misses me was never meant for me.
motivation.author: Imam al-Shafi’i

motivation.quote: Patience is everything when blessings are coming your way.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: Sometimes you gotta unfollow people in real life.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: Pick my brain. Ask me about my views on something. Dig deeper than the obvious. Let’s make each other think. Show me a different perspective.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: No matter how much you tell yourself your over someone, your heart always knows the truth.
motivation.author: Lauren Barnholdt

motivation.quote: Certain people and their toxic energy can block you from expanding, elevating and vibrating higher. Detach and protect your energy.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: Before I used to be afraid of being alone. Now, I’m afraid of having the wrong people as company.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: I learned that people leave. Even if they’ve promised a thousand times that they won’t.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: The relationship you have with yourself is the most important relationship of your life.
motivation.author: Diane Von Furstenberg

motivation.quote: Deep You don’t deserve what you don’t respect.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: Deep Remember, most of your stress comes from the way you respond, not the way life is. Adjust your attitude, and all that extra stress is gone.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: Deep Develop a strong opinion about yourself so that you don’t accidentally start believing what others say about you.
motivation.author: Akin Olokun

motivation.quote: I’ve decided to make myself strong. As far as I can tell, that’s all I can do.
motivation.author: Haruki Murakami

motivation.quote: You must learn to let go. Release the stress. You were never in control anyway.
motivation.author: Steve Maraboli

motivation.quote: We may run, walk, stumble, drive, or fly, but let us never lose sight of the reason for the journey, or miss a chance to see a rainbow on the way.
motivation.author: Gloria Gaither

motivation.quote: If you want to change somebody’s life, give them something that changes their day first.
motivation.author: Pat Flynn

motivation.quote: If you’re bored, you haven’t been looking at life closely enough.
motivation.author: Leo Babauta

motivation.quote: Being a successful person is not necessarily defined by what you have achieved, but by what you have overcome.
motivation.author: Fannie Flagg

motivation.quote: The best people all have some kind of scar.
motivation.author: Kiera Cass

motivation.quote: If you want to reach out for something new, you must first let go of what’s in your hand.
motivation.author: Sonia Choquette

motivation.quote: If you lost it, it’s because you’re meant to find something better. Trust, let go, and make room for what’s coming.
motivation.author: Mandy Hale

motivation.quote: Think of what makes you smile, makes you happy… and do more of that stuff.
motivation.author: Steve Maraboli

motivation.quote: When you’re as old as I am, my young friend, now is all you’ve got.
motivation.author: Leonardo Da Vinci

motivation.quote: It’s time for you to live your own life without worrying about the expectations of others.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: You’re not over it if it still makes you angry.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: Never waste an opportunity to express your love to someone, because another opportunity is something life can’t promise.
motivation.author: Trent Shelton

motivation.quote: No matter the situation, never let your emotions overpower your intelligence.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: You need to realize that the way you are feeling now will not be permanent.
motivation.author: r.h.

motivation.quote: You’ll be fine. Feeling unsure and lost is part of your path. Don’t avoid it. See what those feelings are showing you and use it. Take a deep breath. You’ll be okay. Even if you don’t feel okay all the time.
motivation.author: Louis C.K.

motivation.quote: If you don’t let go of the wrong people, the right people won’t show up. You have to make the first move.
motivation.author: Joel Osteen

motivation.quote: Stay single until someone actually complements your life in a way that makes it better not to be single. If not, it’s not worth it.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: Give people high fives just for getting out of bed. Being a person is hard sometimes.
motivation.author: Kid President

motivation.quote: Your relationship with you sets the tone for every other relationship you have."
motivation.author: Carol M. Barrett

motivation.quote: If someone wants to be with you, NOTHING will stop them from doing so. Love doesn’t create excuses.
motivation.author: Trenton Shelton

motivation.quote: Get comfortable with being alone. It will empower you.
motivation.author: Jonathan Tropper

motivation.quote: Everybody isn’t your friend. Just because they hang around you and laugh with you doesn’t mean they are your friend. People pretend well. At the end of the day, real situations expose fake people, so pay attention."
motivation.author: Trent Shelton

motivation.quote: Your habitual thoughts will determine your future. Always be mindful of the energy that you bring into your life. Think positively.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: Better alone than badly accompanied.
motivation.author: Candance Bushnell

motivation.quote: The best project you’ll ever work on is YOU.
motivation.author: Sonny Franco

motivation.quote: I admire people who choose to smile after all the things they’ve been through.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: There’s nothing more attractive than someone with passion for something, who looks at things positively and is always seeking to better themselves.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: A scar does not form on the dying. A scar means I survived.
motivation.author: Chris Cleave

motivation.quote: It’s scary to think that one day we’re going to have to live without our mother or father or brother or husband or wife. Or that one day we’re going to have to walk this earth without our best friend by our side, or them without us. Appreciate your loved ones while you can, because none of us are going to be here forever.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: Pay close attention to the people who don’t clap when you win.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: The more you trust your intuition, the stronger it gets. Listen.
motivation.author: Anna Taylor

motivation.quote: How someone reacts to your sadness says a lot about how long they’re going to be in your life.
motivation.author: S.Z.

motivation.quote: Forget waiting until you’re 60, retired and fading physically. Go enjoy life while you’re still healthy, young and full of curiosity.
motivation.author: Koi Fresco

motivation.quote: You can only grow if you’re willing to feel awkward and uncomfortable when you try something new.
motivation.author: Brian Tracy

motivation.quote: When you’re broken, you need to be reborn. Do not fight the pain; embrace it. Accept it. Live it. Don’t rush the process, you need to swim in the deep end for a while to build your muscles. Learn. Keep swimming. You will be stronger for it.
motivation.author: Caitlin Cooper

motivation.quote: Disappointments were not meant to destroy you. They were meant to strengthen you and give you fortitude to accomplish your destiny.
motivation.author: Joel Osteen

motivation.quote: Be nice to people on your way up because you might meet them again on your way back down.
motivation.author: Wilson Mizner

motivation.quote: I know you’re sad, so I won’t tell you ‘have a good day’. Instead, I advise you to simply ‘have a day’. Stay alive, feed yourself well, wear comfortable clothes, and don’t give up on yourself just yet. It’ll be better soon. Until then, have a day."
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: You must love her because many have tried and failed. And she wants to know that she is worthy to be loved, that she is worthy to be kept.
motivation.author: Junot Diaz

motivation.quote: Everybody you ever met in your life was brought to you for a reason.
motivation.author: Steven Aitchison

motivation.quote: So, what if, instead of thinking about solving your whole life, you just think about adding additional good things. One at a time. Just let your pile of good things grow.
motivation.author: Rainbow Rowell

motivation.quote: Success means we go to sleep at night knowing that our talents and abilities were used in a way that served others.
motivation.author: Marianne Williamson

motivation.quote: I will allow space for all the feelings my heart holds. I will not cower or hide from myself. It’s okay to feel the ugly messy things. It’s okay to feel the burning brilliance of beauty. It’s okay to feel the soft winds of happiness and the quiet bursts of loneliness. Its okay to feel it all. It’s okay to be myself, all of myself, not just the good.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: Falling in love with yourself is as beautiful as any experience of love is. It’s learning to laugh at your awkward tendencies and smile at all your quirky habits. It’s learning to be grateful for the many sides you have – confident, crazy, shy, sexy, nerdy, angry, weird, and all the rest of them. It is realizing that you’re one of a kind and that you deserve to give the world the best person you can be. Falling in love with yourself is being happy in your life and knowing that in this one moment in time, you’re beautiful simply because you are you.
motivation.author: Kovie Biakolo, Falling In Love With Yourself

motivation.quote: At some point you just have to let go of what you thought should happen and live in what is happening.
motivation.author: Heather Hepler

motivation.quote: Your peace is more important than driving yourself crazy trying to understand why something happened the way it did. Let it go.
motivation.author: Mandy Hale

motivation.quote: The pain will not go away by getting angry or bitter, it will go away when you learn to accept life’s challenges with grace and ease.
motivation.author: Leon Brown

motivation.quote: The sunrise, of course, doesn’t care if we watch it or not. It will keep on being beautiful, even if no one bothers to look at it.
motivation.author: Gene Amole

motivation.quote: A person being "too busy" is a myth. People make time for the things that are really important to them!
motivation.author: Mandy Hale

motivation.quote: She may not be the most popular or prettiest, but if you love her and she makes you smile.. what else matters?
motivation.author: Bob Marley

motivation.quote: We go through the worst to get to the best.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: I refuse to let any circumstance ruin my happiness.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: 6 Tips to Raising Your Vibration: 1. Smile 2. Move Your Body 3. Breathe With Intention 4. Have Faith 5. Do What You Love 6. Trust Your Intuition
motivation.author: David Wolfe

motivation.quote: Don’t wish it was easier, wish you were better. Don’t wish for less problems, wish for more skills. Don’t wish for less challenges, wish for more wisdom.
motivation.author: Jim Rohn

motivation.quote: Mistakes have to be made for you to find your way. Some of the most imperfect journeys create the most beautiful destinies.
motivation.author: Mandy Hale

motivation.quote: A moment of patience in a moment of anger saves you a hundred moments of regret.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: Life is worth the struggle when you look back on what you’ve lost and realize that what you have now is much greater.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: The fact that someone else loves you doesn’t rescue you from the project of loving yourself.
motivation.author: Sahaj Kohli

motivation.quote: You don’t have to force something that’s meant to be. If you have to fight and struggle too hard and too long, it’s not meant to be yours. Know when to let go.
motivation.author: Tony Gaskins

motivation.quote: My first thought in 2015 will be you.
motivation.author: Dreaming Awake

motivation.quote: If you’re searching for that one person that will change your life, take a look in the mirror.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: Love is not about sex, going on fancy dates, or showing off. It’s about being with a person who makes you happy in a way nobody else can.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: You know what’s really, powerfully sexy? A sense of humor. A taste for adventure. A healthy glow. Hips to grab on to. Openness. Confidence. Humility. Appetite. Intuition. … Smart-ass comebacks. Presence. A quick wit. Dirty jokes told by an innocent-looking lady. … A storyteller. A genius. A doctor. A new mother. A woman who realizes how beautiful she is.
motivation.author: Courtney E. Martin

motivation.quote: Bitterness is a result of clinging to negative experiences. It serves you no good, and closes the door to your future.
motivation.author: Leon Brown

motivation.quote: By BRIANNA WIEST 1. You spend too much time worried about the vapid opinions of jealous, little people. What you have to know is that nothing will define you unless you let it. You are only whoever you decide you are. You are not a democracy. There is nothing that anybody can say that will change who you are, unless you take it to heart and you let it. 2. There is no designated time for anything in your life. You don’t have to have your first kiss at any certain time, you don’t have to get married in your 20′s and you don’t have to do anything just because other people think it’s best. In fact, you will be much better off if you just do what your heart says. The day you stop caring what other people think is the day their opinions don’t mean anything, because you’re not there to give them weight. 3. What’s important is that you have to be kind to people, and you have to do your best. Learn to put other people first. Learn to not freak out over little, petty things. There are much bigger problems in life that you will one day have to worry about, and while I know your 9th grade drama seems like the be-all-end-all trust me, it’s not. 4. I know a big concern is whether or not you’re attractive, whether or not you’re fat or skinny, whether or not the music you listen to is "cool," but here’s the thing: you’re seeking an answer that doesn’t exist. You are only as much or as little of any of those things as you think you are. But what’s more important is that you have to realize that there are a thousand things that are more important than being "cool" or "beautiful." Find those things, and take pride in them instead. They won’t fade with time. 5. One of the absolute truths about life is that people will forget what you did, they will forget what you said, but they will not forget how you made them feel. I cannot stress this enough. Listen to Maya Angelou. 6. It’s okay to not be okay. You don’t have to be happy all the time. Life is not supposed to be a joy ride every single day. It’s okay to have a broken heart or hurt feelings or to be anxious or nervous. It’s resisting these things that give them their choke hold on you. Let it be a beautiful and sad part of the story, but only a page or a chapter here and there, not the whole book. One day you will realize how important these dynamics are. 7. You need to work on having a little more blind faith in things
motivation.author: yes, I know, this seems counter-intuitive to all the messages that you’re receiving from society. But there is a difference between taking control of your life by pursuing things that are important to you and learning when to let go and let whatever is supposed to be unfold by itself. It’s a little anxiety-inducing to be blindly led by the universe, but please, please take my word for it: you will be led to far greater places than you could even comprehend to take yourself. Trust it, and go with the flow babe. 8. Stop being afraid of being who you are. At the end of the day, people can hate on you as much as their little cold hearts desire, but what it should all really tell you is that there is some gaping insecurity within them that forces them to be mean to you. You are a bad ass. You are a fantastic person. You are going to do great things, even thought you don’t feel like you’re worth anything right now. Stop trying to hide who you are or cover it up because you think if people attack your armor they won’t affect who you really are. But the truth about that is you are allowing them to control your ego because you’re not in tune with your true self. 9. Learn to sit back and enjoy the ride. Immerse yourself in the joy you find in lazy Sundays. Eat your favorite foods. Do the things you love to do, and don’t feel bad because it’s not "cool" or something. You have to realize that just because your life doesn’t look like someone else’s doesn’t mean it’s less than theirs. In fact, embrace the fact that your life isn’t anything like anybody else’s, it’s personally tailored for you. So put on that suit and wear it like the beautiful woman you will one day become. 10. You don’t need love, now or ever. You will have your heart seriously broken a few times, but you know what? You’ll pick yourself right the hell up and become even more fabulous than you were before. Do not settle. If you have your own love, and by that I mean you’re okay with being with yourself and you can find happiness in your life as it is, you’ll realize that you are waiting for someone else to come and make your life worth living. But here’s the truth: people will come and go. Love will fade and reignite and you will be headed for nothing but problems if your love for someone is contingent upon what they can do for you. Embrace your independence now, and keep your head high always. There are far better things ahead than you can even imagine.

motivation.quote: Nobody looks good in their darkest hours. But it’s those hours that make us what we are.
motivation.author: Karen Marie Moning

motivation.quote: Whatever you do, good or bad, people will always have something negative to say.
motivation.author: W.H. Auden

motivation.quote: When you learn to walk confidently in your aloneness, you are ready for togetherness.
motivation.author: Mandy Hale

motivation.quote: Without standards, you’ll settle for anything. Rise up and become what you hope to attract!
motivation.author: Mandy Hale

motivation.quote: If you spend your life trying to please people or letting them control you, you may make them happy, but you’ll miss your destiny.
motivation.author: Joel Osteen

motivation.quote: You must take responsibility for your own choices and actions, for you learn nothing until you take ownership of your life.
motivation.author: Leon Brown

motivation.quote: Best friends are the people who make your problems their problems just so you don’t have to go through them alone.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: You were created to make somebody else’s life better. Somebody needs your smile. They need your love, your encouragement and your gifts.
motivation.author: Joel Osteen

motivation.quote: Understand that you own nothing. Everything that surrounds you is temporary, only the love in your heart will last forever.
motivation.author: Leon Brown

motivation.quote: Don’t allow negative people to steal your joy. When you lose your joy, you lose your strength.
motivation.author: Joel Osteen

motivation.quote: Love yourself enough to leave that toxic situation. You deserve better.
motivation.author: Thema Davis

motivation.quote: The woman who doesn’t need validation from anyone is the most feared individual on the planet.
motivation.author: Mohadesa Najumi

motivation.quote: History repeats itself endlessly for those who are unwilling to learn from the past.
motivation.author: Leon Brown

motivation.quote: The further you go, the more you have to be proud of. At the same time, in order to come a long way, you have to be behind to begin with. In the end, though, maybe it’s not how you reach a place that matters. Just that you get there at all.
motivation.author: Sarah Dessen

motivation.quote: Do the things you used to talk about doing but never did. Know when to let go and when to hold on tight. Stop rushing. Don’t be intimidated to say it like it is. Stop apologizing all the time. Learn to say no, so your yes has some oomph. Spend time with the friends who lift you up, and cut loose the ones who bring you down. Stop giving your power away. Be more concerned with being interested than being interesting. Be old enough to appreciate your freedom, and young enough to enjoy it. Finally know who you are.
motivation.author: Kristin Armstrong

motivation.quote: It is terrifying to think that one day you will trust somebody enough to let them see you naked. You will undress and remind them that you’ve stretch marks and birth marks and scars from having chicken pox when you were little and scars from all of the other things now. You will blush thousands of shades of red, painting yourself as a rose losing its petals. And that person – that person will take it all in. And I wonder if they will reassure you. But mostly, I wonder if they will even see anything worth reassuring you about. I hope they see each freckle on your back as if it’s a star and you are the whole universe to them.
motivation.author: K.P.K

motivation.quote: When something or someone is no longer bringing you up, but pulling you down—it’s time to let go. When something or someone is no longer adding to your life, but subtracting from it—it’s time to let go.
motivation.author: Mandy Hale

motivation.quote: No one has power over you unless you give it to them, you are in control of your life and your choices decide your own fate.
motivation.author: Leon Brown

motivation.quote: Don’t take anything personally. Nothing others do is because of you. What others say and do is a projection of their own reality, their own dream. When you are immune to the opinions and actions of others, you won’t be the victim of needless suffering.
motivation.author: Don Miguel Ruiz

motivation.quote: Have faith in your journey. Everything had to happen exactly as it did to get you where you’re going next!
motivation.author: Mandy Hale

motivation.quote: You’re too blessed to be stressed. Let it go and enjoy this day!
motivation.author: Joel Osteen

motivation.quote: Loneliness doesn’t come from having no one around you, but from being unable to communicate the things that are important to you.
motivation.author: Carl Jung

motivation.quote: You don’t always need a plan. Sometimes you just need to breathe, trust, let go, and see what happens.
motivation.author: Mandy Hale

motivation.quote: No matter what happens in your life… No matter how far you’re beaten down… Always, always, always get back up.
motivation.author: Mike Dillard

motivation.quote: Never underestimate your own strength. You were born for a purpose and are blessed with the power to achieve it.
motivation.author: Leon Brown

motivation.quote: The rain WILL stop, the night WILL end, the hurt WILL fade. Hope is never so lost that it can’t be found.
motivation.author: Mandy Hale

motivation.quote: Change your life today. Don’t gamble on the future, act now, without delay.
motivation.author: Simone de Beauvoir

motivation.quote: Rise above the storm and you will find the sunshine.
motivation.author: Mario Fernandez

motivation.quote: There’s something amazing about this life. The very same worldly attribute that causes us pain is also what gives us relief: Nothing here lasts. What does that mean? It means that the breathtakingly beautiful rose in my vase will wither tomorrow. It means that my youth will neglect me. But it also means that the sadness I feel today will change tomorrow. My pain will die. My laughter won’t last forever but neither will my tears. We say this life isn’t perfect. And it isn’t. It isn’t perfectly good. But, it also isn’t perfectly bad, either.
motivation.author: Yasmin Mogahed

motivation.quote: Every day, set your mind in the right direction. Find something to be grateful for.
motivation.author: Joel Osteen

motivation.quote: You’ll never change the world if you’re always worried about being liked.
motivation.author: Robin Sharma

motivation.quote: When you’re comfortable in your own skin, you’re beautiful. Confidence is the best makeup you could ever wear.
motivation.author: Mandy Hale

motivation.quote: Strange as it sounds, wealthy people often feel incomplete and empty because they have no real reference of knowing what it is like to have nothing. In the same way as shadow defines light, poverty defines wealth. For a Nepalese man who lives out in the country, an income of eight dollars a month may be the normal average. If he comes to town and sees others earning as much as $100 a month, he considers them to be rich. By contrast, however, Americans would regard themselves as below the poverty line if they made $1,000 dollars a month. In turn, they would see someone with a monthly income of $5,000 being well off. Yet many of those who make that amount and more feel they have nothing to spare when they see a homeless person in the street who may collect even less than the Nepalese man in the countryside.  So those born into very wealthy families, with free access to everything they could ever want, may not be able to appreciate their wealth at all. It may in fact become so meaningless to them that they spend it on things they really don’t need or even enjoy, except perhaps for a fleeting moment. Yet they are often very reluctant when it comes to giving part of it away to help those in need, except occasionally as donations that are tax deductible. They find no real purpose for what they own. By contrast, many people born into very poor families learn to appreciate small things as great gifts, and have a better grip on using their wealth wisely when they step into the flow of incredible abundance. They are more likely to remain humble and receptive and put their wealth to good use, both for their personal benefit and that of society. They know that poverty at an early age helps them to appreciate their life, their family, and their world.
motivation.author: Andreas Moritz

motivation.quote: Accept the situation for exactly what it is instead of trying to manipulate it into what you think it needs to be.
motivation.author: Mandy Hale

motivation.quote: Sometimes we stare so long at the wrong things, we miss out on the RIGHT thing standing right in front of us.
motivation.author: Mandy Hale

motivation.quote: Drop jealousy and envy, for they make you ugly. Be loving, be accepting, and most of all… be happy just the way you are.
motivation.author: Leon Brown

motivation.quote: Some people come into our lives and quickly go. Some stay for a while and leave footprints on our hearts and we are never ever the same.
motivation.author: Flavia Weedn

motivation.quote: When you release expectations, you are free to enjoy things for what they are instead of what you think they should be.
motivation.author: Mandy Hale

motivation.quote: If you surround yourself with positive people who build you up, the sky is the limit.
motivation.author: Joel Brown

motivation.quote: Even at your best, someone will have something negative to say. Pursue Greatness anyways!
motivation.author: Tony Gaskins

motivation.quote: Instead of obsessing over the things you can’t change, focus on what you CAN: Your attitude, mindset, and energy.
motivation.author: Mandy Hale

motivation.quote: The happiest people are those who think the most interesting thoughts. Those who decide to use leisure as a means of mental development, who love good music, good books, good pictures, good company, good conversation, are the happiest people in the world. And they are not only happy in themselves, they are the cause of happiness in others.
motivation.author: William Lyon Phelps

motivation.quote: The less you respond to rude, critical, argumentative people…the more peaceful your life will become.
motivation.author: Mandy Hale

motivation.quote: False: When things change, I will be happy. True: When I am happy, things will change.
motivation.author: Kyle Cease

motivation.quote: A healthy relationship doesn’t drag you down. It inspires you to be better.
motivation.author: Mandy Hale

motivation.quote: There is no need to change other people if we can simply accept ourselves the way we are. When we judge another person, it is not because we dislike or disprove of them, but because their behavior, opinions, or actions reflect our own feeling of not being ‘good’ enough. Likewise, when our perceived or expressed expectations of others do not meet, we criticize them in order to make the reflection of our own pain more acceptable and bearable. In truth, judgment is not real. It is never directed against anyone or anything but our own feelings of guilt and inadequacy. And that is an illusion, too.  The challenge at this time is to claim your power and hold it dear, for you are the only one who can determine your reality, now that the new energy is permeating life on Earth. It is no longer helpful to look for others to make a difference in your life. Changing yourself to please someone else is only dispersing your power for no gain. The days of spiritual and political leaders who will tell you which way to turn are gone. Unless you choose to become a spiritual slave who believes there are others greater or more spiritually advanced than you, there are simply no more Gurus or leaders to follow.
motivation.author: Andreas Moritz

motivation.quote: There comes a time when you have to plant your feet, look your fear in the face, and say "You don’t get to control me anymore."
motivation.author: Mandy Hale

motivation.quote: Let go of resentment, for it will hold you back. Do not worry about what could’ve been, what is to come is what matters.
motivation.author: Leon Brown

motivation.quote: If you don’t see your worth, you’ll always choose people who don’t see it either. When your self esteem rises, your life follows.
motivation.author: Mandy Hale

motivation.quote: Accept what is, let go of what was and have faith in what can be.
motivation.author: Sonia Ricotti

motivation.quote: Oscar Wilde said that if you know what you want to be, then you inevitably become it – that is your punishment, but if you never know, then you can be anything. There is a truth to that. We are not nouns, we are verbs. I am not a thing – an actor, a writer – I am a person who does things – I write, I act – and I never know what I am going to do next. I think you can be imprisoned if you think of yourself as a noun.
motivation.author: Stephen Fry

motivation.quote: We’re taught to believe that some people are simply born lucky, when in reality, that’s just a convenient excuse to lean back and take it easy, rather than try to apply some control over our destiny. After all, if you aren’t one of the "chosen" ones, what can you possibly do about it? Quite a lot, actually. The fact is, more and more psychologists are finding out that it isn’t the hand you’re dealt that’s important in life but how you play your cards. Let me put it in another way: We’re all capable of making our own luck. What appears to be luck is really the result of perceptions, personality traits, choices and actions. All of that is within your control. People who consider themselves lucky actually tend to be – it’s a self-fulfilling prophecy. That’s because positive thinkers are always keeping their eyes peeled for fortunate situations and they’re more likely to grab on them when they arise. So instead of telling yourself: "There’s not a chance in hell that’s going to happen". Tell yourself: "That looks kind of cool, maybe I should check it out.
motivation.author: Amanda Oosthuizen

motivation.quote: Life is precious, do not waste it doing anything that your heart does not respect or agree with.
motivation.author: Leon Brown

motivation.quote: Knowing how to be solitary is central to the art of loving. When we can be alone, we can be with others without using them as an escape.
motivation.author: Bell Hooks

motivation.quote: In life, sometimes getting hurt is a necessary path. Do not deny yourself of this experience, but never dwell in it. You have to go through it and not around it for you to get over it.
motivation.author: Dodinsky

motivation.quote: It only takes one person to change your life: you.
motivation.author: Ruth Casey

motivation.quote: Don’t give up on the people you love. Your patience and faithfulness may be exactly what they need to make a complete turnaround.
motivation.author: Joyce Meyers

motivation.quote: Accept that some relationships are seasonal. Learn what they came to teach and let go when it’s time for them to leave.
motivation.author: Mandy Hale

motivation.quote: Let whatever you do today be enough. Let go of the judgement you have about what you should be or could be doing, and today, allow yourself to simply be. Comparing yourself and your journey may be habitual, but it gets you nowhere. It makes you feel worse and it keeps you stuck. So stop fixating on where everyone else is, and start giving yourself permission to be exactly where you are. Quiet the voice telling you to do more and be more, and trust that in this moment, who you are, where you are at, and what you are doing is enough. You will get to where you need to be in your own time. Until then, breathe. Breathe and be patient with yourself and your process. You are doing the best you can to cope and survive amid your struggles, and that’s all you can ask of yourself. It’s enough. You are enough.
motivation.author: Daniell Koepke

motivation.quote: No matter how many mistakes you’ve made in the past, or what sort of difficulties you struggle with now, you are destined to live in victory.
motivation.author: Joel Osteen

motivation.quote: Never stop trying. Never stop believing. Never give up. Your day will come.
motivation.author: Mandy Hale

motivation.quote: There is nothing wrong with wanting attention. It doesn’t make you selfish. It doesn’t make you desperate or pathetic or weak. It makes you human. We all want to be noticed. We all need to feel seen and heard and valued. And we all deserve to have those needs met. You are no exception. You deserve to take up space. You deserve to be acknowledged and loved and cared for. You deserve to shine. Don’t let anyone, including yourself, convince you otherwise.
motivation.author: Daniell Koepke

motivation.quote: Mistakes are the stepping stones to wisdom. We learn from trial and error; we become wise by understanding problems.
