motivation.author: Leon Brown

motivation.quote: It doesn’t matter how you get knocked down in life, because that’s going to happen. All that matters is that you gotta get up.
motivation.author: Ben Affleck

motivation.quote: You cannot expect miracles to happen overnight. Be patient, be loving and little by little the change you seek will come.
motivation.author: Leon Brown

motivation.quote: This is your life. You are responsible for it. You will not live forever. Don’t waste it.
motivation.author: Natalie Goldberg

motivation.quote: You can’t wait for perfection. You can always wait for the perfect moment, the perfect this, the perfect that. But you really just gotta start doing. And it makes all the difference. Making excuses takes the same time as making progress.
motivation.author: Justin Gignac

motivation.quote: Believe in yourself and all that you are. Know that there is something inside you that is greater than any obstacle thrown your way.
motivation.author: Christian D. Larson

motivation.quote: Be like the flower that gives its fragrance to even the hand that crushes it.
motivation.author: Imam Ali

motivation.quote: Promise less. Do more. Fear less. Believe more. Copy less. Create more.
motivation.author: Thema Davis

motivation.quote: People are sent into our lives to teach us things that we need to learn about ourselves.
motivation.author: Mandy Hale

motivation.quote: The worst thing in life is not to end up all alone. The worst thing in life is to end up with people who make you feel all alone.
motivation.author: Robin Williams

motivation.quote: Some people can’t believe in themselves until someone else believes in them first.
motivation.author: Good Will Hunting

motivation.quote: Some of life’s best lessons are learned at the worst times.
motivation.author: Blake Atkins

motivation.quote: Forget about the consequences of failure. Failure is only a temporary change in direction to set you straight for your next success.
motivation.author: Dennis Waitley

motivation.quote: Sometimes a poor past turns out to be the best investment in a promising future.
motivation.author: Susan Gale

motivation.quote: You cannot change the past, but you can change the way you look upon it, so treat the bad as a lesson and move on.
motivation.author: Leon Brown

motivation.quote: You made your choices to get where you are now in life, stop blaming others for your misfortune and choose wisely next time."
motivation.author: Leon Brown

motivation.quote: It takes two or more to make an argument, if all you say and do is motivated by love, all arguments will cease.
motivation.author: Leon Brown

motivation.quote: Don’t let your character change color with your environment. Find out who you are and let it stay its true color.
motivation.author: Rachel Joy Scott

motivation.quote: Stop taking things personal, for this is the root to most of your problems. If you become calm with life, peace will prevail.
motivation.author: Leon Brown

motivation.quote: Don’t waste time trying to make people like you. You are one of a kind and you have something great to offer!
motivation.author: Joel Osteen

motivation.quote: Get your hopes up. Raise your expectations. Your best days are still in front of you.
motivation.author: Joel Osteen

motivation.quote: Life is too short to be sitting around miserable.
motivation.author: Rihanna

motivation.quote: A moment of anger can destroy a lifetime of work, whereas a moment of love can break barriers that took a lifetime to build.
motivation.author: Leon Brown

motivation.quote: For every positive change you make in your life, something else also changes for the better – it creates a chain reaction.
motivation.author: Leon Brown

motivation.quote: Happiness means loving yourself and being less concerned with the approval of others.
motivation.author: Owen Campbell Jr.

motivation.quote: Talking about our problems is our greatest addiction. Break the habit. Talk about your joys.
motivation.author: Rita Schiano

motivation.quote: Any negativity that comes to you today should be returned to sender.
motivation.author: Thema Davis

motivation.quote: A person doesn’t have to be perfect to be exactly what you need.
motivation.author: Dr. Elliot Reid

motivation.quote: Set your mind that no matter what is going on in your life, you will have a good attitude.
motivation.author: Joyce Meyer

motivation.quote: There’s a really great person hiding inside all of us. When the time is right, they’ll break out and the world will never be the same.
motivation.author: Susan Gale

motivation.quote: Love is a learned behavior. If you don’t learn how to love yourself someone will teach you how to hate yourself.
motivation.author: Tony Gaskins

motivation.quote: Some steps need to be taken alone. It’s the only way to really figure out where you need to go and who you need to be.
motivation.author: Mandy Hale

motivation.quote: Communication to a relationship is like oxygen to life. Without it…it dies.
motivation.author: Tony Gaskins

motivation.quote: Not everybody that looks good to you is good for you!
motivation.author: Tony Gaskins

motivation.quote: From every wound there is a scar, and every scar tells a story. A story that says, I survived.
motivation.author: Diary Keeper

motivation.quote: Be happy for no reason, like a child. If you are happy for a reason, you’re in trouble, because that reason can be taken from you."
motivation.author: Deepak Chopra

motivation.quote: Leave people to their opinions and judgements. They cannot harm you; it is their understanding that is faulty, not yours.
motivation.author: Leon Brown

motivation.quote: You can’t force love, I realized. It’s there or it isn’t. If it’s not there, you’ve got to be able to admit it. If it is there, you’ve got to do whatever it takes to protect it.
motivation.author: Richelle Mead

motivation.quote: Not everything will go as you expect in your life. This is why you need to drop expectations, and go with the flow of life.
motivation.author: Leon Brown

motivation.quote: Negativity becomes a habit, just the same as positivity, the difference is the amount of belief you hold in yourself.
motivation.author: Leon Brown

motivation.quote: Treat everyone with kindness and respect, even those who are rude to you
motivation.author: not because they are nice, but because you are.

motivation.quote: Start strong, stay strong, and finish strong by always remembering why you’re doing it in the first place.
motivation.author: Ralph Marston

motivation.quote: The best teachers are those who show you where to look, but don’t tell you what to see.
motivation.author: Alexandra K. Trenfor

motivation.quote: Making mistakes isn’t enough to become great. You must also admit the mistake, and then learn how to turn that mistake into an advantage.
motivation.author: Robert Kiyosaki

motivation.quote: Never regret. If it’s good, it’s wonderful. If it’s bad, it’s experience.
motivation.author: Victoria Holt

motivation.quote: Anyone can hide. Facing up to things, working through them, that’s what makes you strong.
motivation.author: Sarah Dessen

motivation.quote: Every day is a gift from God and every one that we waste is a day we can’t get back.
motivation.author: Joyce Meyers

motivation.quote: Too many of us are hung up on what we don’t have, can’t have, or won’t ever have. We spend too much energy being down, when we could use that same energy – if not less of it – doing, or at least trying to do, some of the things we really want to do."
motivation.author: Terry McMillian

motivation.quote: There are moments when troubles enter our lives and we can do nothing to avoid them. But they are there for a reason. Only when we have overcome them will we understand why they were there."
motivation.author: Paulo Coelho

motivation.quote: The worst loss you’ve ever experienced is the greatest gift you can have.
motivation.author: Byron Katie

motivation.quote: Don’t practice until you get it right. Practice until you can’t get it wrong.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: Never forget that walking away from something unhealthy is BRAVE, even if you stumble a little on your way out the door.
motivation.author: Mandy Hale

motivation.quote: Fear and faith have something in common. They both ask us to believe in something we cannot see.
motivation.author: Joel Osteen

motivation.quote: Replace those thoughts of worry with thoughts of hope, faith, and victory.
motivation.author: Joel Osteen

motivation.quote: Time and people have a way of slipping away. Learn to appreciate them while they’re here so you won’t have any regrets after they’re gone.
motivation.author: Susan Gale

motivation.quote: Hard times may have held you down, but they will not last forever. When all is said and done, you will be increased.
motivation.author: Joel Osteen

motivation.quote: Refuse to let small, petty people distract you from your BIG purpose.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: Work for a cause and not for applause. Live your life to express and not to impress, don’t strive to make your presence noticed, just make your absence felt.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: Some people come into your life as blessings. Others come into your life as lessons.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: Let a man’s character be his currency and you’ll find that a lot of "rich" guys are actually bankrupt!
motivation.author: Tony Gaskins

motivation.quote: It’ll come when you least expect it. Work on you and it’ll work itself out.
motivation.author: Tony Gaskins

motivation.quote: You’ll never reach your destination if you keep stopping to tell everyone where you’ve been and what you’ve accomplished.
motivation.author: Susan Gale

motivation.quote: Always remember, no matter how many problems you have, there is always someone who has more.
motivation.author: Linda Poindexter

motivation.quote: If they’re not treating you right today, tomorrow will not be any different.
motivation.author: Susan Gale

motivation.quote: The longer you have to wait for something, the more you will appreciate it when it finally arrives. The harder you have to fight for something, the more priceless it will become once you achieve it. And the more pain you have to endure on your journey, the sweeter the arrival at your destination. All good things are worth waiting for and worth fighting for."
motivation.author: Susan Gale

motivation.quote: Sometimes the only answer people are looking for when they ask for help is that they won’t have to face the problem alone."
motivation.author: Mark Amend

motivation.quote: Sometimes you need to be yourself so that you’ll know who’s going to leave and who will stay.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: When you can no longer think of a reason to continue, you must think of a reason to start over."
motivation.author: Linda Poindexter

motivation.quote: As I look back on my life, I realize that every time I thought I was being rejected from something good, I was actually being re-directed to something better."
motivation.author: Steve Maraboli

motivation.quote: When someone treats you like an option, help them narrow their choices by removing yourself from the equation. It’s that simple."
motivation.author: Robert Tew

motivation.quote: It doesn’t really matter who you used to be, what matters is who you’ve become."
motivation.author: Robert Tew

motivation.quote: When you open up to love, you must be open to getting hurt as well. If you expect to love someone, and not have disappointment every now and then, then you don’t want love, you want something perfect. And good luck finding that.
motivation.author: DeAndre Carswell

motivation.quote: If you know you have to wait anyway, why not make a decision to enjoy your life while you’re waiting?"
motivation.author: Joel Osteen

motivation.quote: When you stop expecting people to be perfect, you can like them for who they are.
motivation.author: Donald Miller

motivation.quote: Sometimes you have to step outside of the person you’ve been, and remember the person you were meant to be, the person you wanted to be, the person you are.
motivation.author: H.G. Wells

motivation.quote: Sometimes there is nothing harder in life than being happy for somebody else.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: Sometimes it’s easy to feel like you’re the only one in the world who’s struggling, who’s frustrated, or unsatisfied, or barely getting by. That feeling is a lie. And if you just hold on, just find the courage to face it all for another day. Someone or something will find you and make it all okay, because we all need a little help sometimes, someone to help us hear the music in the world, to remind us that it won’t always be this way. That someone is out there, and that someone will find you.
motivation.author: One Tree Hill

motivation.quote: There are going to be days when you won’t have the energy or drive to get out of bed. There are going to be days when you’re going to want to give up – give up on love, life, or school. The thing is, you’re not allowed to give up. You were given a life and you’re supposed to live it. The truth is the seventy or eighty years that you’re given isn’t long enough to do the things you’re supposed to do. Sure, you’re gonna hit a few bumps along the way, but you’ve got to pick yourself up and move on. Life is unpredictable and things might not always work out the way you want them to, but that’s no reason to give up. You’re here for a reason and someday when you’re not expecting it, you’re going to discover your reason for being here. And when that does happen, your life will never be the same again.
motivation.author: unknown

motivation.quote: Sometimes you have to do what’s best for you and your life, not what’s best for everyone else.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: Let people do what they need to do to make them happy. Mind your own business, and do what you need to do to make you happy.
motivation.author: Leon Brown

motivation.quote: The fact that you are even here, alive, on this planet is a mathematical miracle, and you should not spend the time that you have being busy being miserable.
motivation.author: Philip DeFranco

motivation.quote: We are always looking for something better that we sometimes fail to realize that we already have the best.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: When you get little, you want more. When you get more, you desire even more. But when you lose everything, you realize little was enough.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: Don’t be too hard on yourself. There are plenty of people willing to do that for you. Love yourself and be proud of everything that you do. Even mistakes mean you’re trying."
motivation.author: Susan Gale

motivation.quote: Too often, the thing you want most is the one thing you can’t have. Desire leaves us heartbroken, it wears us out. Desire can wreck your life. But as tough as wanting something can be; the people who suffer the most, are those who don’t know what they want.
motivation.author: Meredith Grey

motivation.quote: Sometimes it’s the smallest decisions that can change your life forever."
motivation.author: Keri Russell

motivation.quote: Sometimes you have to learn to let go of the person you love, and just hold on to the memory of what was."
motivation.author: Mark Amend

motivation.quote: No regrets. No looking back. Just hold on to life and move forward. We have no way of knowing what lies ahead, and that is what makes the journey even more exciting."
motivation.author: Susan Gale

motivation.quote: Never lose sleep over something that isn’t worth staying awake for."
motivation.author: Mark Amend

motivation.quote: Until you reach the end of the road, there is still time to change the path you’ve chosen.
motivation.author: Susan Gale

motivation.quote: Try not to take things personally. What people say about you is a reflection of them, not you."
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: Ubuntu Story
motivation.author: An anthropologist proposed a game to the kids in an African tribe. He put a basket full of fruit near a tree and told the kids that who ever got there first won the sweet fruits. When he told them to run they all took each others hands and ran together, then sat together enjoying their treats. When he asked them why they had run like that as one could have had all the fruits for himself they said: Ubuntu. Ubuntu in the Xhosa culture means: "I am because we are."

motivation.quote: Life is short, so do what makes you happy. Be with those who make you smile. Laugh as much as you breathe, and love as long as you live…
motivation.author: Rachel Nunes

motivation.quote: Sometimes you have to experience things for yourself in order to get through what others have been telling you all along to do.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: A Beautiful woman uses her lips for Truth, her voice for Kindness, her ears for Compassion, her hands for Charity and her heart for Love. For those who do not like her, she uses Prayer.
motivation.author: Jolly Rutten

motivation.quote: Spend life with the people who make you happy, not the people who you have to impress.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: If your friends won’t make time for you, maybe it’s time you make new friends."
motivation.author: Mark Amend

motivation.quote: Sometimes bad things in life open up your eyes to the good things you weren’t paying attention to before.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: One day you will realize that material things mean nothing. All that matters is the well-being of the people in your life.
motivation.author: Leon Brown

motivation.quote: There is no shame in beginning again, for you get a chance to build bigger and better than before.
motivation.author: Leon Brown

motivation.quote: No storm can last forever.
motivation.author: Alex Daydream

motivation.quote: Nothing goes to waste on the journey of life. Both good and bad experiences shape your mind and heart for what is to come.
motivation.author: Leon Brown

motivation.quote: If you want to attract happy, positive things…become a happy, positive person! Work from the inside out!
motivation.author: Mandy Hale

motivation.quote: Raise your words, not voice. It is rain that grows flowers, not thunder.
motivation.author: Rumi

motivation.quote: I don’t care about whose DNA has recombined with whose. When everything goes to hell, the people who stand by you without flinching—they are your family.
motivation.author: Jim Butcher

motivation.quote: Of course I’ll hurt you. Of course you’ll hurt me. Of course we will hurt each other. But this is the very condition of existence. To become spring, means accepting the risk of winter. To become presence, means accepting the risk of absence.
motivation.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

motivation.quote: Failure is not final, it is a chance to start again with the knowledge gained from what went before.
motivation.author: Leon Brown

motivation.quote: Self-worth is so vital to your happiness. If you don’t feel good about YOU, it’s hard to feel good about anything else.
motivation.author: Mandy Hale

motivation.quote: When she is happy, she can’t stop talking, when she is sad she doesn’t say a word.
motivation.author: Ann Brashares

motivation.quote: Try to say nothing negative about anybody for three days, for forty-five days, for three months. See what happens to your life.
motivation.author: Yoko Ono

motivation.quote: I shall stay calm in moments of stress and anxiety, so as to allow positive thoughts and actions to manifest from me.
motivation.author: Leon Brown

motivation.quote: If you ever find yourself in the wrong story, leave.
motivation.author: Mo Willems

motivation.quote: Life is too short to hang around cynical people. Find people who will believe in your dreams and celebrate your victories.
motivation.author: Joel Osteen

motivation.quote: If you keep picking a scab it will bleed and never heal. If you keep dragging the pain of the past up, it will never heal.
motivation.author: Leon Brown

motivation.quote: Life is too short to spend it at war with yourself.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: Your dream doesn’t have an expiration date. Take a deep breath and try again.
motivation.author: KT Witten

motivation.quote: Focus on what you need to make your life better. Do not let wants and desires distract you from what really matters.
motivation.author: Leon Brown

motivation.quote: There’s always a lesson in adversity! Don’t worry about the problem. Focus on the lesson!
motivation.author: Tony Gaskins

motivation.quote: Don’t let anyone drain you of your happiness today. Be drama free. Rise above the petty stuff.
motivation.author: Trent Shelton

motivation.quote: Just when you think you know people, they disappoint you in ways you never thought they could.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: The smarter you get, the less you speak.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: Deep You will never have to chase what wants to stay with you.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: Deep Your past is just a lesson, not a life sentence.
motivation.author: Author Unknown

motivation.quote: Deep Stay away from people who make you feel like you aren’t worth their time.
motivation.author: Author Unknown

motivation.quote: Deep Fall in love with somebody who will never let you go to sleep wondering if you still matter.
motivation.author: Author Unknown

motivation.quote: It’s very easy to be judgmental until you know someone’s truth.
motivation.author: Kate Winslet

motivation.quote: She was getting better…but then she remembered the things that tore her apart. Now, she’s back at the start.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: Respect yourself enough to walk away from anything that no longer serves you, grows you or makes you happy.
motivation.author: Robert Tew

motivation.quote: When you’re young, your whole life is about the pursuit of fun. Then, you grow up and learn to be cautious. You could break a bone or a heart. You look before you leap and sometimes you don’t leap at all because there’s not always someone there to catch you. And in life, there’s no safety net. When did it stop being fun and start being scary?
motivation.author: Sex and the City

motivation.quote: A time comes in your life when you finally get it. When in the midst of all your fears and insanity you stop dead in your tracks and somewhere, the voice inside your head cries out "ENOUGH!" This moment is the turning point that leads to success and happiness.
motivation.author: Sonny Carroll

motivation.quote: The first step to living the life you want, is leaving the life you don’t want. Taking that first step forward is always the hardest. But then each step forward, gets easier and easier. And each step forward, get you closer and closer. Until eventually, what had once been invisible, starts to be visible. And what had once felt impossible, starts to feel possible.
motivation.author: Karen Salmansohn

motivation.quote: You are an unfinished work in progress. One of the good things about life’s challenges: You get to find out that you’re capable of being far more than you ever thought possible.
motivation.author: Karen Salmansohn

motivation.quote: When you try something new, you don’t have to be perfect. In fact, you don’t even have to be very good. If you love it, you’ll want to do more of it, and you’ll get better and better over time. A lot of people don’t start things because they see how good other people are at doing them. But those other people probably weren’t all that good when they first started, either. Talent is reserved for the few, but skill is open to anyone who takes the time to keep at something and make the effort to improve.
motivation.author: Doe Zantamata

motivation.quote: Size does matter. Look for a guy with a really big heart.
motivation.author: Karen Salmansohn

motivation.quote: People leave you out in the cold and get mad when you learn how to get warm by yourself.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: Smile. Let everyone know that today, you’re a lot stronger than you were yesterday.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: When people hurt you over and over, think of them as sandpaper. They may scratch and hurt you. But later, you’ll be shining and polished, while they end up useless.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: Sometimes things aren’t meant to last. They just take a place in your heart and make you a little smarter for the next time.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: Be an Optimist Prime not a Negatron.
motivation.author: Avid

motivation.quote: The best kind of love is the one that makes you a better person, without changing you into someone other than yourself.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: Life changes every minute of everyday. You lose friends. You gain friends. You realize your friend wasn’t ever really your friend and the person you used to hate can make a really good friend. You look for love. You find love. You lose love. You realize all along that you’ve been loved. You laugh. You cry. You laugh so hard that you cry. You do this, you do that. You really wish you hadn’t done that. You then learn from that and you’re glad that you did. You have your ups. You have your downs. You see good movies. You see bad movies. You wonder if your life is just a big movie. You look at others and wish you were them. You then realize who they are and glad that you’re you. You love life. You hate life. In the end you just find yourself happy to be living life, no matter what’s being thrown at you.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: Whoever always looks for greener grass on the other side will never be able to appreciate the green grass that was right under their feet the entire time. One who is always looking for the next best thing will never be happy or satisfied with what or who they have.
motivation.author: Doe Zantamata

motivation.quote: Sometimes you need to be alone in order to reflect on life. Take time out to take care of yourself. You deserve it.
motivation.author: Robert Tew

motivation.quote: Spend all your time with negative people and you will become like them. Why? Because you’ll pick up their bad habits and energy. Make it a goal this year to align yourself with positive people who inspire and bring out ONLY the BEST in you. Be with people who contribute to your growth and not your death in life… and you’ll be Happy.
motivation.author: Robert Tew

motivation.quote: As you get older you start doing things in reverse. You start cutting people out from your life. Your Christmas list becomes practically nonexistent. You don’t need to be the first in line for everything. You take less pictures because some memories are best kept in your heart and not your hard drive. And instead of looking for love, you dig for it from within."
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: If your partner isn’t bringing out the best in you, you’re in the wrong relationship."
motivation.author: Robert Tew

motivation.quote: You may not be there yet. But you’re closer than yesterday."
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: Sometimes you have to give up on people. Everyone in your journey is meant to be there, but not everyone is meant to stay.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: The perfect boyfriend doesn’t drink, smoke, cheat or exist."
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: The reason most people give up so fast is because they tend to look at how far they still have to go, instead of how far they have come."
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: Refuse to ruin a perfectly good today by thinking about a bad yesterday.
motivation.author: Linda Poindexter

motivation.quote: You can’t really begin to appreciate life until it has knocked you down a few times. You can’t really begin to appreciate love until your heart has been broken. And you can’t really begin to appreciate happiness until you’ve known sadness. Once you’ve walked through the valley, the view from the mountaintop is breathtaking.
motivation.author: Susan Gale

motivation.quote: Sometimes it’s easier to just go ahead and face the truth than to spend the rest of your life trying to hide from it.
motivation.author: Susan Gale

motivation.quote: Real Women are classy, strong, independent, loyal and loveable and one thing about them is they know they deserve better.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: You can’t master your future if you’re still a slave to your past."
motivation.author: Robert Tew

motivation.quote: Men are like mascara they usually run at the first sign of emotion.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: Why do we suffer?  We suffer because we have forgotten the power of unconditional love. We suffer because we would rather be right and fight than be in love. We suffer because we label every experience either good or bad. We suffer because we resist change rather then embracing it for the purpose of our own spiritual evolution. We suffer because we invest more into stocks than we do in our self-worth. We suffer because we have forgotten that we’re all family. We suffer because our innate values have gone awry. We suffer because we measure every relationship by what we can get out of it rather than what we can put into it. We suffer because the little things are no longer the big things. We suffer because we have forgotten who we are, and how beautiful we are.  We suffer because we CHOOSE to suffer.  We have the power to choose, in every moment, how we feel. We may not choose our conditions, but we can choose how we experience them and how we experience ourselves. It’s that simple. Return to love. Return home to the source–you.  You’re the source of everything you experience. You are beautiful. You are wonderful. You are magical. You are eternal. You are truth. You are you. You just need to realize those things to experience them. Never forget that… Love Rob "The easiest thing to be in the world is you. The most difficult thing to be is what other people want you to be. Don’t let them put you in that position." –Leo Buscaglia "The only demons in this world are those within our own hearts, and that is where all our battles should be fought."
motivation.author: Mahatma Gandhi

motivation.quote: Intelligence is sexy, don’t play stupid.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: The most beautiful curve on a woman’s body will always be her smile.
motivation.author: Positive Med

motivation.quote: It starts with a dream. Add faith, and it becomes a belief. Add action, and it becomes a part of life. Add perseverance, and it becomes a goal in sight. Add patience and time, and it ends with a dream come true.
motivation.author: Doe Zantamata

motivation.quote: No matter how much you revisit the past…there’s nothing new to see.
motivation.author: Robert Tew

motivation.quote: Whatever it takes to get through your days, bravo to you for getting through them.
motivation.author: Cydara Verrier

motivation.quote: Don’t believe everything you think. The mind creates its own illusions by linking thoughts that share no connection.
motivation.author: Jerry Corstens

motivation.quote: The bad news is…you are the problem. The GREAT news is YOU are the solution! You got this!
motivation.author: Dave Ramsey

motivation.quote: Funny Always look both ways before crossing a woman.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: You must love yourself first, then you create a ripple of love that will touch everyone’s lives. You have the power within you. Make a start and heal yourself first.
motivation.author: Leon Brown

motivation.quote: Thank you for misunderstanding me, rejecting me and not seeing me and teaching me to always see myself.
motivation.author: Maryam Hasnaa

motivation.quote: Concentrate all your thoughts upon the work at hand. The sun’s rays do not burn until brought to a focus
motivation.author: Alexander Graham Bell

motivation.quote: I have been impressed with the urgency of doing. Knowing is not enough; we must apply. Being willing is not enough; we must do
motivation.author: Leonardo da Vinci

motivation.quote: If you can’t fly then run, if you can’t run then walk, if you can’t walk then crawl, but whatever you do you have to keep moving forward
motivation.author: Martin Luther King Jr

motivation.quote: Motivation is what gets you started. Habit is what keeps you going
motivation.author: Jim Rohn

motivation.quote: A dreamer is one who can find his way only by moonlight and his punishment is that he sees the dawn before the rest of the world.
motivation.author: Oscar Wilde

motivation.quote: Unlike a drop of water which loses its identity when it joins the ocean, man does not lose his being in the society in which he lives. Man’s life is independent. He is born not for the development of the society alone, but for the development of his self.
motivation.author: B. R. Ambedkar

motivation.quote: In the social jungle of human existence, there is no feeling of being alive without a sense of identity.
motivation.author: Erik Erikson

motivation.quote: I always had long hair. When you lose it, you realise just how important it is to your identity.
motivation.author: Delta Goodrem

motivation.quote: I don’t cover my face because I want to show my identity.
motivation.author: Malala Yousafzai

motivation.quote: Never forget what you are, for surely the world will not. Make it your strength. Then it can never be your weakness. Armour yourself in it, and it will never be used to hurt you.
motivation.author: George RR Martin

motivation.quote: So, I guess we are who we are for a lot of reasons. And maybe we’ll never know most of them. But even if we don’t have the power to choose where we come from, we can still choose where we go from there. We can still do things. And we can try to feel okay about them.
motivation.author: Steven Chbosky

motivation.quote: There is no gate, no lock, no bolt that you can set upon the freedom of my mind.
motivation.author: Virginia Woolf

motivation.quote: Before I can live with other folks I’ve got to live with myself. The one thing that doesn’t abide by majority rule is a person’s conscience.
motivation.author: Harper Lee

motivation.quote: Know, first, who you are, and then adorn yourself accordingly.
motivation.author: Epictetus

motivation.quote: Identity cannot be found or fabricated but emerges from within when one has the courage to let go.
motivation.author: Doug Cooper

motivation.quote: The value of identity of course is so often with it comes purpose.
motivation.author: Richard Grant

motivation.quote: Summer in the deep South is not only a season, a climate, it’s a dimension. Floating in it, one must be either proud or submerged.
motivation.author: Eugene Walter, The Untidy Pilgrim

motivation.quote: Walking the streets of Charleston in the late afternoons of August was like walking through gauze or inhaling damaged silk.
motivation.author: Pat Conroy, The Lords of Discipline

motivation.quote: And so we dreamed and loved and planned by fall and winter, and the full flush of the long Southern spring, till the hot winds rolled from the fetid Gulf, till the roses shivered and the still stern sun quivered its awful light over the hills of Atlanta.
motivation.author: W.E.B. DuBois, The Souls of Black Folk

motivation.quote: Down here in the deep, dark South we know and live with the real world. Candy-Land idealism is quietly suffocated in the relentless humidity. This is the world where fist meets face. This is where the calluses on a man’s hand are bigger than his conscience, and dreams get drowned in sweat and tears.
motivation.author: Damien Echols, Life After Death

motivation.quote: The air was oppressive even in the early morning hour, hot with the scorching promise of a noon of glaring blue sky and pitiless bronze sun.
motivation.author: Margaret Mitchell, Gone With the Wind

motivation.quote: Louisiana in September was like an obscene phone call from nature. The air — moist, sultry, secretive, and far from fresh — felt as if it were being exhaled into one’s face. Sometimes it even sounded like heavy breathing.
motivation.author: Tom Robbins, Jitterbug Perfume

motivation.quote: The ability to ask the right question is more than half the battle of finding the answer.
motivation.author: Thomas J. Watson

motivation.quote: The greatest problem with communication is the illusion that it has been accomplished.
motivation.author: George Bernard Shaw

motivation.quote: A major stimulant to creative thinking is focused questions.
motivation.author: Brian Tracy

motivation.quote: Any leader who asks the right questions of the right people has the potential to discover and develop great ideas.
motivation.author: John Maxwell

motivation.quote: Quality questions create a quality life. Successful people ask better questions, and as a result, they get better answers.
motivation.author: Anthony Robbins

motivation.quote: I write books to influence people I will never meet. Books increase my audience and my message.
motivation.author: Les Parrott

motivation.quote: Millions saw the apple fall, but Newton was the only one who asked why.
motivation.author: Bernard Baruch

motivation.quote: Good questions inform; great questions transform.
motivation.author: John Maxwell

motivation.quote: While personal maturity may mean being able to see beyond yourself, leadership maturity means considering others before yourself.
motivation.author: John Maxwell

motivation.quote: You will never be able to bet on yourself unless you believe in yourself.
motivation.author: John Maxwell

motivation.quote: My friends didn't believe I could become a successful speaker, so I did something about it. I went out and found some new friends.
motivation.author: Joe Larson

motivation.quote: In everyone’s life, at some time, our inner fire goes out. It is then burst into flame by an encounter with another human being. We should all be thankful for those people who rekindle the inner spirit.
motivation.author: Albert Schweitzer

motivation.quote: Humility is not denying your strengths. Humility is being honest about your weaknesses.
motivation.author: Rick Warren

motivation.quote: A team is a group of people who may not be equal in experience, talent, or education but in commitment.
motivation.author: Patricia Fripp

motivation.quote: The freedom to do your own thing ends when you have obligations and responsibilities.
motivation.author: Lou Holtz

motivation.quote: Almost every man wastes part of his life in attempts to display qualities he does not posses.
motivation.author: Samuel Johnson

motivation.quote: The unexamined leader is not worth following.
motivation.author: John Maxwell

motivation.quote: Never miss a chance to keep your mouth shut and listen.
motivation.author: Robert Newton Peck

motivation.quote: Effective listening requires more than hearing the words transmitted. It demands that you find meaning and understanding in what is being said. After all, meaning are not in words but in people.
motivation.author: Herb Cohen

motivation.quote: Being heard is so close to being loved, that for the average person, they are almost indistinguishable.
motivation.author: David W. Augsburger

motivation.quote: One of the best way to persuade others is with your ears.
motivation.author: John Maxwell

motivation.quote: Most of us tend to suffer from Agenda Anxiety, the feeling that what we want to say to others is more important than what we think they might want to say to us.
motivation.author: Nido Qubein

motivation.quote: Good leaders ask great questions that inspire others to dream more, think more, learn more, do more, and become more.
motivation.author: John Maxwell

motivation.quote: Experiences isn't the best teacher — evaluated experience is.
motivation.author: John Maxwell

motivation.quote: No man will make a great leader who wants to do it all himself or get all the credit for doing it.
motivation.author: Andrew Carnegie

motivation.quote: When values, thoughts, feelings, and actions are in alignment, a person becomes focused and character is strengthened.
motivation.author: John Maxwell

motivation.quote: Leadership is developed, not discovered.
motivation.author: John Maxwell

motivation.quote: A life isn't significant except for its impact upon other lives.
motivation.author: Jackie Robinson

motivation.quote: If you’re Noah, and your ark is about to sink, look for the elephants first, because you can throw over a bunch of cats, dogs, squirrels, and everything else that is just a small animal and your ark will keep sinking. But if you can find one elephant to get overboard, you’re in much better shape.
motivation.author: Vilfredo Pareto

motivation.quote: You are not made in a crisis; you are revealed. When you squeeze an orange, you get orange juice; when you squeeze a lemon, you get lemon juice; when a human being gets squeezed, you get what’s inside — positive or negative.
motivation.author: Jack Kinder

motivation.quote: People don’t care how much you know until they know how much you care.
motivation.author: John Maxwell

motivation.quote: It takes humility to seek feedback. It takes wisdom to understand it, analyze it and appropriately act on it.
motivation.author: Stephen Covey

motivation.quote: Good people always rise to your level of expectation.
motivation.author: John Maxwell

motivation.quote: Whenever you’re in conflict with someone, there is one factor that can make the difference between damaging your relationship and deepening it. The factor is attitude.
motivation.author: William James

motivation.quote: Mindfulness asks us to simply see, to open to ourselves and, in so doing, to open to the world, learning to be with whatever presents itself.
motivation.author: Saki Santorelli (Heal Thy Self)

motivation.quote: Worrying is a way to avoid what is so by thinking about what could be.
motivation.author: Judith Hanson Lasater (Living Your Yoga: Finding the Spiritual in Everyday Life)

motivation.quote: The more you try to avoid suffering, the more you suffer, because smaller and more insignificant things begin to torture you, in proportion to your fear of being hurt. The one who does most to avoid suffering is, in the end, the one who suffers most.
motivation.author: Thomas Merton (The Seven Storey Mountain)

motivation.quote: Thinking is a function, not an identity.
motivation.author: Mike Kewley

motivation.quote: Relaxation is a reliable by-product of mindful attention. If you aim directly for relaxation, however, that effort can actually get in the way
motivation.author: Arnie Kozak (Mindfulness of Breathing: A Primer)

motivation.quote: People may change and become better versions of themselves, but the heart that beats inside remains the same. As well as their individuality. So be grateful for that.
motivation.author: Pokemon

motivation.quote: You and me, we should be grateful and appreciative of what we have. And the fact we’re alive and well.
motivation.author: Pokemon

motivation.quote: We live in the same world, the same air, the same sky. That means we’re not that much different from one another, and therefore should respect each other for who we are, what we believe in and what we stand for. Nobody should be treated unequally.
motivation.author: Pokemon

motivation.quote: I'm free to be who I am, who I want to be, who I choose to be and to live life on my own terms. I don’t have to live in a way other people expect me to, I'm free to live in a way that makes me happy and makes the most sense to me. I have a choice.
motivation.author: Pokemon

motivation.quote: Fight for your dreams and do whatever it takes to make it a reality. You have the power to, so don’t let anybody stop you. It all comes down to you.
motivation.author: Pokemon

motivation.quote: It doesn't matter where you’re born, how you were raised, what background you come from, who you were in the past or what you experienced in your childhood. If you want to make something of yourself and better yourself, change is possible. As long as you do something to make those changes a reality.
motivation.author: Pokemon

motivation.quote: May you live all the days of your life.
motivation.author: Jonathan Swift

motivation.quote: Thoughts are not facts (even the ones that say they are!)
motivation.author: Jon Kabat-Zinn

motivation.quote: Feelings come and go like clouds in a windy sky. Conscious breathing is my anchor.
motivation.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

motivation.quote: I can’t raise the bar of others if I haven’t raised the bar for myself.
motivation.author: John Maxwell

motivation.quote: How people treat you is their karma. How you react is yours.
motivation.author: Wayne W. Dyer

motivation.quote: A person with a clear purpose will make progress on even the toughest road. A person with no purpose will make no progress on even the smoothest road.
motivation.author: Thomas Carlyle

motivation.quote: It was hot; heat quivered up from the asphalt, giving to the familiar buildings about the square a nimbus quality, a quality of living and palpitant chiaroscuro.
motivation.author: William Faulker, Light in August

motivation.quote: Men’s stiff collars wilted by nine in the morning. Ladies bathed before noon and after their three o’clock naps. And by nightfall were like soft teacakes with frosting from sweating and sweet talcum. The day was twenty-four hours long, but it seemed longer.
motivation.author: Harper Lee, To Kill a Mockingbird

motivation.quote: All movies smell of a neighborhood and a season: I saw All Quiet on the Western Front, one of my first, in Arcola, Mississippi, in August of 1941, and the noble deeds were done, not merely fittingly but inevitably, in the thick singing darkness of Delta summer and in the fragrance of cottonseed meal.
motivation.author: Walker Percy, The Moviegoer

motivation.quote: Early in the mornings it was a little cool and their shadows stretched out tall on the sidewalk in front of them. But in the middle of the day the sky was always blazing hot. The glare was so bright it hurt to keep your eyes open.
motivation.author: Carson McCullers, The Heart is a Lonely Hunter

motivation.quote: Life isn’t about finding yourself. Life is about creating yourself.
motivation.author: George Bernard Shaw

motivation.quote: The most common way people give up their power is by thinking they don’t have any.
motivation.author: Alice Walker

motivation.quote: Risk something or forever sit with your dreams.
motivation.author: Herb Brooks

motivation.quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do. If you haven’t found it yet, keep looking. Don’t settle.
motivation.author: Steve Jobs

motivation.quote: Perfection is not attainable, but if we chase perfection we can catch excellence.
motivation.author: Vince Lombardi

motivation.quote: Nothing is impossible, the word itself says ‘I’m possible’!
motivation.author: Audrey Hepburn

motivation.quote: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
motivation.author: Confucius

motivation.quote: Our finest moments are most likely to occur when we are feeling deeply uncomfortable, unhappy, or unfulfilled. For it is only in such moments, propelled by our discomfort, that we are likely to step out of our ruts and start searching for different ways or truer answers.
motivation.author: M. Scott Peck

motivation.quote: There is no passion to be found in playing small — in settling for a life that is less than you are capable of living.
motivation.author: Nelson Mandela

motivation.quote: The future depends on what you do today.
motivation.author: Mahatma Gandhi

motivation.quote: Strive not to be a success, but rather to be of value.
motivation.author: Albert Einstein

motivation.quote: It is during our darkest moments that we must focus to see the light.
motivation.author: Aristotle Onassis

motivation.quote: Build your own dreams, or someone else will hire you to build theirs.
motivation.author: Farrah Gray

motivation.quote: A person who never made a mistake never tried anything new.
motivation.author: Albert Einstein

motivation.quote: If you hear a voice within you say, ‘You cannot paint,’ then by all means paint and that voice will be silenced.
motivation.author: Vincent Van Gogh

motivation.quote: Everything you’ve ever wanted is on the other side of fear.
motivation.author: George Addair

motivation.quote: Find out what you like doing best, and get someone to pay you for it.
motivation.author: Katharine Whitehorn

motivation.quote: Wanting to be someone else is a waste of the person you are.
motivation.author: Marilyn Monroe

motivation.quote: The harder I practice, the luckier I get.
motivation.author: Gary Player

motivation.quote: It does not do to dwell on dreams and forget to live
motivation.author: Harry Potter and the Philosopher’s Stone

motivation.quote: We could all have been killed or worse, expelled.
motivation.author: Harry Potter and the Philosopher’s Stone

motivation.quote: We’ve all got both light and dark inside us. What matters is the part we choose to act on. That’s who we really are.
motivation.author: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban

motivation.quote: Fear of a name increases fear of the thing itself.
motivation.author: Harry Potter and the Philosopher’s Stone

motivation.quote: You’re a wizard, Harry.
motivation.author: Harry Potter and the Philosopher’s Stone

motivation.quote: ’I am not worried, Harry,’ said Dumbledore, his voice a little stronger despite the freezing water. ‘I am with you.’
motivation.author: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince

motivation.quote: Imagine smiling after a slap in the face. Then think of doing it twenty-four hours a day
motivation.author: Markus Zusak, "The Book Thief"

motivation.quote: What upsets people is not things themselves, but their judgements about these things
motivation.author: Epictetus

motivation.quote: There is only one way to happiness and that is to cease worrying about things which are beyond the power of our will
motivation.author: Seneca

motivation.quote: It is impossible that happiness, and yearning for what is not present, should ever be united
motivation.author: Epictetus

motivation.quote: If a person doesn’t know to which port they sail, no wind is favourable
motivation.author: Seneca

motivation.quote: Today I escaped anxiety. Or no, I discarded it, because it was within me, in my own perceptions — not outside
motivation.author: Marcus Aurelius

motivation.quote: Does what’s happened keep you from acting with justice, generosity, self-control, sanity, prudence, honesty, humility, straightforwardness, and all other qualities that allow a person’s nature to fulfil itself? So remember this principle when something threatens to cause you pain: the thing itself was no misfortune at all; to endure it and prevail is great good fortune
motivation.author: Marcus Aurelius

motivation.quote: I think your 20s are the hardest part of life. I mean, everyone goes on about how hard it is to be a teenager, but actually I think it’s tougher to be in your 20s because you’re expected to be a grownup and expected to earn your own living and be successful and I think you feel like a kid still.
motivation.author: Nigel Col

motivation.quote: The hours between 12 AM and 6 AM have a funny habit of making you feel like you’re either on top of the world or under it.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: is basically the only age you can use as leverage. Meaning that because it’s the exact age between life-as-you-know-it and what will later be known as ‘real life’ (that’s scientifically proven, of course), people expect you to make some mistakes. Mistakes like overcooking a pot-roast or dating someone who may not be right for you. And that’s okay, because heck, you’re just 22.
motivation.author: Shanelle Kaul

motivation.quote: The path to whatever your notion of success is will likely not be linear. Don’t take continuous personal growth for granted. Just because you’re older doesn’t necessarily mean you’re wiser. Your 20s will be full of failures — let them happen and learn as you go.
motivation.author: Holden Desalles

motivation.quote: When you’re in your early 20s your love life seems to explode every 20 minutes or so. By the time you’ve reached your thirties, it is every five or ten years.
motivation.author: Patrick Marber

motivation.quote: At 27, I can talk to my parents and see that while they’ve done a lot of amazing things with their lives, there are still doubts and insecurities that they’re holding on to and trying to make sense of. Answers don’t come with age. Age provides perspective, but life wasn’t designed with a point at which it definitively gets easier.
motivation.author: Jana Eleanor

motivation.quote: Positive, healthy, loving relationships in your twenties… I don’t know if anyone would disagree with it: I think they’re the exception, not the norm. People are either playing house really aggressively because they’re scared of what an uncertain time it is, or they’re avoiding commitment altogether.
motivation.author: Lena Dunham

motivation.quote: Suddenly you’re 21 and you’re screaming along in the car to all the songs you listened to when you were sad in middle school and everything is different but everything is good.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: I think, for the majority of my twenties, I was always so concerned with what I didn’t have, or what I still wanted.
motivation.author: Adam Lambert

motivation.quote: The secret of change is to focus all of your energy, not on fighting the old, but building the new.
motivation.author: Socrates

motivation.quote: If you don’t make time to work on creating the life you want, you’re eventually going to be forced to spend a LOT of time dealing with a life you DON’T want.
motivation.author: Kevin Ngo

motivation.quote: I look back on my 20s. It’s supposed to be the prime of your life, the most vital, the most beautiful. But you’re making your critical decisions and sometimes your most critical mistakes.
motivation.author: Ann Brashares

motivation.quote: Surround yourself with people who are only going to lift you higher.
motivation.author: Oprah Winfrey

motivation.quote: I thought I knew everything about love and relationships in my 20s, the ignorance of youth is bliss. As you get older, you start to realise that you dont really know anything and life is a great traveling journey. Life is unexpected…you just never know whats going to happen.
motivation.author: Reese Witherspoon

motivation.quote: 16."Be more concerned with your character than your reputation.
motivation.author: John Wooden

motivation.quote: Your opinion meant more than my own and that’s not how it should be. I have to find out what my own opinion is. And I have to do it on my own.
motivation.author: Eva

motivation.quote: When everything seems hopeless just take one day at a time. And if one day becomes too much, just take one hour at a time. And if one hour becomes too much, then just take one minute at a time.
motivation.author: Sonja

motivation.quote: Hate doesn’t come from religion, it comes from fear.
motivation.author: Sana

motivation.quote: There’s only one thing we know for sure. That life is now.
motivation.author: Isak

motivation.quote: You know you don’t have to face everything in the world on your own?
motivation.author: Eskild

motivation.quote: I can have sex, Vilde. I just choose not to.
motivation.author: Sana

motivation.quote: People experience horrible things every day, and they still manage to be nice to others.
motivation.author: Noora

motivation.quote: Only you can feel what you feel.
motivation.author: Isak

motivation.quote: Du er ikke alene
motivation.author: Isak

motivation.quote: The second you start looking for hate, you find it. And when you find hate, you start hating.
motivation.author: Isak

motivation.quote: ...And that’s not because they want to be different, but because they’d rather die, than pretend to be someone they’re not.
motivation.author: Eskild

motivation.quote: I stress through the day with a hundred thoughts in my head and everything can be total chaos, but when I start to pray, everything turns silent and clear.
motivation.author: Sana

motivation.quote: It’s very painful to feel heartache and you’ll think its never going to end, but it does.
motivation.author: Eskild

motivation.quote: War doesn’t start with violence. It starts with misunderstandings and prejudice. If you say you’re in favour of a world full of peace you have to try to understand why others think and act the way they do.
motivation.author: Sana

motivation.quote: What is more important, going around saying you believe in Allah or living like you believe in him?
motivation.author: Elias

motivation.quote: You can’t ask us to use our sexuality in exchange for credibility.
motivation.author: Noora

motivation.quote: She’s not crazy, she’s bipolar.
motivation.author: Magnus

motivation.quote: As a kid I had dreams about being successful, thinking it would be cool. Then, when I was in my 20s, I really thought I had it much more figured out than I do now.
motivation.author: Ben Stiller

motivation.quote: Once I hit 25 and exited the coveted 18–24 age bracket, I was like, ‘Whatevs. Just wake me when I’m 30.’ 26 doesn’t feel much different than 25. They seem interchangeable. They leave the same impression. Both feel very young adult.
motivation.author: Ryan O’Connell

motivation.quote: A fully open mind could shatter the skull in both directions.
motivation.author: Henry Flynt

motivation.quote: In my early twenties, I had no idea who I was. And I think that’s one reason you should try different relationships. I’ve had good and bad ones, but I took away things from them that helped me become who I am.
motivation.author: Cobie Smulders

motivation.quote: Were you to live three thousand years, or even thirty thousand, remember that the sole life which a man can lose is that which he is living at the moment…he can have no other life than the one he loses. For the passing minute is every man’s equal possession, but what has once gone by is not ours
motivation.author: Marcus Aurelius

motivation.quote: Many of the anxieties that harass you are superfluous… Expand into an ampler region, letting your thought sweep over the entire universe
motivation.author: Marcus Aurelius

motivation.quote: The way you train reflects the way you fight. People say I’m not going to train too hard, I’m going to do this in training, but when it’s time to fight I’m going to step up. There is no step up. You’re just going to do what you did every day

motivation.quote: You don’t "discover" your place in the world. You carve it out

motivation.quote: Winners focus on winning. Losers focus on winners

motivation.quote: Winners never quit and quitters never win

motivation.quote: Learn to be happy with the endless try/fail/learn approach. True growth is slow and steady

motivation.quote: There’s no talent here. This is hard work. This is obsession. Talent does not exist

motivation.quote: If it’s endurable, then endure it. Stop complaining

motivation.quote: The extent of the struggle determines the extent of the growth. The obstacle is an advantage, not adversity. The enemy is any perception that prevents us from seeing this

motivation.quote: The less pain we tolerate, the more average we become

motivation.quote: Impatience with actions, patience with results

motivation.quote: The world makes way for the man who knows where he is going

motivation.quote: Never stop just because you feel defeated. The journey to the other side is attainable only after great suffering

motivation.quote: The further the reward from the effort, the thinner the competition. Patience is the gatekeeper

motivation.quote: The people who stick with things for years and never stop almost always win the race

motivation.quote: Go as far as you can see; when you get there you’ll be able to see farther
motivation.author: Thomas Carlyle

motivation.quote: No conqueror believes in chance

motivation.quote: A battle is won by him who is firmly resolved to win it

motivation.quote: Three tips for becoming successful: consistency, consistency, and consistency

motivation.quote: Nothing in this world can take the place of persistence. Talent will not; nothing is more common than unsuccessful men with talent. Genius will not; unrewarded genius is almost a proverb. Education will not; the world is full of educated derelicts. Persistence and determination alone are omnipotent. The slogan Press On! has solved and always will solve the problems of the human race

motivation.quote: Progress means getting nearer to the place you want to be. And if you have taken a wrong turn, then to go forward does not get you any nearer. C.S

motivation.quote: I was taught the way of progress is neither swift nor easy

motivation.quote: There is no downside to endurance. If you can endure more, you can do more

motivation.quote: Character consists of what you do on the third and fourth tries. James A

motivation.quote: What is now proved was once only imagined

motivation.quote: Ask, ‘Why is this so unbearable? Why can’t I endure it?’ You’ll be embarrassed to answer

motivation.quote: If there is no struggle, there is no progress

motivation.quote: Never, never, never, never give up

motivation.quote: Some people want it to happen, some wish it would happen, and others make it happen

motivation.quote: Never give up on what you really want to do. The person with big dreams is more powerful than one with all the facts

motivation.quote: Stand firm, and you will win life

motivation.quote: God will direct you, you will be able to endure

They have other concerns, whether important or not, and they spread themselves out. That’s totally fine. After all, greatness is not for everybody

motivation.quote: One day, the people that didn’t believe in you will tell everyone how they met you

motivation.quote: I did not succeed in life by intelligence. I succeeded because I have a long attention span

motivation.quote: Everybody has a plan until they get punched in the mouth

motivation.quote: Kites rise highest against the wind, not with it

motivation.quote: Looking back over a life of hard work… my only regret is that I didn’t work even harder. H. L

motivation.quote: Persist and persevere, and you will find most things that are attainable, possible

motivation.quote: He conquers who endures

motivation.quote: Persistence pays off

motivation.quote: Rejection is a success tax

motivation.quote: It’s always to soon to quit

motivation.quote: Steep is the way to mastery
motivation.author: Eugen Herrigel

motivation.quote: Work without hope or despair
motivation.author: The School of Life

motivation.quote: We learn to endure by enduring
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: Care the most. Succeed the most
motivation.author: Maxime Lagacé

motivation.quote: I am not talented, I am obsessed
motivation.author: Conor McGregor

motivation.quote: We will either find a way or make one
motivation.author: Hannibal (247 BC)

motivation.quote: You can’t lose if you don’t quit. Stephen C

motivation.quote: Inner strength isn’t "found" it’s created

motivation.quote: By perseverance the snail reached the ark
motivation.author: Charles Spurgeon

motivation.quote: Perseverance and perspective until victory
motivation.author: Lincoln Diaz-Balart

motivation.quote: Growth is overrated. Endurance is underrated

motivation.quote: Become comfortable with permanent uncertainty

motivation.quote: But the one who endures to the end will be saved

motivation.quote: The seeds of greatness are planted in the daily grind

motivation.quote: Perseverance is failing 19 times and succeeding the 20th

motivation.quote: There is no substitute for determination, perseverance, and planning
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: You are the person you have been waiting for

motivation.quote: The great end of life is not knowledge but action
motivation.author: Francis Bacon

motivation.quote: It’s not what we do once in a while that shapes our lives. It’s what we do consistently

motivation.quote: You’re a winner if you keep your head up. You’re a warrior if you keep fighting forever

motivation.quote: The secret to genius is not genetics but daily practice married with relentless perseverance

motivation.quote: Let me not pray to be sheltered from dangers, but to be fearless in facing them. Let me not beg for the stilling of my pain, but for the heart to conquer it

motivation.quote: Before you dream about the view from the summit, ask yourself if you’re willing to keep your head down, focus on the path, and spend your life walking up the side of a very big hill. It takes years of walking to earn a minute at the top

motivation.quote: Blessed is the one who perseveres under trial because, having stood the test, that person will receive the crown of life
motivation.author: James 1:12

motivation.quote: We are afflicted in every way, but not crushed; perplexed, but not driven to despair; persecuted, but not forsaken; struck down, but not destroyed
motivation.author: 2 Corinthians 4:8

motivation.quote: Show up. Show up when it’s hard. Show up when you’re scared. Just keep showing up. Show them your truth. Do it by showing up and not backing down

motivation.quote: The key to success isn’t studying. The key to success isn’t being rich or coming from a good family or having the right education. The key to success is putting one foot in front of the other, even when you’re scared out of your mind. The key to success is never f*cking giving up

motivation.quote: When you think that you are done, you’re only 40% in to what your body’s capable of doing. That’s just the limits that we put on ourselves

motivation.quote: A savage mindset is a conditioned mindset that knows quitting is not part of the plan. It knows that it has to find a way around any and all obstacles to complete the mission

motivation.quote: Failure is often that early morning hour of darkness which precedes the dawning of the day of success
motivation.author: Leigh Mitchell Hodges

motivation.quote: A lot of successful people who say "work smart, not hard" worked like dogs to get established
motivation.author: Michael

motivation.quote: If you’re willing to bleed a little every day, you may win big later
motivation.author: Naval Ravikant

motivation.quote: You will receive most when you will expect least
motivation.author: Santosh Kalwar

motivation.quote: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop
motivation.author: Confucius

motivation.quote: I don’t have talent, so I just get up earlier
motivation.author: Henry Rollins

motivation.quote: A crowbar is a universal pass key
motivation.author: Terry Pratchett

motivation.quote: That’s one of the remarkable things about life. It’s never so bad that it can’t get worse
motivation.author: Bill Watterson (Calvin and Hobbes)

motivation.quote: Even in the mud and scum of things, something always, always sings
motivation.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

motivation.quote: I am extraordinarily patient, provided I get my own way in the end
motivation.author: Margaret Thatcher

motivation.quote: I am a slow walker, but I never walk back
motivation.author: Abraham Lincoln

motivation.quote: You don’t get to choose not to pay a price, you only get to choose which price you pay
motivation.author: Jordan Peterson

motivation.quote: Once you learn to quit, it becomes a habit
motivation.author: Vince Lombardi

motivation.quote: If you believe talent exists, you’re limiting yourself. If you believe luck exists, you’re lazy. If you believe in yourself, you’re wise
motivation.author: Maxime Lagacé

motivation.quote: Superhuman effort…isn’t worth a damn unless it achieves results
motivation.author: Ernest Shackleton

motivation.quote: Obstinacy is the result of the will forcing itself into the place of the intellect
motivation.author: Arthur Schopenhauer

motivation.quote: Luck can be created. Build your character until luck becomes your destiny
motivation.author: Bill Masur

motivation.quote: Somebody out there thinks you’re an idiot. Somebody out there thinks you’re brilliant. Ignore them both and carry on
motivation.author: Jack Butcher

motivation.quote: Being a founder is hard. Being an early employee is hard. Being a VC is hard. Being a politician is hard. Being an engineer is hard. Being a writer is hard. Being a friend is hard. Being a partner is hard. Being a parent is hard. It’s all hard. Life is hard, and then you die
motivation.author: Sahil Lavingia

motivation.quote: You can’t guarantee your success, but you can guarantee your failure. Don’t give up, and you cannot fail
motivation.author: Sahil Lavingia

motivation.quote: When I reach the place of my dreams, I will thank my failures and tears. They too, kept me going
motivation.author: Dodinsky (In the Garden of Thoughts)

motivation.quote: Routine, repetition, tedium, monotony, ephemeracy, inconsequence, abstraction, disorder, boredom, angst, ennui – these are the true hero’s enemies, and make no mistake, they are fearsome indeed. For they are real
motivation.author: David Foster Wallace (The Pale King)

motivation.quote: Perseverance is not a long race; it is many short races one after another
motivation.author: Walter Elliott

motivation.quote: Everyone wants some magic pill – some life hack – that eliminates the need to do the work. But that does not exist
motivation.author: Jocko Willink

motivation.quote: You don’t need an easier life, but rather an attitude of perseverance. Attitude precedes outcome
motivation.author: James Clear

motivation.quote: For water continually dropping will wear hard rocks hollow
motivation.author: Plutarch

motivation.quote: A bend in the road is not the end of the road… Unless you fail to make the turn
motivation.author: Helen Keller

motivation.quote: If you don’t know yourself, you don’t know what you love. If you don’t know what you love, you can’t persevere
motivation.author: Maxime Lagacé

motivation.quote: It’s hard to prioritize the long term when you think you should feel comfortable in every moment
motivation.author: Michael

motivation.quote: Error is inevitable. Persisting in it is not
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: Bad persistence: Endlessly doing the same thing with no success. Good persistence: Continuously tweaking your approach until you get results
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: Hard lessons are hard to forget. Let hardship be a source of knowledge, not bitterness. Wisdom is hard-won
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: The most useful form of patience is persistence. Patience implies waiting for things to improve on their own. Persistence implies keeping your head down and continuing to work when things take longer than you expect
motivation.author: James Clear

motivation.quote: You might be winning but you’re not growing, and growing might be the most important form of winning
motivation.author: Jordan Peterson

motivation.quote: If you are on the wrong road, progress means doing an about-turn and walking back to the right road; and in that case the man who turns back soonest is the most progressive man. C.S
motivation.author: Lewis

motivation.quote: You don’t control the outcome. You control the quality of effort you put in. That’s what you should hold yourself accountable for
motivation.author: Shane Parrish

motivation.quote: If you’re focused on the outcome, you’re not focused on the process. Sustain success over long periods comes from a fanatical focus on process. You don’t need to be perfect, just better than yesterday
motivation.author: Shane Parrish

motivation.quote: Learn to maintain your objectivity, especially when it’s hardest
motivation.author: Shane Parrish

motivation.quote: We must undergo a hard winter training and not rush into things for which we haven’t prepared
motivation.author: Epictetus

motivation.quote: It is not enough that we do our best; sometimes we must do what is required
motivation.author: Winston Churchill

motivation.quote: The brick walls are there for a reason. The brick walls are not there to keep us out. The brick walls are there to give us a chance to show how badly we want something. Because the brick walls are there to stop the people who don’t want it badly enough. They’re there to stop the other people
motivation.author: Randy Pausch

motivation.quote: Accept yourself, love yourself, and keep moving forward. If you want to fly, you have to give up what weighs you down.
motivation.author: Roy T. Bennett

motivation.quote: Do what is right, not what is easy nor what is popular.
motivation.author: Roy T. Bennett

motivation.quote: Life is too short to waste your time on people who don’t respect, appreciate, and value you.
motivation.author: Roy T. Bennett

motivation.quote: Dare to BeWhen a new day begins, dare to smile gratefully.When there is darkness, dare to be the first to shine a light.When there is injustice, dare to be the first to condemn it.When something seems difficult, dare to do it anyway.When life seems to beat you down, dare to fight back.When there seems to be no hope, dare to find some.When you’re feeling tired, dare to keep going.When times are tough, dare to be tougher.When love hurts you, dare to love again.When someone is hurting, dare to help them heal.When another is lost, dare to help them find the way.When a friend falls, dare to be the first to extend a hand.When you cross paths with another, dare to make them smile.When you feel great, dare to help someone else feel great too.When the day has ended, dare to feel as you’ve done your best.Dare to be the best you can –At all times, Dare to be!
motivation.author: Steve Maraboli

motivation.quote: Live the Life of Your Dreams: Be brave enough to live the life of your dreams according to your vision and purpose instead of the expectations and opinions of others.
motivation.author: Roy T. Bennett

motivation.quote: The past is a place of reference, not a place of residence; the past is a place of learning, not a place of living.
motivation.author: Roy T. Bennett

motivation.quote: A painter should begin every canvas with a wash of black, because all things in nature are dark except where exposed by the light.
motivation.author: Leonardo da Vinci

motivation.quote: A woman's heart should be so hidden in God that a man has to seek Him just to find her.
motivation.author: Max Lucado

motivation.quote: It's kind of fun to do the impossible.
motivation.author: Walt Disney

motivation.quote: Pain is temporary. Quitting lasts forever.
motivation.author: Lance Armstrong Sally Jenkins

motivation.quote: The most important kind of freedom is to be what you really are. You trade in your reality for a role. You trade in your sense for an act. You give up your ability to feel, and in exchange, put on a mask. There can't be any large-scale revolution until there's a personal revolution, on an individual level. It's got to happen inside first.
motivation.author: Jim MORRISON

motivation.quote: Don't be afraid of your fears. They're not there to scare you. They're there to let you know that something is worth it.
motivation.author: C. JoyBell C.

motivation.quote: When I was a little girl I used to read fairy tales. In fairy tales you meet Prince Charming and he's everything you ever wanted. In fairy tales the bad guy is very easy to spot. The bad guy is always wearing a black cape so you always know who he is. Then you grow up and you realize that Prince Charming is not as easy to find as you thought. You realize the bad guy is not wearing a black cape and he's not easy to spot; he's really funny, and he makes you laugh, and he has perfect hair.
motivation.author: Taylor Swift

motivation.quote: I was smiling yesterday,I am smiling today and I will smile tomorrow.Simply because life is too short to cry for anything.
motivation.author: Santosh Kalwar

motivation.quote: You never fail until you stop trying.
motivation.author: Albert Einstein

motivation.quote: All the darkness in the world cannot extinguish the light of a single candle.
motivation.author: St. Francis Of Assisi

motivation.quote: If you want to forget something or someone, never hate it, or never hate him/her. Everything and everyone that you hate is engraved upon your heart; if you want to let go of something, if you want to forget, you cannot hate.
motivation.author: C. JoyBell C.

motivation.quote: HopeSmiles from the threshold of the year to come, Whispering 'it will be happier'...
motivation.author: Alfred Lord Tennyson

motivation.quote: The Chinese use two brush strokes to write the word 'crisis.' One brush stroke stands for danger; the other for opportunity. In a crisis, be aware of the danger--but recognize the opportunity.
motivation.author: John F. Kennedy

motivation.quote: Life becomes easier and more beautiful when we can see the good in other people.
motivation.author: Roy T. Bennett

motivation.quote: Don't let the expectations and opinions of other people affect your decisions. It's your life, not theirs. Do what matters most to you; do what makes you feel alive and happy. Don't let the expectations and ideas of others limit who you are. If you let others tell you who you are, you are living their reality — not yours. There is more to life than pleasing people. There is much more to life than following others' prescribed path. There is so much more to life than what you experience right now. You need to decide who you are for yourself. Become a whole being. Adventure.
motivation.author: Roy T. Bennett

motivation.quote: Stories never really end...even if the books like to pretend they do. Stories always go on. They don't end on the last page, any more than they begin on the first page.
motivation.author: Cornelia Funke

motivation.quote: Why didn't I learn to treat everything like it was the last time. My greatest regret was how much I believed in the future.
motivation.author: Jonathan Safran Foer

motivation.quote: To see a World in a Grain of Sand And a Heaven in a Wild Flower, Hold Infinity in the palm of your hand And Eternity in an hour.
motivation.author: William Blake

motivation.quote: Make improvements, not excuses. Seek respect, not attention.
motivation.author: Roy T. Bennett

motivation.quote: You're off to Great Places!Today is your day!Your mountain is waiting,So... get on your way!
motivation.author: Dr. Seuss

motivation.quote: Believe in yourself. You are braver than you think, more talented than you know, and capable of more than you imagine.
motivation.author: Roy T. Bennett

motivation.quote: We have to allow ourselves to be loved by the people who really love us, the people who really matter. Too much of the time, we are blinded by our own pursuits of people to love us, people that don't even matter, while all that time we waste and the people who do love us have to stand on the sidewalk and watch us beg in the streets! It's time to put an end to this. It's time for us to let ourselves be loved.
motivation.author: C. JoyBell C.

motivation.quote: Don't say you don't have enough time. You have exactly the same number of hours per day that were given to Helen Keller, Pasteur, Michelangelo, Mother Teresa, Leonardo da Vinci, Thomas Jefferson, and Albert Einstein.
motivation.author: H. Jackson Brown Jr.

motivation.quote: You've gotta dance like there's nobody watching,Love like you'll never be hurt,Sing like there's nobody listening,And live like it's heaven on earth.
motivation.author: William W. Purkey

motivation.quote: Without music, life would be a mistake.
motivation.author: Friedrich Nietzsche
