Why not you?Today, for many the burden of self doubt and insecurity will be lifted by the security and confidence of empowerment. Why not you?Today, many will rise above their believed limitations and make contact with their powerful innate strength. Why not you?Today, many will choose to live in such a manner that they will be a positive role model for their children. Why not you?Today, many will choose to free themselves from the personal imprisonment of their bad habits. Why not you?Today, many will choose to live free of conditions and rules governing their own happiness. Why not you?Today, many will find abundance in simplicity. Why not you?Today, many will be confronted by difficult moral choices and they will choose to do what is right instead of what is beneficial. Why not you?Today, many will decide to no longer sit back with a victim mentality, but to take charge of their lives and make positive changes. Why not you?Today, many will take the action necessary to make a difference. Why not you?Today, many will make the commitment to be a better mother, father, son, daughter, student, teacher, worker, boss, brother, sister, & so much more. Why not you?Today is a new day!Many will seize this day.Many will live it to the fullest.Why not you?
motivation.author: Steve Maraboli

motivation.quote: the time is always right to do the right thing
motivation.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

motivation.quote: It takes sunshine and rain to make a rainbow. There would be no rainbows without sunshine and rain.
motivation.author: Roy T. Bennett

motivation.quote: The best relationships in our lives are the best not because they have been the happiest ones, they are that way because they have stayed strong through the most tormentful of storms.
motivation.author: Pandora Poikilos

motivation.quote: When one has a grateful heart, life is so beautiful.
motivation.author: Roy T. Bennett

motivation.quote: We cannot be sure of having something to live for unless we are willing to die for it.
motivation.author: Che Guevara

motivation.quote: Life begins on the other side of despair.
motivation.author: Jean-Paul Sartre

motivation.quote: They laugh at me because I'm different; I laugh at them because they're all the same.
motivation.author: Kurt Cobain

motivation.quote: Do you really want to be happy? You can begin by being appreciative of who you are and what you've got.
motivation.author: Benjamin Hoff

motivation.quote: The first rule is to keep an untroubled spirit. The second is to look things in the face and know them for what they are.
motivation.author: Marcus Aurelius

motivation.quote: Know thyself.
motivation.author: Socrates

motivation.quote: If my mind can conceive it, and my heart can believe it - then I can achieve it.
motivation.author: Muhammad Ali

motivation.quote: I am always doing what I cannot do yet, in order to learn how to do it.
motivation.author: Vincent Van Gogh

motivation.quote: People have only as much liberty as they have the intelligence to want and the courage to take.
motivation.author: Emma Goldman

motivation.quote: The place God calls you to is the place where your deep gladness and the world’s deep hunger meet.
motivation.author: Frederick Buechner

motivation.quote: Do you know what you are?You are a manuscript oƒ a divine letter.You are a mirror reflecting a noble face. This universe is not outside of you. Look inside yourself;everything that you want, you are already that.
motivation.author: Rumi

motivation.quote: I’ve come to the conclusion that people who wear headphones while they walk, are much happier, more confident, and more beautiful individuals than someone making the solitary drudge to work without acknowledging their own interests and power.
motivation.author: Jason Mraz

motivation.quote: If nature has made you for a giver, your hands are born open, and so is your heart; and though there may be times when your hands are empty, your heart is always full, and you can give things out of that—warm things, kind things, sweet things—help and comfort and laughter—and sometimes gay, kind laughter is the best help of all.
motivation.author: Frances Hodgson Burnett

motivation.quote: The truth knocks on the door and you say, "Go away, I'm looking for the truth," and so it goes away. Puzzling.
motivation.author: Robert M. Pirsig

motivation.quote: I would rather make mistakes in kindness and compassion than work miracles in unkindness and hardness.
motivation.author: Mother Teresa

motivation.quote: We don't receive wisdom; we must discover it for ourselves after a journey that no one can take for us or spare us.
motivation.author: Marcel Proust

motivation.quote: Words can never fully say what we want them to say, for they fumble, stammer, and break the best porcelain. The best one can hope for is to find along the way someone to share the path, content to walk in silence, for the heart communes best when it does not try to speak.
motivation.author: Margaret Weis

motivation.quote: Until you step into the unknown, you don’t know what you’re made of.
motivation.author: Roy T. Bennett

motivation.quote: There is a legend about a bird which sings just once in its life, more sweetly than any other creature on the face of the earth. From the moment it leaves the nest it searches for a thorn tree, and does not rest until it has found one. Then, singing among the savage branches, it impales itself upon the longest, sharpest spine. And, dying, it rises above its own agony to outcarol the lark and the nightingale. One superlative song, existence the price. But the whole world stills to listen, and God in His heaven smiles. For the best is only bought at the cost of great pain… Or so says the legend.
motivation.author: Colleen McCullough

motivation.quote: And if my heart be scarred and burned,The safer, I, for all I learned.
motivation.author: Dorothy Parker

motivation.quote: All I ask is one thing, and I’m asking this particularly of young people: please don’t be cynical. I hate cynicism, for the record, it’s my least favorite quality and it doesn’t lead anywhere. Nobody in life gets exactly what they thought they were going to get. But if you work really hard and you’re kind, amazing things will happen.
motivation.author: Conan O'Brien

motivation.quote: She lacks confidence, she craves admiration insatiably. She lives on the reflections of herself in the eyes of others. She does not dare to be herself.
motivation.author: Anaïs Nin

motivation.quote: Hearing voices no one else can hear isn't a good sign, even in the wizarding world.
motivation.author: J.K. Rowling

motivation.quote: Nothing makes a person happier than having a happy heart.
motivation.author: Roy T. Bennett

motivation.quote: In friendship...we think we have chosen our peers. In reality a few years' difference in the dates of our births, a few more miles between certain houses, the choice of one university instead of another...the accident of a topic being raised or not raised at a first meeting--any of these chances might have kept us apart. But, for a Christian, there are, strictly speaking no chances. A secret master of ceremonies has been at work. Christ, who said to the disciples, "Ye have not chosen me, but I have chosen you," can truly say to every group of Christian friends, "Ye have not chosen one another but I have chosen you for one another." The friendship is not a reward for our discriminating and good taste in finding one another out. It is the instrument by which God reveals to each of us the beauties of others.
motivation.author: C.S. Lewis

motivation.quote: The place to improve the world is first in one's own heart and head and hands, and then work outward from there.
motivation.author: Robert M. Pirsig

motivation.quote: So many people live within unhappy circumstances and yet will not take the initiative to change their situation because they are conditioned to a life of security, conformity, and conservatism, all of which may appear to give one peace of mind, but in reality nothing is more dangerous to the adventurous spirit within a man than a secure future. The very basic core of a man’s living spirit is his passion for adventure. The joy of life comes from our encounters with new experiences, and hence there is no greater joy than to have an endlessly changing horizon, for each day to have a new and different sun.
motivation.author: Jon Krakauer

motivation.quote: Adapt what is useful, reject what is useless, and add what is specifically your own.
motivation.author: Bruce Lee

motivation.quote: Fear doesn't shut you down; it wakes you up. I've seen it. It's fascinating." He releases me but doesn't pull away, his hand grazing my jaw, my neck. "Sometimes I just...want to see it again. Want to see you awake.
motivation.author: Veronica Roth

motivation.quote: If you don’t give up on something you truly believe in, you will find a way.
motivation.author: Roy T. Bennett

motivation.quote: Where your treasure is, there will your heart be also.
motivation.author: Anonymous

motivation.quote: No man chooses evil because it is evil; he only mistakes it for happiness, the good he seeks.
motivation.author: Mary Shelley

motivation.quote: The strength of a woman is not measured by the impact that all her hardships in life have had on her; but the strength of a woman is measured by the extent of her refusal to allow those hardships to dictate her and who she becomes.
motivation.author: C. JoyBell C.

motivation.quote: I've had a lot of worries in my life, most of which never happened.
motivation.author: Mark Twain

motivation.quote: I do not believe in taking the right decision, I take a decision and make it right.
motivation.author: Muhammad Ali Jinnah

motivation.quote: Remember tonight... for it is the beginning of always
motivation.author: Dante

motivation.quote: One of the most spiritual things you can do is embrace your humanity. Connect with those around you today. Say, "I love you", "I'm sorry", "I appreciate you", "I'm proud of you"...whatever you're feeling. Send random texts, write a cute note, embrace your truth and share it...cause a smile today for someone else...and give plenty of hugs.
motivation.author: Steve Maraboli

motivation.quote: He is free to evade reality, he is free to unfocus his mind and stumble blindly down any road he pleases, but not free to avoid the abyss he refuses to see.
motivation.author: Ayn Rand

motivation.quote: Get up, stand up, Stand up for your rights. Get up, stand up, Don't give up the fight.
motivation.author: Bob Marley

motivation.quote: When you hold a grudge, you want someone else’s sorrow to reflect your level of hurt but the two rarely meet.
motivation.author: Steve Maraboli

motivation.quote: My happiness is not the means to any end. It is the end. It is its own goal. It is its own purpose.
motivation.author: Ayn Rand

motivation.quote: Be the positive impact on the lives of others.
motivation.author: Roy T. Bennett

motivation.quote: It [feminism] is mixed up with a muddled idea that women are free when they serve their employers but slaves when they help their husbands.
motivation.author: G.K. Chesterton

motivation.quote: The only position that leaves me with no cognitive dissonance is atheism. It is not a creed. Death is certain, replacing both the siren-song of Paradise and the dread of Hell. Life on this earth, with all its mystery and beauty and pain, is then to be lived far more intensely: we stumble and get up, we are sad, confident, insecure, feel loneliness and joy and love. There is nothing more; but I want nothing more.
motivation.author: Ayaan Hirsi Ali

motivation.quote: Life's great happiness is to be convinced we are loved.
motivation.author: Victor Hugo

motivation.quote: Start by doing what is necessary, then what is possible, and suddenly you are doing the impossible.
motivation.author: St. Francis Of Assisi

motivation.quote: Do not worry about your difficulties in Mathematics. I can assure you mine are still greater.
motivation.author: Albert Einstein

motivation.quote: A rock pile ceases to be a rock pile the moment a single man contemplates it, bearing within him the image of a cathedral.
motivation.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupery

motivation.quote: Don't confuse poor decision-making with destiny. Own your mistakes. It’s ok; we all make them. Learn from them so they can empower you!
motivation.author: Steve Maraboli

motivation.quote: Everything will turn out right, the world is built on that.
motivation.author: Mikhail Bulgakov

motivation.quote: I’m bored’ is a useless thing to say. I mean, you live in a great, big, vast world that you’ve seen none percent of. Even the inside of your own mind is endless; it goes on forever, inwardly, do you understand? The fact that you’re alive is amazing, so you don’t get to say ‘I’m bored.
motivation.author: Louis C.K.

motivation.quote: Discipline Your Mind to Think Positively: Discipline your mind to see the good in every situation and look on the best side of every event.
motivation.author: Roy T. Bennett

motivation.quote: Focus on your goals, not your fear. Focus like a laser beam on your goals.
motivation.author: Roy T. Bennett

motivation.quote: How far that little candle throws his beams! So shines a good deed in a weary world.
motivation.author: William Shakespeare

motivation.quote: Start a huge, foolish project, like Noah…it makes absolutely no difference what people think of you.
motivation.author: Rumi

motivation.quote: Don’t let others tell you what you can’t do. Don't let the limitations of others limit your vision. If you can remove your self-doubt and believe in yourself, you can achieve what you never thought possible.
motivation.author: Roy T. Bennett

motivation.quote: The universe is made of stories, not of atoms.
motivation.author: Muriel Rukeyser

motivation.quote: The truth is that the world is full of dragons, and none of us are as powerful or cool as we’d like to be. And that sucks. But when you’re confronted with that fact, you can either crawl into a hole and quit, or you can get out there, take off your shoes, and Bilbo it up.
motivation.author: Patrick Rothfuss

motivation.quote: If you dont have any shadows you're not in the light
motivation.author: Lady Gaga

motivation.quote: Seindah apa pun huruf terukir, dapatkah ia bermakna apabila tak ada jeda? Dapatkan ia dimengerti jika tak ada spasi? Bukankah kita baru bisa bergerak jika ada jarak? Dan saling menyayang bila ada ruang?
motivation.author: dee

motivation.quote: Life doesn’t get easier or more forgiving, we get stronger and more resilient.
motivation.author: Steve Maraboli

motivation.quote: Remember, if you ever need a helping hand, it's at the end of your arm, as you get older, remember you have another hand: The first is to help yourself, the second is to help others.
motivation.author: Sam Levenson

motivation.quote: I trust that everything happens for a reason, even if we are not wise enough to see it.
motivation.author: Oprah Winfrey

motivation.quote: The tears of the world are a constant quantity. For each one who begins to weep somewhere else another stops. The same is true of the laugh.
motivation.author: Samuel Beckett

motivation.quote: All I can be is me- whoever that is.
motivation.author: Bob Dylan

motivation.quote: Without leaps of imagination or dreaming, we lose the excitement of possibilities. Dreaming, after all is a form of planning.
motivation.author: Gloria Steinem

motivation.quote: You are not the victim of the world, but rather the master of your own destiny. It is your choices and decisions that determine your destiny.
motivation.author: Roy T. Bennett

motivation.quote: I want to live my life in such a way that when I get out of bed in the morning, the devil says, "aw shit, he's up!
motivation.author: Steve Maraboli

motivation.quote: In the end, you have to choose whether or not to trust someone.
motivation.author: Sophie Kinsella

motivation.quote: Anger is like flowing water; there's nothing wrong with it as long as you let it flow. Hate is like stagnant water; anger that you denied yourself the freedom to feel, the freedom to flow; water that you gathered in one place and left to forget. Stagnant water becomes dirty, stinky, disease-ridden, poisonous, deadly; that is your hate. On flowing water travels little paper boats; paper boats of forgiveness. Allow yourself to feel anger, allow your waters to flow, along with all the paper boats of forgiveness. Be human.
motivation.author: C. JoyBell C.

motivation.quote: We are the music-makers,And we are the dreamers of dreams,Wandering by lone sea-breakers,And sitting by desolate streams.World-losers and world-forsakers,Upon whom the pale moon gleams;Yet we are the movers and shakers,Of the world forever, it seems.
motivation.author: Arthur O'Shaughnessy

motivation.quote: I read somewhere... how important it is in life not necessarily to be strong, but to feel strong... to measure yourself at least once.
motivation.author: Jon Krakauer

motivation.quote: الخيال.. هو ليل الحياة الجميلهو حصننا وملاذنا من قسوة النهار الطويل!إن عالم "الواقع" لا يكفى وحده لحياة البشر إنه أضيق من أن يتسع لحياة إنسانية كاملة
motivation.author: توفيق الحكيم

motivation.quote: This life is yours. Take the power to choose what you want to do and do it well. Take the power to love what you want in life and love it honestly. Take the power to walk in the forest and be a part of nature. Take the power to control your own life. No one else can do it for you. Take the power to make your life happy.
motivation.author: Susan Polis Schutz

motivation.quote: I am seeking, I am striving, I am in it with all my heart.
motivation.author: Vincent van Gogh

motivation.quote: My task, which I am trying to achieve is, by the power of the written word, to make you hear, to make you feel--it is, before all, to make you see.
motivation.author: Joseph Conrad

motivation.quote: Being brave is when you have to do something because you know it is right, but at the same time, you are afraid to do it, because it might hurt or whatever. But you do it anyway.
motivation.author: Meg Cabot

motivation.quote: There's nothing wrong with you. There's a lot wrong with the world you live in. And definitely get out of high school and make everyone sorry.
motivation.author: Chris Colfer

motivation.quote: Not knowing you can't do something, is sometimes all it takes to do it.
motivation.author: Ally Carter

motivation.quote: I'll think of it tomorrow, at Tara. I can stand it then. Tomorrow, I'll think of some way to get him back. After all, tomorrow is another day.
motivation.author: Margaret Mitchell

motivation.quote: The fishermen know that the sea is dangerous and the storm terrible, but they have never found these dangers sufficient reason for remaining ashore.
motivation.author: Vincent Van Gogh

motivation.quote: No life is a waste," the Blue Man said. "The only time we waste is the time we spend thinking we're alone.
motivation.author: Mitch Albom

motivation.quote: A smart person knows how to talk. A wise person knows when to be silent.
motivation.author: Roy T. Bennett

motivation.quote: If we ever forget that we're one nation under God, then we will be one nation gone under.
motivation.author: Ronald Reagan

motivation.quote: Friendship with oneself is all important, because without it one cannot be friends with anyone else in the world.
motivation.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

motivation.quote: I'm going to paraphrase Thoreau here... rather than love, than money, than faith, than fame, than fairness... give me truth.
motivation.author: Jon Krakauer

motivation.quote: It doesn’t matter how many times you get knocked down. All that matters is you get up one more time than you were knocked down.
motivation.author: Roy T. Bennett

motivation.quote: E.L. Doctorow said once said that 'Writing a novel is like driving a car at night. You can see only as far as your headlights, but you can make the whole trip that way.' You don't have to see where you're going, you don't have to see your destination or everything you will pass along the way. You just have to see two or three feet ahead of you. This is right up there with the best advice on writing, or life, I have ever heard.
motivation.author: Anne Lamott

motivation.quote: Failure is a bend in the road, not the end of the road. Learn from failure and keep moving forward.
motivation.author: Roy T. Bennett

motivation.quote: It takes guts and humility to admit mistakes. Admitting we're wrong is courage, not weakness.
motivation.author: Roy T. Bennett

motivation.quote: Desperation is the raw material of drastic change. Only those who can leave behind everything they have ever believed in can hope to escape.
motivation.author: William S. Burroughs

motivation.quote: I am always doing that which I can not do, in order that I may learn how to do it.
motivation.author: Pablo Picasso

motivation.quote: What would you do if you weren't afraid?
motivation.author: Sheryl Sandberg

motivation.quote: You get in life what you have the courage to ask for.
motivation.author: Oprah Winfrey

motivation.quote: I offer you peace. I offer you love. I offer you friendship. I see your beauty. I hear your need. I feel your feelings.
motivation.author: Mahatma Gandhi

motivation.quote: You come of the Lord Adam and the Lady Eve," said Aslan. "And that is both honour enough to erect the head of the poorest beggar, and shame enough to bow the shoulders of the greatest emperor on earth. Be content.
motivation.author: C.S. Lewis

motivation.quote: I have learned that you can go anywhere you want to go and do anything you want to do and buy all the things that you want to buy and meet all the people that you want to meet and learn all the things that you desire to learn and if you do all these things but are not madly in love: you have still not begun to live.
motivation.author: C. JoyBell C.

motivation.quote: You can't connect the dots looking forward; you can only connect them looking backwards. So you have to trust that the dots will somehow connect in your future.
motivation.author: Steve Jobs

motivation.quote: Somehow, we'll find it. The balance between whom we wish to be and whom we need to be. But for now, we simply have to be satisfied with who we are.
motivation.author: Brandon Sanderson

motivation.quote: So tonight I reach for my journal again. This is the first time I’ve done this since I came to Italy. What I write in my journal is that I am weak and full of fear. I explain that Depression and Loneliness have shown up, and I’m scared they will never leave. I say that I don’t want to take the drugs anymore, but I’m frightened I will have to. I am terrified that I will never really pull my life together. In response, somewhere from within me, rises a now-familiar presence, offering me all the certainties I have always wished another person would say to me when I was troubled. This is what I find myself writing on the page:I’m here. I love you. I don’t care if you need to stay up crying all night long. I will stay with you. If you need the medication again, go ahead and take it—I will love you through that, as well. If you don’t need the medication, I will love you, too. There’s nothing you can ever do to lose my love. I will protect you until you die, and after your death I will still protect you. I am stronger than Depression and Braver than Loneliness and nothing will ever exhaust me. Tonight, this strange interior gesture of friendship—the lending of a hand fromme to myself when nobody else is around to offer solace—reminds me of something that happened to me once in New York City. I walked into an office building one afternoon in a hurry, dashed into the waiting elevator. As I rushed in, I caught an unexpected glance of myself in a security mirror’s reflection. In that moment, my brain did an odd thing—it fired off this split-second message: "Hey! You know her! That’s a friend of yours!" And I actually ran forward toward my own reflection with a smile, ready to welcome that girl whose name I had lost but whose face was so familiar. In a flash instant of course, I realized my mistake and laughed in embarrassment at my almost doglike confusion over how a mirror works. But for some reason that incident comes to mind again tonight during my sadness in Rome, and I find myself writing this comforting reminder at the bottom of the page. Never forget that once upon a time, in an unguarded moment, you recognized yourself as a FRIEND…I fell asleep holding my notebook pressed against my chest, open to this most recent assurance. In the morning when I wake up, I can still smell a faint trace of depression’s lingering smoke, but he himself is nowhere to be seen. Somewhere during the night, he got up and left. And his buddy loneliness beat it, too.
motivation.author: Elizabeth Gilbert

motivation.quote: If we all did the things we are really capable of doing, we would literally astound ourselves.
motivation.author: Thomas A. Edison

motivation.quote: The world is so empty if one thinks only of mountains, rivers & cities; but to know someone who thinks & feels with us, & who, though distant, is close to us in spirit, this makes the earth for us an inhabited garden.
motivation.author: Goethe

motivation.quote: Let us always meet each other with smile, for the smile is the beginning of love.
motivation.author: Mother Teresa

motivation.quote: The way I see it, if you want the rainbow, you gotta put up with the rain!
motivation.author: Dolly Parton

motivation.quote: Don’t wait for things to happen. Make them happen.
motivation.author: Roy T. Bennett

motivation.quote: Before, I wanted to say: "I found love!" But now, I want to say: "I found a person. And he belongs to me and I belong to him.
motivation.author: C. JoyBell C.

motivation.quote: Your sacred space is where you can find yourself over and over again.
motivation.author: Joseph Campbell

motivation.quote: What you stay focused on will grow.
motivation.author: Roy T. Bennett

motivation.quote: You learn something valuable from all of the significant events and people, but you never touch your true potential until you challenge yourself to go beyond imposed limitations.
motivation.author: Roy T. Bennett

motivation.quote: The only limits for tomorrow are the doubts we have today.
motivation.author: Pittacus Lore

motivation.quote: Knowing is not enough, we must apply. Willing is not enough, we must do.
motivation.author: Bruce Lee

motivation.quote: Stop doing what is easy. Start doing what is right.
motivation.author: Roy T. Bennett

motivation.quote: Changing your outside world cannot make you happy if you are an unhappy person. The real personal change can only happen from the inside out. If you firstly create the change within yourself, you can turn your life around.
motivation.author: Roy T. Bennett

motivation.quote: It was like the beginning of life and laughter. It was the real meaning of the sun
motivation.author: Charles Bukowski

motivation.quote: I have no right to say or do anything that diminishes a man in his own eyes. What matters is not what I think of him but what he thinks of himself. Hurting a man in his dignity is a crime.
motivation.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

motivation.quote: The less you associate with some people, the more your life will improve.Any time you tolerate mediocrity in others, it increases your mediocrity. Animportant attribute in successful people is their impatience with negativethinking and negative acting people. As you grow, your associates willchange. Some of your friends will not want you to go on. They will want youto stay where they are. Friends that don't help you climb will want you tocrawl. Your friends will stretch your vision or choke your dream. Those thatdon't increase you will eventually decrease you.Consider this:Never receive counsel from unproductive people. Never discuss your problemswith someone incapable of contributing to the solution, because those whonever succeed themselves are always first to tell you how. Not everyone hasa right to speak into your life. You are certain to get the worst of thebargain when you exchange ideas with the wrong person. Don't follow anyonewho's not going anywhere.With some people you spend an evening: with others you invest it. Be carefulwhere you stop to inquire for directions along the road of life. Wise is theperson who fortifies his life with the right friendships. If you run withwolves, you will learn how to howl. But, if you associate with eagles, youwill learn how to soar to great heights."A mirror reflects a man's face, but what he is really like is shown by thekind of friends he chooses."The simple but true fact of life is that you become like those with whom youclosely associate - for the good and the bad.Note: Be not mistaken. This is applicable to family as well as friends.Yes...do love, appreciate and be thankful for your family, for they willalways be your family no matter what. Just know that they are human firstand though they are family to you, they may be a friend to someone else andwill fit somewhere in the criteria above."In Prosperity Our Friends Know Us. In Adversity We Know Our friends."Never make someone a priority when you are only an option for them."If you are going to achieve excellence in big things,you develop the habit in little matters.Excellence is not an exception, it is a prevailing attitude.."..
motivation.author: Colin Powell

motivation.quote: The beautiful journey of today can only begin when we learn to let go of yesterday.
motivation.author: Steve Maraboli

motivation.quote: He who would learn to fly one day must first learn to walk and run and climb and dance; one cannot fly into flying.
motivation.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

motivation.quote: All great achievements require time.
motivation.author: Maya Angelou

motivation.quote: Faith is the bird that feels the light and sings when the dawn is still dark.
motivation.author: Rabindranath Tagore

motivation.quote: Don't wait for the right moment to start, start and make each moment right.
motivation.author: Roy T. Bennett

motivation.quote: We should not judge people by their peak of excellence; but by the distance they have traveled from the point where they started.
motivation.author: Henry Ward Beecher

motivation.quote: ...Next time you're faced with a choice, do the right thing. It hurts everyone less in the long run.
motivation.author: Wendelin Van Draanen

motivation.quote: Words save our lives, sometimes.
motivation.author: Neil Gaiman

motivation.quote: Hate looks like everybody else until it smiles
motivation.author: Tahereh Mafi

motivation.quote: These people fail to realize that it is on the inside that God must be defended, not on the outside. They should direct their anger at themselves. For evil in the open is but evil from within that has been let out. The main battlefield for good is not the open ground of the public arena but the small clearing of each heart.
motivation.author: Yann Martel

motivation.quote: I don't fit into any stereotypes. And I like myself that way.
motivation.author: C. JoyBell C.

motivation.quote: Good things happen in your life when you surround yourself with positive people.
motivation.author: Roy T. Bennett

motivation.quote: If you want to build a ship, don’t drum up the men to gather wood, divide the work, and give orders. Instead, teach them to yearn for the vast and endless sea.
motivation.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

motivation.quote: Be silent and safe — silence never betrays you; Be true to your word and your work and your friend; Put least trust in him who is foremost to praise you,Nor judge of a road till it draw to the end.
motivation.author: John Boyle O'Reilly

motivation.quote: But the effect of her being on those around her was incalculably diffusive: for the growing good of the world is partly dependent on unhistoric acts; and that things are not so ill with you and me as they might have been, is half owing to the number who lived faithfully a hidden life, and rest in unvisited tombs.
motivation.author: George Eliot

motivation.quote: Believe there is a great power silently working all things for good, behave yourself and never mind the rest.
motivation.author: Beatrix Potter

motivation.quote: It is difficult to live in and enjoy the moment when you are thinking about the past or worrying about the future. You cannot change your past, but you can ruin the present by worrying about your future. Learn from the past, plan for the future. The more you live in and enjoy the present moment, the happier you will be.
motivation.author: Roy T. Bennett

motivation.quote: Maybe this is why we read, and why in moments of darkness we return to books: to find words for what we already know.
motivation.author: Alberto Manguel

motivation.quote: Gratitude builds a bridge to abundance.
motivation.author: Roy T. Bennett

motivation.quote: The universe doesn’t give you what you ask for with your thoughts - it gives you what you demand with your actions.
motivation.author: Steve Maraboli

motivation.quote: To write well, express yourself like the common people, but think like a wise man.
motivation.author: Aristotle

motivation.quote: Happiness cannot be pursued; it must ensue.
motivation.author: Viktor E. Frankl

motivation.quote: If you enter this world knowing you are loved and you leave this world knowing the same, then everything that happens in between can be dealt with.
motivation.author: Michael  Jackson

motivation.quote: Step follows step,Hope follows Courage,Set your face towards danger,Set your heart on victory.
motivation.author: Gail Carson Levine

motivation.quote: Perfectly ImperfectWe have all heard that no two snowflakes are alike. Each snowflake takes the perfect form for the maximum efficiency and effectiveness for its journey. And while the universal force of gravity gives them a shared destination, the expansive space in the air gives each snowflake the opportunity to take their own path. They are on the same journey, but each takes a different path.Along this gravity-driven journey, some snowflakes collide and damage each other, some collide and join together, some are influenced by wind... there are so many transitions and changes that take place along the journey of the snowflake. But, no matter what the transition, the snowflake always finds itself perfectly shaped for its journey. I find parallels in nature to be a beautiful reflection of grand orchestration. One of these parallels is of snowflakes and us. We, too, are all headed in the same direction. We are being driven by a universal force to the same destination. We are all individuals taking different journeys and along our journey, we sometimes bump into each other, we cross paths, we become altered... we take different physical forms. But at all times we too are 100% perfectly imperfect. At every given moment we are absolutely perfect for what is required for our journey. I’m not perfect for your journey and you’re not perfect for my journey, but I’m perfect for my journey and you’re perfect for your journey. We’re heading to the same place, we’re taking different routes, but we’re both exactly perfect the way we are. Think of what understanding this great orchestration could mean for relationships. Imagine interacting with others knowing that they too each share this parallel with the snowflake. Like you, they are headed to the same place and no matter what they may appear like to you, they have taken the perfect form for their journey. How strong our relationships would be if we could see and respect that we are all perfectly imperfect for our journey.
motivation.author: Steve Maraboli

motivation.quote: Do not dare not to dare.
motivation.author: C.S. Lewis

motivation.quote: This is my simple religion. There is no need for temples; no need for complicated philosophy. Our own brain, our own heart is our temple; the philosophy is kindness.
motivation.author: Dalai Lama XIV

motivation.quote: Scars are just another kind of memory.
motivation.author: M.L. Stedman

motivation.quote: If a man is to shed the light of the sun upon other men, he must first of all have it within himself.
motivation.author: Romain Rolland

motivation.quote: We stood there, looking at each other, saying nothing. But it was the kind of nothing that meant everything. In his eyes, there was no trace of what had happened between us earlier and I could feel something inside me break.So that was that. We were finally, finally over.I looked at him, and I felt so sad, because this thought occurred to me: 'I will never look at you the same way again. I'll never be that girl again. The girl who comes running back every time you push her away, the girl who loves you anyway.'I couldn’t even be mad at him, because this was who he was. This was who he’dalways been. He’d never lied about that. He gave and then he took away. I felt it in the pit of my stomach, the familiar ache, that lost, regretful feeling only he could give me. I never wanted to feel it again. Never, ever.Maybe this was why I came, so I could really know. So I could say good-bye.I looked at him, and I thought, 'If I was very brave or very honest, I would tell him.'I would say it, so he would know it and I would know it, and I could never take it back. But I wasn’t that brave or honest, so all I did was look at him. And I think he knew anyway.'I release you. I evict you from my heart. Because if I don't do it now, I never will.'I was the one to look away first.
motivation.author: Jenny Han

motivation.quote: You need to find a way to live your life, that it doesn't make a mockery of your values.
motivation.author: Bill Ayers

motivation.quote: The butterfly counts not months but moments, and has time enough.
motivation.author: Rabindranath Tagore

motivation.quote: Yesterday is not ours to recover, but tomorrow is ours to win or lose.
motivation.author: Lyndon B. Johnson

motivation.quote: Each person deserves a day away in which no problems are confronted, no solutions searched for.
motivation.author: Maya Angelou

motivation.quote: It is not the failure of others to appreciate your abilities that should trouble you, but rather your failure to appreciate theirs.
motivation.author: Confucius

motivation.quote: She was a beautiful dreamer. The kind of girl, who kept her head in the clouds, loved above the stars and left regret beneath the earth she walked on.
motivation.author: robert m drake

motivation.quote: Your time is way too valuable to be wasting on people that can't accept who you are.
motivation.author: Turcois Ominek

motivation.quote: Life is short. Focus on what really matters most. You have to change your priorities over time.
motivation.author: Roy T. Bennett

motivation.quote: To care about your outward appearance is important, but what’s more important is to have a beautiful soul.
motivation.author: Roy T. Bennett

motivation.quote: Death, therefore, the most awful of evils, is nothing to us, seeing that, when we are, death is not come, and, when death is come, we are not.
motivation.author: Epicurus

motivation.quote: And that's when I understand that I have been stained. Whether I'm still in love with him, whether he was ever in love with me, and no matter who he's in love with now, Willem changed my life. He showed me how to get lost, and then I showed myself how to get found.
motivation.author: Gayle Forman

motivation.quote: Great leaders can see the greatness in others when they can’t see it themselves and lead them to their highest potential they don’t even know.
motivation.author: Roy T. Bennett

motivation.quote: In prayer it is better to have a heart without words than words without a heart.
motivation.author: John Bunyan

motivation.quote: He not busy being born is busy dying.
motivation.author: Bob Dylan

motivation.quote: Employ your time in improving yourself by other men's writings so that you shall come easily by what others have labored hard for.
motivation.author: Socrates

motivation.quote: In times of stress, the best thing we can do for each other is to listen with our ears and our hearts and to be assured that our questions are just as important as our answers.
motivation.author: Fred Rogers

motivation.quote: God turns you from one feeling to another and teaches by means of opposites so that you will have two wings to fly, not one
motivation.author: Rumi

motivation.quote: We are afraid of losing what we have, whether it's our life or our possessions and property. But this fear evaporates when we understand that our life stories and the history of the world were written by the same hand.
motivation.author: Paulo Coelho

motivation.quote: The only difference between you and God is that you have forgotten you are divine.
motivation.author: Dan Brown

motivation.quote: Pegang tanganku, tapi jangan terlalu erat, karena aku ingin seiring dan bukan digiring.(Spasi)
motivation.author: Dee

motivation.quote: If you have to dry the dishes (Such an awful boring chore)If you have to dry the dishes('Stead of going to the store)If you have to dry the dishesAnd you drop one on the floorMaybe they won't let youDry the dishes anymore
motivation.author: Shel Silverstein

motivation.quote: Don't limit a child to your own learning, for she was born in another time.
motivation.author: Rabindranath Tagore

motivation.quote: My heart might be bruised, but it will recover and become capable of seeing beauty of life once more. It's happened before, it will happen again, I'm sure. When someone leaves, it's because someone else is about to arrive--I'll find love again.
motivation.author: Paulo Coelho

motivation.quote: One of the best ways to influence people is to make them feel important.
motivation.author: Roy T. Bennett

motivation.quote: Walk with the dreamers, the believers, the courageous, the cheerful, the planners, the doers, the successful people with their heads in the clouds and their feet on the ground. Let their spirit ignite a fire within you to leave this world better than when you found it...
motivation.author: Wilferd Peterson

motivation.quote: Ruin is a gift. Ruin is the road to transformation.
motivation.author: Elizabeth Gilbert

motivation.quote: To each there comes in their lifetime a special moment when they are figuratively tapped on the shoulder and offered the chance to do a very special thing, unique to them and fitted to their talents. What a tragedy if that moment finds them unprepared or unqualified for that which could have been their finest hour.
motivation.author: Sir Winston Churchill

motivation.quote: 7 Effective Ways to Make Others Feel Important 1. Use their name.2. Express sincere gratitude.3. Do more listening than talking.4. Talk more about them than about you.5. Be authentically interested.6. Be sincere in your praise.7. Show you care.
motivation.author: Roy T. Bennett

motivation.quote: As is a tale, so is life: not how long it is, but how good it is, is what matters.
motivation.author: Seneca

motivation.quote: Be soft. Do not let the world make you hard. Do not let the pain make you hate. Do not let the bitterness steal your sweetness. Take pride that even though the rest of the world may disagree, you still believe it to be a beautiful place
motivation.author: Iain Thomas

motivation.quote: It’s important that what thoughts you are feeding into your mind because your thoughts create your belief and experiences. You have positive thoughts and you have negative ones too. Nurture your mind with positive thoughts: kindness, empathy, compassion, peace, love, joy, humility, generosity, etc. The more you feed your mind with positive thoughts, the more you can attract great things into your life.
motivation.author: Roy T. Bennett

motivation.quote: Good people see the good and bring out the best in other people.
motivation.author: Roy T. Bennett

motivation.quote: When things do not go your way, remember that every challenge — every adversity — contains within it the seeds of opportunity and growth.
motivation.author: Roy T. Bennett

motivation.quote: Enjoy every step you take. If you're curious, there is always something new to be discovered in the backdrop of your daily life.
motivation.author: Roy T. Bennett

motivation.quote: We are all equal in the fact that we are all different. We are all the same in the fact that we will never be the same. We are united by the reality that all colours and all cultures are distinct & individual. We are harmonious in the reality that we are all held to this earth by the same gravity. We don't share blood, but we share the air that keeps us alive. I will not blind myself and say that my black brother is not different from me. I will not blind myself and say that my brown sister is not different from me. But my black brother is he as much as I am me. But my brown sister is she as much as I am me.
motivation.author: C. JoyBell C.

motivation.quote: These were the lovely bones that had grown around my absence: the connections-sometimes tenuous, sometimes made at great cost, but often magnificent-that happened after I was gone. And I began to see things in a way that let me hold the world without me in it. The events that my death wrought were merely the bones of a body that would become whole at some unpredictable time in the future. The price of what I came to see as this miraculous body had been my life.
motivation.author: Alice Sebold

motivation.quote: The minute I stopped trying to find the right girl, and started trying to become the right guy...the girl came.
motivation.author: Jonathan Antin

motivation.quote: Pointing to another world will never stop vice among us; shedding light over this world can alone help us.
motivation.author: Walt Whitman

motivation.quote: I don't want to live in the kind of world where we don't look out for each other. Not just the people that are close to us, but anybody who needs a helping hand. I cant change the way anybody else thinks, or what they choose to do, but I can do my bit.
motivation.author: charles de lint

motivation.quote: Love is too precious to be ashamed of.
motivation.author: Laurell K. Hamilton

motivation.quote: An eye is meant to see things.The soul is here for its own joy.A head has one use: For loving a true love.Feet: To chase after.Love is for vanishing into the sky. The mind,for learning what men have done and tried to do.Mysteries are not to be solved: The eye goes blindwhen it only wants to see why.A lover is always accused of something.But when he finds his love, whatever was lostin the looking comes back completely changed.
motivation.author: Mawlana Jalal-al-Din Rumi

motivation.quote: Yes, I understand why things had to happen this way. I understand his reason for causing me pain. But mere understanding does not chase away the hurt. It does not call upon the sun when dark clouds have loomed over me. Let the rain come then if it must come! And let it wash away the dust that hurt my eyes!
motivation.author: Jocelyn Soriano

motivation.quote: Re-examine all you have been told. Dismiss what insults your soul.
motivation.author: Walt whitman

motivation.quote: Reality is wrong. Dreams are for the real.
motivation.author: Tupac Shakur

motivation.quote: People who lack the clarity, courage, or determination to follow their own dreams will often find ways to discourage yours. When you change for the better, the people around you will be inspired to change also....but only after doing their best to make you stop. Live your truth and don't EVER stop.
motivation.author: Steve Maraboli

motivation.quote: You were born to stand out, stop trying to fit in.
motivation.author: Roy T. Bennett

motivation.quote: I think that one of these days," he said, "you're going to have to find out where you want to go. And then you've got to start going there. But immediately. You can't afford to lose a minute. Not you.
motivation.author: J.D. Salinger

motivation.quote: Nothing's perfect, the world's not perfect. But it's there for us, trying the best it can; that's what makes it so damn beautiful.
motivation.author: Hiromu Arakawa

motivation.quote: I hate to say it, but shit really does happen. You just have to get over it. Beat the hell out of it by doing things that make you happy.
motivation.author: J.A. Redmerski

motivation.quote: Never, ever, let anyone tell you what you can and can't do. Prove the cynics wrong. Pity them for they have no imagination. The sky's the limit. Your sky. Your limit. Now. Let's dance.
motivation.author: Tom Hiddleston

motivation.quote: You will never follow your own inner voice until you clear up the doubts in your mind.
motivation.author: Roy T. Bennett

motivation.quote: Love. Fall in love and stay in love. Write only what you love, and love what you write. The word is love. You have to get up in the morning and write something you love, something to live for.
motivation.author: Ray Bradbury

motivation.quote: Want to keep Christ in Christmas? Feed the hungry, clothe the naked, forgive the guilty, welcome the unwanted, care for the ill, love your enemies, and do unto others as you would have done unto you.
motivation.author: Steve Maraboli

motivation.quote: Gossip is just a tool to distract people who have nothing better to do from feeling jealous of those few of us still remaining with noble hearts.
motivation.author: Anna Godbersen

motivation.quote: It’s strange how dreams get under your skin and give your heart a test for what’s real and what’s imaginary.
motivation.author: Jason Mraz

motivation.quote: I don’t regret anything I’ve ever done in life, any choice that I’ve made. But I’m consumed with regret for the things I didn’t do, the choices I didn’t make, the things I didn’t say. We spend so much time being afraid of failure, afraid of rejection. But regret is the thing we should fear most. Failure is an answer. Rejection is an answer. Regret is an eternal question you will never have the answer to. "What if…" "If only…" "I wonder what would have…" You will never, never know, and it will haunt you for the rest of your days.
motivation.author: Trevor Noah

motivation.quote: Here is a rule to remember in future, when anything tempts you to feel bitter: not "This is misfortune," but "To bear this worthily is good fortune.
motivation.author: Marcus Aurelius

motivation.quote: How much time he gains who does not look to see what his neighbour says or does or thinks, but only at what he does himself, to make it just and holy.
motivation.author: Marcus Aurelius

motivation.quote: Would you rather live one perfect day over and over or live your life with no perfect days but just decent ones?
motivation.author: Jenny Han

motivation.quote: I believe in God, only I spell it Nature.
motivation.author: Frank Lloyd Wright

motivation.quote: You are not a victim. No matter what you have been through, you're still here. You may have been challenged, hurt, betrayed, beaten, and discouraged, but nothing has defeated you. You are still here! You have been delayed but not denied. You are not a victim, you are a victor. You have a history of victory.
motivation.author: Steve Maraboli

motivation.quote: Somehow I can't believe that there are any heights that can't be scaled by a man who knows the secrets of making dreams come true. This special secret, it seems to me, can be summarized in four Cs. They are curiosity, confidence, courage, and constancy, and the greatest of all is confidence. When you believe in a thing, believe in it all the way, implicitly and unquestionable.
motivation.author: Walt Disney

motivation.quote: Consistency is the true foundation of trust. Either keep your promises or do not make them.
motivation.author: Roy T. Bennett

motivation.quote: Whatever you think, be sure it is what you think; whatever you want, be sure that is what you want; whatever you feel, be sure that is what you feel.
motivation.author: T.S. Eliot

motivation.quote: When I was alive, I believed — as you do — that time was at least as real and solid as myself, and probably more so. I said 'one o'clock' as though I could see it, and 'Monday' as though I could find it on the map; and I let myself be hurried along from minute to minute, day to day, year to year, as though I were actually moving from one place to another. Like everyone else, I lived in a house bricked up with seconds and minutes, weekends and New Year's Days, and I never went outside until I died, because there was no other door. Now I know that I could have walked through the walls. (...) You can strike your own time, and start the count anywhere. When you understand that — then any time at all will be the right time for you.
motivation.author: Peter S. Beagle

motivation.quote: Shine your light and make a positive impact on the world; there is nothing so honorable as helping improve the lives of others.
motivation.author: Roy T. Bennett

motivation.quote: Live fast. Die young. Be wild. Have fun.
motivation.author: Lana Del Rey

motivation.quote: And I thought that all those little kids are going to grow up someday. And all of those little kids are going to do the things that we do. And they will all kiss someone someday. But for now, sledding is enough. I think it would be great if sledding were always enough, but it isn't.
motivation.author: Stephen Chbosky

motivation.quote: First you jump off the cliff and build your wings on the way down.
motivation.author: Ray Bradbury

motivation.quote: If they don't like you for being yourself, be yourself even more.
motivation.author: Taylor Swift

motivation.quote: Don't give up the fight,Stand up for your rights.
motivation.author: Bob Marley

motivation.quote: Only the gentle are ever really strong.
motivation.author: James  Dean

motivation.quote: One mistake does not have to rule a person's entire life.
motivation.author: Joyce Meyer

motivation.quote: Chaos is more freedom; in fact, total freedom. But no meaning. I want to be free to act, and I also want my actions to mean something.
motivation.author: Audrey Niffenegger

motivation.quote: If you can't you must, and if you must you can.
motivation.author: Anthony Robbins

motivation.quote: But why think about that when all the golden lands ahead of you and all kinds of unforseen events wait lurking to surprise you and make you glad you're alive to see?
motivation.author: Jack Kerouac

motivation.quote: The most important step a man can take. It's not the first one, is it? It's the next one. Always the next step, Dalinar.
motivation.author: Brandon Sanderson

motivation.quote: Written words can also sing.
motivation.author: Ngũgĩ wa Thiong’o

motivation.quote: What we do see depends mainly on what we look for. ... In the same field the farmer will notice the crop, the geologists the fossils, botanists the flowers, artists the colouring, sportmen the cover for the game. Though we may all look at the same things, it does not all follow that we should see them.
motivation.author: John Lubbock

motivation.quote: Being Adam Parrish was a complicated thing, a wonder of muscles and organs, synapses and nerves. He was a miracle of moving parts, a study in survival. The most important thing to Adam Parrish, though, had always been free will, the ability to be his own master.This was the important thing.It had always been the important thing. This was what it was to be Adam.
motivation.author: Maggie Stiefvater

motivation.quote: Life teaches us the right path is rarely the easy one.
motivation.author: Roy T. Bennett

motivation.quote: You were put on this earth to achieve your greatest self, to live out your purpose, and to do it courageously.
motivation.author: Steve Maraboli

motivation.quote: My name is Celaena Sardothien," she whispered, "and I will not be afraid.
motivation.author: Sarah J. Maas

motivation.quote: When a stargirl cries, she sheds not tears but light.
motivation.author: Jerry Spinelli

motivation.quote: So long as you fight the darkness, you stand in the light.
motivation.author: Sabaa Tahir

motivation.quote: Fair means everyone gets what they need. And the only way to get what you need is to make it happen yourself.
motivation.author: Rick Riordan

motivation.quote: If you can't run, you crawl. If you can't crawl-- you find someone to carry you.
motivation.author: Joss Whedon

motivation.quote: Conquer the angry one by not getting angry; conquer the wicked by goodness; conquer the stingy by generosity, and the liar by speaking the truth.[Verse 223]
motivation.author: Siddhārtha Gautama

motivation.quote: According to Aristophanes in Plato's The Banquet, in the ancient world of legend there were three types of people.In ancient times people weren't simply male or female, but one of three types : male/male, male/female or female/female. In other words, each person was made out of the components of two people. Everyone was happy with this arrangment and never really gave it much thought. But then God took a knife and cut everyone in half, right down the middle. So after that the world was divided just into male and female, the upshot being that people spend their time running around trying to locate their missing half.
motivation.author: Haruki Murakami

motivation.quote: Just because someone desires you, it does not mean that they value you.Read it over.Again.Let those words resonate in your mind.
motivation.author: Nayyirah Waheed

motivation.quote: Happiness is always there. You just have to choose to see it. There's no point dwelling in the dark and ignoring the light of the stars.
motivation.author: Carrie Hope Fletcher

motivation.quote: We all have two lives. The second one starts when we realize that we only have one.
motivation.author: Tom Hiddleston

motivation.quote: I believe the simplest explanation is, there is no God. No one created the universe and no one directs our fate. This leads me to a profound realization that there probably is no heaven and no afterlife either. We have this one life to appreciate the grand design of the universe and for that, I am extremely grateful.
motivation.author: Stephen Hawking

motivation.quote: Intellectual growth should commence at birth and cease only at death.
motivation.author: Albert Einstein

motivation.quote: Every day People straighten up the hair, why not the heart?
motivation.author: che guevara

motivation.quote: It doesn't matter what you do...so long as you change something from the way it was before you touched it into something that's like you after you take your hands away.
motivation.author: Ray Bradbury

motivation.quote: If I must fall, may it be from a high place.
motivation.author: Paulo Coelho

motivation.quote: It's funny how, in this journey of life, even though we may begin at different times and places, our paths cross with others so that we may share our love, compassion, observations, and hope. This is a design of God that I appreciate and cherish.
motivation.author: Steve Maraboli

motivation.quote: For Equilibrium, a Blessing:Like the joy of the sea coming home to shore,May the relief of laughter rinse through your soul.As the wind loves to call things to dance,May your gravity by lightened by grace.Like the dignity of moonlight restoring the earth,May your thoughts incline with reverence and respect.As water takes whatever shape it is in,So free may you be about who you become.As silence smiles on the other side of what's said,May your sense of irony bring perspective.As time remains free of all that it frames,May your mind stay clear of all it names.May your prayer of listening deepen enoughto hear in the depths the laughter of god.
motivation.author: John O'Donohue

motivation.quote: I think the act of reading imbues the reader with a sensitivity toward the outside world that people who don't read can sometimes lack. I know it seems like a contradiction in terms; after all reading is such a solitary, internalizing act that it appears to represent a disengagement from day-to-day life. But reading, and particularly the reading of fiction, encourages us to view the world in new and challenging ways...It allows us to inhabit the consciousness of another which is a precursor to empathy, and empathy is, for me, one of the marks of a decent human being.
motivation.author: John Connolly

motivation.quote: Always be yourself, there's no one better!
motivation.author: Selena Gomez

motivation.quote: Rock bottom became the solid foundation on which I rebuilt my life.
motivation.author: J.K. Rowling

motivation.quote: Nothing ever really goes away--it just changes into something else. Something beautiful.
motivation.author: Sarah Ockler

motivation.quote: If you don't love yourself, how in the hell you gonna love somebody else?
motivation.author: RuPaul

motivation.quote: الحزن عنصر ضروري لنكون بشراً، أما السعادة فشيء استثنائي، وجوده أو عدمه لا يؤثر في إنسانيتنا
motivation.author: محمد حسن علوان

motivation.quote: The value of things is not the time they last, but the intensity with which they occur. That is why there are unforgettable moments and unique people!
motivation.author: Fernando Pessoa

motivation.quote: We forfeit three-fourths of ourselves in order to be like other people.
motivation.author: Arthur Schopenhauer

motivation.quote: You must accept the reality of other people. You think that reality is up for negotiation, that we think it's whatever you say it is. You must accept that we are as real as you are; you must accept that you are not God.
motivation.author: J.K. Rowling

motivation.quote: Are you on our side...and want to be different, or are you on that side and want to throw a football at my head!?
motivation.author: Gerard Way

motivation.quote: Fear robs you of your freedom to make the right choice in life that can bridge the gap between where you are and where you want to be. On the other side of fear, lies freedom. If you want to grow, you need to be brave and take risks. If you're not uncomfortable, you're not growing.
motivation.author: Roy T. Bennett

motivation.quote: Stay strong, stay positive, and never give up.
motivation.author: Roy T. Bennett

motivation.quote: It did not really matter what we expected from life, but rather what life expected from us. We needed to stop asking about the meaning of life, and instead to think of ourselves as those who were being questioned by life—daily and hourly. Our answer must consist, not in talk and meditation, but in right action and in right conduct. Life ultimately means taking the responsibility to find the right answer to its problems and to fulfill the tasks which it constantly sets for each individual.
motivation.author: Viktor E. Frankl

motivation.quote: Thus, from the war of nature, from famine and death, the most exalted object which we are capable of conceiving, namely, the production of the higher animals, directly follows. There is grandeur in this view of life, with its several powers, having been originally breathed into a few forms or into one; and that, whilst this planet has gone cycling on according to the fixed law of gravity, from so simple a beginning endless forms most beautiful and most wonderful have been, and are being, evolved.
motivation.author: Charles Darwin

motivation.quote: Don't live down to expectations. Go out there and do something remarkable.
motivation.author: Wendy Wasserstein

motivation.quote: We are all worms, But I do believe that I am a glow worm.
motivation.author: Winston S. Churchill

motivation.quote: The one who falls and gets up is stronger than the one who never tried. Do not fear failure but rather fear not trying.
motivation.author: Roy T. Bennett

motivation.quote: Self-respect is the root of discipline: The sense of dignity growswith the ability to say no to oneself.
motivation.author: Abraham Joshua Heschel

motivation.quote: Make the most of the best and the best of the worst, and keep your standards high. Never settle for anything less than you deserve or are capable of achieving.
motivation.author: Roy T. Bennett

motivation.quote: Somebody has to start. Somebody has to step forward and do what is right, because it is right.
motivation.author: Brandon Sanderson

motivation.quote: Every man is more than just himself; he also represents the unique, the very special and always significant and remarkable point at which the world's phenomena intersect, only once in this way, and never again. That is why every man's story is important, eternal, sacred; that is why every man, as long as he lives and fulfills the will of nature, is wondrous, and worthy of consideration. In each individual the spirit has become flesh, in each man the creation suffers, within each one a redeemer is nailed to the cross.
motivation.author: Hermann Hesse

motivation.quote: I want to thank you, Lord, for life and all that's in it. Thank you for the day and for the hour, and the minute.
motivation.author: Maya Angelou

motivation.quote: ...there ain't no journey what don't change you some.
motivation.author: David Mitchell

motivation.quote: Do not let the roles you play in life make you forget who you are.
motivation.author: Roy T. Bennett

motivation.quote: When you have exhausted all possibilities, remember this - you haven't.
motivation.author: Thomas Edison

motivation.quote: When you judge another, you do not define them, you define yourself.
motivation.author: Wayne Dyer

motivation.quote: When I find myself in times of trouble, mother Mary comes to me,speaking words of wisdom, let it be.And in my hour of darkness she is standing right in front of me,speaking words of wisdom, let it be.Let it be, let it be, let it be, let it be.Whisper words of wisdom, let it be.And when the broken hearted people living in the world agree,there will be an answer, let it be.For though they may be parted there is still a chance that they will see,there will be an answer. let it be.Let it be, let it be, .....And when the night is cloudy, there is still a light, that shines on me,shine until tomorrow, let it be.I wake up to the sound of music, mother Mary comes to me,speaking words of wisdom, let it be.Let it be, let it be, .....
motivation.author: Paul McCartney

motivation.quote: The pure present is an ungraspable advance of the past devouring the future. In truth, all sensation is already memory.
motivation.author: Henri Bergson

motivation.quote: Everyone enjoys being acknowledged and appreciated. Sometimes even the simplest act of gratitude can change someone's entire day. Take the time to recognize and value the people around you and appreciate those who make a difference in your lives.
motivation.author: Roy T. Bennett

motivation.quote: Mr. Franz, I think careers are a 20th century invention and I don't want one.
motivation.author: Jon Krakauer

motivation.quote: Be a lamp, or a lifeboat, or a ladder. Help someone's soul heal. Walk out of your house like a shepherd.
motivation.author: Rumi

motivation.quote: Drink your tea slowly and reverently, as if it is the axis on which the world earth revolves - slowly, evenly, without rushing toward the future.
motivation.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

motivation.quote: Beauty is about being comfortable in your own skin. It's about knowing and accepting who you are.
motivation.author: Ellen DeGeneres

motivation.quote: It doesn't matter if a million people tell you what you can't do, or if ten million tell you no. If you get one yes from God that's all you need.
motivation.author: Tyler Perry

motivation.quote: Things die. But they don't always stay dead. Believe me, I know.
motivation.author: Richelle Mead

motivation.quote: Instead of committing suicide, people go to work.
motivation.author: Thomas Bernhard

motivation.quote: Change may not always bring growth, but there is no growth without change.
motivation.author: Roy T. Bennett

motivation.quote: Enthusiasm can help you find the new doors, but it takes passion to open them. If you have a strong purpose in life, you don't have to be pushed. Your passion will drive you there.
motivation.author: Roy T. Bennett

motivation.quote: Let go of something old that no longer serves you in order to make room for something new.
motivation.author: Roy T. Bennett

motivation.quote: I hated every minute of training, but I said, 'Don't quit. Suffer now and live the rest of your life as a champion'.
motivation.author: Muhammad Ali

motivation.quote: If you haven’t the strength to impose your own terms upon life, then you must accept the terms it offers you.
motivation.author: T.S. Eliot

motivation.quote: Each suburban wife struggles with it alone. As she made the beds, shopped for groceries, matched slipcover material, ate peanut butter sandwiches with her children, chauffeured Cub Scouts and Brownies, lay beside her husband at night- she was afraid to ask even of herself the silent question-- 'Is this all?
motivation.author: Betty Friedan

motivation.quote: If you once forfeit the confidence of your fellow citizens, you can never regain their respect and esteem. It is true that you may fool all of the people some of the time; you can even fool some of the people all of the time; but you can't fool all of the people all of the time. -Speech at Clinton, Illinois, September 8, 1854.
motivation.author: Abraham Lincoln

motivation.quote: Beliefs are choices. First you choose your beliefs. Then your beliefs affect your choices.
motivation.author: Roy T. Bennett

motivation.quote: Stop feeling sorry for yourself and you will be happy.
motivation.author: Stephen Fry

motivation.quote: Have regular hours for work and play; make each day both useful and pleasant, and prove that you understand the worth of time by employing it well. Then youth will bring few regrets, and life will become a beautiful success.
motivation.author: Louisa May Alcott

motivation.quote: Rest is not idleness, and to lie sometimes on the grass under trees on a summer's day, listening to the murmur of the water, or watching the clouds float across the sky, is by no means a waste of time.
motivation.author: John Lubbock

motivation.quote: You can love a person dear to you with a human love, but an enemy can only be loved with divine love.
motivation.author: Leo Tolstoy

motivation.quote: Keep a little fire burning; however small, however hidden.
motivation.author: Cormac McCarthy

motivation.quote: Belief, like fear or love, is a force to be understood as we understand the theory of relativity and principals of uncertainty. Phenomena that determine the course of our lives. Yesterday, my life was headed in one direction. Today, it is headed in another. Yesterday, I believe I would never have done what I did today. These forces that often remake time and space, that can shape and alter who weimagine ourselves to be, begin long before we are born and continue after we perish. Our lives and our choices, like quantum trajectories, are understood moment to moment. That each point of intersection, each encounter, suggest a new potential direction. Proposition, I have fallen in love with Luisa Rey. Is this possible? I just met her and yet, I feel like something important has happened to me.
motivation.author: David Mitchell

motivation.quote: If you give up what you want most for what you think you should want more, you'll end up miserable.
motivation.author: Brandon Sanderson

motivation.quote: There is no need to search; achievement leads to nowhere. It makes no difference at all, so just be happy now! Love is the only reality of the world, because it is all One, you see. And the only laws are paradox, humor and change. There is no problem, never was, and never will be. Release your struggle, let go of your mind, throw away your concerns, and relax into the world. No need to resist life, just do your best. Open your eyes and see that you are far more than you imagine. You are the world, you are the universe; you are yourself and everyone else, too! It's all the marvelous Play of God. Wake up, regain your humor. Don't worry, just be happy. You are already free!
motivation.author: Dan Millman

motivation.quote: Sometimes you can see things happen right in front of your eyes and still jump to the wrong conclusions.
motivation.author: Jodi Picoult

motivation.quote: Looking at beauty in the world, is the first step of purifying the mind.
motivation.author: Amit Ray

motivation.quote: It only takes a split second to smile and forget, yet to someone that needed it, it can last a lifetime.
motivation.author: Steve Maraboli

motivation.quote: It is worse to stay where one does not belong at all than to wander about lost for a while and looking for the psychic and soulful kinship one requires
motivation.author: Clarissa Pinkola Estés

motivation.quote: But what was there to say?Only that there were tears. Only that Quietness and Emptiness fitted together like stacked spoons. Only that there was a snuffling in the hollows at the base of a lovely throat. Only that a hard honey-colored shoulder had a semicircle of teethmarks on it. Only that they held each other close, long after it was over. Only that what they shared that night was not happiness, but hideous grief.Only that once again they broke the Love Laws. That lay down who should be loved. And how. And how much.
motivation.author: Arundhati Roy

motivation.quote: She had become accustomed to being lonely. She was used to walking alone and to being considered 'different.' She did not suffer too much.
motivation.author: Betty  Smith

motivation.quote: Surround Yourself with Positive People Who Believe in Your DreamsDistance yourself from negative people who try to lower your motivation and decrease your ambition. Create space for positive people to come into your life. Surround yourself with positive people who believe in your dreams, encourage your ideas, support your ambitions, and bring out the best in you.
motivation.author: Roy T. Bennett

motivation.quote: We can't choose our fate, but we can choose others. Be careful in knowing that.
motivation.author: J.K. Rowling

motivation.quote: Love yourself first and everything else falls into line. Your really have to love yourself to get anything done in this world.
motivation.author: Lucille Ball

motivation.quote: To truly laugh, you must be able to take your pain, and play with it.
motivation.author: Charlie Chaplin

motivation.quote: Successful people have no fear of failure. But unsuccessful people do. Successful people have the resilience to face up to failure—learn the lessons and adapt from it.
motivation.author: Roy T. Bennett

motivation.quote: Education is teaching our children to desire the right things.
motivation.author: Plato

motivation.quote: When you take control of your attitude, you take control of your life.
motivation.author: Roy T. Bennett

motivation.quote: Ask yourself these three questions, Tatiana Metanova, and you will know who you are. Ask: What do believe in? What do you hope for? What do you love?
motivation.author: Paullina Simons

motivation.quote: What other people think and say about you is none of your business. The most destructive thing you would ever do is to believe someone else's opinion of you. You have to stop letting other people's opinions control you.
motivation.author: Roy T. Bennett

motivation.quote: The comfort zone is a psychological state in which one feels familiar, safe, at ease, and secure. You never change your life until you step out of your comfort zone; change begins at the end of your comfort zone.
motivation.author: Roy T. Bennett

motivation.quote: This life is for loving, sharing, learning, smiling, caring, forgiving, laughing, hugging, helping, dancing, wondering, healing, and even more loving. I choose to live life this way. I want to live my life in such a way that when I get out of bed in the morning, the devil says, 'aw shit, he's up!
motivation.author: Steve Maraboli

motivation.quote: Awake, arise or be for ever fall’n.
motivation.author: John Milton

motivation.quote: If we had no winter, the spring would not be so pleasant: if we did not sometimes taste of adversity, prosperity would not be so welcome."[Meditations Divine and Moral]
motivation.author: Anne Bradstreet

motivation.quote: I choose gentleness... Nothing is won by force. I choose to be gentle. If I raise my voice may it be only in praise. If I clench my fist, may it be only in prayer. If I make a demand, may it be only of myself.
motivation.author: Max Lucado

motivation.quote: Children betrayed their parents by becoming their own people.
motivation.author: Leslye Walton

motivation.quote: Indeed, learning to write may be part of learning to read. For all I know, writing comes out of a superior devotion to reading.
motivation.author: Eudora Welty

motivation.quote: I am who I am; no more, no less.
motivation.author: Terry Goodkind

motivation.quote: Most people overestimate what they can do in one year and underestimate what they can do in ten years.
motivation.author: Bill Gates

motivation.quote: Makakapili ka ng lugar na uupuan mo, pero hindi mo mapipili ang taong uupo sa puwang sa tabi mo... Ganyan ang senaryo sa bus. Ganyan din sa pag-ibig... Lalong 'di mo kontrolado kung kelan siya bababa.
motivation.author: Bob Ong

motivation.quote: Dream your own dreams, achieve your own goals. Your journey is your own and unique.
motivation.author: Roy T. Bennett

motivation.quote: I love you, in my mind where my thoughts reside, in my heart where my emotions live, and in my soul where my dreams are born. I love you.
motivation.author: Dee Henderson

motivation.quote: Facing it, always facing it, that’s the way to get through. Face it.
motivation.author: Conrad Joseph

motivation.quote: Life," said Marvin dolefully, "loathe it or ignore it, you can’t like it.
motivation.author: Douglas Adams

motivation.quote: Anything is possible. Anything can be.
motivation.author: Shel Silverstein

motivation.quote: Great Leaders Create More LeadersGood leaders have vision and inspire others to help them turn vision into reality. Great leaders create more leaders, not followers. Great leaders have vision, share vision, and inspire others to create their own.
motivation.author: Roy T. Bennett

motivation.quote: I have frequently seen people become neurotic when they content themselves with inadequate or wrong answers to the questions of life. They seek position, marriage, reputation, outward success of money, and remain unhappy and neurotic even when they have attained what they were seeking. Such people are usually confined within too narrow a spiritual horizon. Their life has not sufficient content, sufficient meaning. If they are enabled to develop into more spacious personalities, the neurosis generally disappears.
motivation.author: C.G. Jung

motivation.quote: You can’t go back and make a new start, but you can start right now and make a brand new ending.
motivation.author: James R. Sherman

motivation.quote: Life is a funny thing. We only get so many years to live it, so we have to do everything we can to make sure those years are as full as they can be. We shouldn't waste time on things that might happen someday, or maybe even never.
motivation.author: Colleen Hoover

motivation.quote: As we go through life we gradually discover who we are, but the more we discover, the more we lose ourselves.
motivation.author: Haruki Murakami

motivation.quote: The right thing at the wrong tme is the wrong thing.
motivation.author: Joshua Harris

motivation.quote: no matter how ugly the world gets or how stupid it shows me it is, I always have faith
motivation.author: Gerard Way

motivation.quote: You have every right to a beautiful life.
motivation.author: Selena Gomez

motivation.quote: Every person, all the events of your life are there because you have drawn them there. What you choose to do with them is up to you.
motivation.author: Richard Bach
