motivation.quote: How strange is man that when he is afraid of something he runs away from it, but when he is afraid of Allah, he gets closer to Him.
motivation.author: Hazrat Ali Ibn Abu-Talib A.S

motivation.quote: It is books that are a key to the wide world; if you can't do anything else, read all that you can.
motivation.author: Jane Hamilton

motivation.quote: And so I ask myself: 'Where are your dreams?' And I shake my head and mutter: 'How the years go by!' And I ask myself again: 'What have you done with those years? Where have you buried your best moments? Have you really lived? Look,' I say to myself, 'how cold it is becoming all over the world!' And more years will pass and behind them will creep grim isolation. Tottering senility will come hobbling, leaning on a crutch, and behind these will come unrelieved boredom and despair. The world of fancies will fade, dreams will wilt and die and fall like autumn leaves from the trees. . . .
motivation.author: Fyodor Dostoevsky

motivation.quote: It's been said that love finds you when you're ready.
motivation.author: James Patterson; Maxine Paetro

motivation.quote: To be deeply loved, means a willingness to cut yourself wide open, exposing your vulnerabilities... hopes, hurts, fears and flaws. Hiding behind the highlight reel of who you are, is the real you and that person is just as worthy of love. There is nothing more terrifying or fulfilling, than complete love, it's worth the risk... reach for it.
motivation.author: Jaeda DeWalt

motivation.quote: Mother is a verb. It's something you do. Not just who you are.
motivation.author: Cheryl Lacey Donovan

motivation.quote: How can you trust me, after what your own brother did to you?"Because he was false", said Damen, "and you are true. I have never known a truer man.
motivation.author: C.S. Pacat

motivation.quote: Were knowledge all, what were our needTo thrill and faint and sweetly bleed?
motivation.author: Christopher Brennan

motivation.quote: إن كان في حياتك تمّة شئٌ يستحقُ التأجيل ... فليكن التأجيلُ نفسُه
motivation.author: عمر طاهر

motivation.quote: Man is born broken. He lives by mending. The grace of God is glue.
motivation.author: Eugene O'Neill

motivation.quote: Never follow the crowd.
motivation.author: Bernard Baruch

motivation.quote: If I look at the mass I will never act.
motivation.author: Mother Teresa

motivation.quote: There is no wealth like knowledge, no poverty like ignorance.
motivation.author: Ali Bin Abi Thalib

motivation.quote: When I pictured myself, it was always like just an outline in a colouring book, with the inside not yet completed.
motivation.author: Sarah Dessen

motivation.quote: When she listened to songs that she loved on the radio, something stirred inside her. A liquid ache spread under her skin, and she walked out of the world like a witch.
motivation.author: Arundhati Roy

motivation.quote: One of the best ways to influence people is to make those around you feel important.
motivation.author: Roy T. Bennett

motivation.quote: Everytime I plant a seed,he say kill it before it grow, he say kill it before they grow.
motivation.author: Bob Marley

motivation.quote: Each man should frame life so that at some future hour fact and his dreaming meet.
motivation.author: Victor Hugo

motivation.quote: Have you realized that most of your unhappiness in life is due to the fact that you are listening to yourself instead of talking to yourself? Take those thoughts that come to you the moment you wake up in the morning. You have not originated them but they are talking to you, they bring back the problems of yesterday, etc. Somebody is talking. Who is talking to you? Your self is talking to you. Now this man’s treatment [in Psalm 42] was this: instead of allowing this self to talk to him, he starts talking to himself. "Why art thou cast down, O my soul?" he asks. His soul had been depressing him, crushing him. So he stands up and says, "Self, listen for moment, I will speak to you.
motivation.author: Martyn Lloyd-Jones

motivation.quote: The sidelines may be safer but life is played on the field
motivation.author: Wendy Mass

motivation.quote: It is a serious thing to live in a society of possible gods and goddesses, to remember that the dullest most uninteresting person you can talk to may one day be a creature which,if you saw it now, you would be strongly tempted to worship, or else a horror and a corruption such as you now meet, if at all, only in a nightmare. All day long we are, in some degree helping each other to one or the other of these destinations. It is in the light of these overwhelming possibilities, it is with the awe and the circumspection proper to them, that we should conduct all of our dealings with one another, all friendships, all loves, all play, all politics. There are no ordinary people. You have never talked to a mere mortal. Nations, cultures, arts, civilizations - these are mortal, and their life is to ours as the life of a gnat. But it is immortals whom we joke with, work with, marry, snub, and exploit - immortal horrors or everlasting splendors.
motivation.author: C.S. Lewis

motivation.quote: Do not become someone else just because you are hurt. Be who you are & smile, it may solve, all problems you have got.
motivation.author: Santosh Kalwar

motivation.quote: Brimstone once told me that to stay true in the face of evil is a feat of strength.
motivation.author: Laini Taylor

motivation.quote: I cannot trust a man to control others who cannot control himself.
motivation.author: Robert E. Lee

motivation.quote: There isa time to liveand a time to diebut never to reject the moment.
motivation.author: Lao Tzu

motivation.quote: We spend money that we do not have, on things we do not need, to impress people who do not care.
motivation.author: Will Smith

motivation.quote: The whole summer lay ahead of us-time to rest, time to wait. And when the future comes-no matter what comes with it-I'll be smarter. I'll be stronger. I'll be ready.
motivation.author: Ally Carter

motivation.quote: it takes as much courage to have tried and failed as it does to have tried and succeded.
motivation.author: Anne Morrow Lindbergh

motivation.quote: I’d rather welcome change than cling to the past.
motivation.author: Robert T. Kiyosaki

motivation.quote: Something amazing happens when you're in love and don't give a damn about what day it is anymore.
motivation.author: Chad Sugg

motivation.quote: And the fox said to the little prince: men have forgotten this truth, but you must not forget it. You become responsible, forever, for what you have tamed.
motivation.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupery

motivation.quote: If you don’t have the time to do something right, where are you going to find the time to fix it?
motivation.author: Stephen King

motivation.quote: I will be generous with my love today. I will sprinkle compliments and uplifting words everywhere I go. I will do this knowing that my words are like seeds and when they fall on fertile soil, a reflection of those seeds will grow into something greater.
motivation.author: Steve Maraboli

motivation.quote: Team work makes the dream work
motivation.author: Rap Monster

motivation.quote: If you set yourself to it, you can live the same life, rich or poor. You can keep on with your books and your ideas. You just got to say to yourself, "I'm a free man in here" - he tapped his forehead - "and you're all right.
motivation.author: George Orwell

motivation.quote: ‎Today is a new day. It's a day you have never seen before and will never see again. Stop telling yourself the 'same crap, different day' lie! How many days has that lie stolen from you? Seize the wonder and uniqueness of today! Recognize that throughout this beautiful day, you have an incredible amount of opportunities to move your life into the direction you want it to go.
motivation.author: Steve Maraboli

motivation.quote: We're called to be faithful, to take those first difficult steps--and to leave the results up to God.
motivation.author: Alex  Harris

motivation.quote: What she had long believed was not true, and now the world was wide open to discover what was.It is like all my life I thought the sky was green.
motivation.author: Shannon Hale

motivation.quote: A great human revolution in just a single individual will help achieve a change in the destiny of a nation and, further, can even enable a change in the destiny of all humankind.
motivation.author: Daisaku Ikeda

motivation.quote: Have love for your inner Self and everything else is done for you.
motivation.author: Amit Ray

motivation.quote: I want you to have big dreams, big goals. I want you to strive to achieve them. But I don't want to see you beating yourself up every time you make a mistake.
motivation.author: Kelley Armstrong

motivation.quote: I don't regret the painful times; I bare my scars as if they were medals.
motivation.author: Paolo Coelho

motivation.quote: Worrying is arrogant because God knows what He's doing.
motivation.author: Barbara Cameron

motivation.quote: This new day has greeted us with no rules; unconditional opportunity. Do not dilute the power of this new day with the hardship of yesterday. Greet this day the way it has greeted you; with open arms and endless possibility.
motivation.author: Steve Maraboli

motivation.quote: Better to shun the bait than struggle in the snare.
motivation.author: William Blake

motivation.quote: If an apology is followed by an excuse or a reason, it means they are going to commit same mistake again they just apologized for.
motivation.author: Amit Kalantri

motivation.quote: Holding a grudge & harboring anger/resentment is poison to the soul. Get even with people...but not those who have hurt us, forget them, instead get even with those who have helped us.
motivation.author: Steve Maraboli

motivation.quote: In spite of everything I still believe that people are really good at heart. I simply can't build up my hopes on a foundation consisting of confusion, misery and death.
motivation.author: Anne Frank

motivation.quote: How strange that we should ordinarily feel compelled to hide our wounds when we are all wounded! Community requires the ability to expose our wounds and weaknesses to our fellow creatures. It also requires the ability to be affected by the wounds of others... But even more important is the love that arises among us when we share, both ways, our woundedness.
motivation.author: M. Scott Peck

motivation.quote: Love is the Answer, God is the Cure!
motivation.author: Aimee Cabo Nikolov

motivation.quote: Although I am a typical loner in my daily life, my awareness of belonging to the invisible community of those who strive for truth, beauty, and justice has prevented me from feelings of isolation.
motivation.author: Albert Einstein

motivation.quote: If you are not the hero of your own story, then you're missing the whole point of your humanity.
motivation.author: Steve Maraboli

motivation.quote: Despite my ghoulish reputation, I really have the heart of a small boy. I keep it in a jar on my desk.
motivation.author: Robert Bloch

motivation.quote: To have regret is to be disappointed with yourself and your choices. Those who are wise, see their life like stepping stones across a great river. Everyone misses a stone from time to time. No one can cross the river without getting wet. Success is measured by your arrival on the other side, not on how muddy your shoes are. Regrets are only felt by those who do not understand life’s purpose. They become so disillusioned that they stand still in the river and do not take the next leap.
motivation.author: Colleen Houck

motivation.quote: We join spokes together in a wheel, but it is the center hole that makes the wagon move.We shape clay into a pot, but it is the emptiness insidethat holds whatever we want.We hammer wood for a house, but it is the inner spacethat makes it livable.We work with being, but non-being is what we use.
motivation.author: Lao Tzu

motivation.quote: ... it’s a blessed thing to love and feel loved in return.
motivation.author: E.A. Bucchianeri

motivation.quote: Hard work beats talent when talent fails to work hard.
motivation.author: Kevin Durant

motivation.quote: You don't have to be great to get started, but you have to get started to be great.
motivation.author: Les Brown

motivation.quote: Friends can make you feel that the world is smaller and less sneaky than it really is, because you know people who have similar experiences.
motivation.author: Lemony Snicket

motivation.quote: For, after all, every one who wishes to gain true knowledge must climb the Hill Difficulty alone, and since there is no royal road to the summit, I must zigzag it in my own way. I slip back many times, I fall, I stand still, I run against the edge of hidden obstacles, I lose my temper and find it again and keep it better, I trudge on, I gain a little, I feel encouraged, I get more eager and climb higher and begin to see the widening horizon. Every struggle is a victory. One more effort and I reach the luminous cloud, the blue depths of the sky, the uplands of my desire.
motivation.author: Helen Keller

motivation.quote: But what if Shakespeare
motivation.author: Gayle Forman

motivation.quote: What the soul hardly realizes is that, unbeliever or not, his loneliness is really a homesickness for God.
motivation.author: Hubert Van Zeller

motivation.quote: Boredom can be a lethal thing on a small island.
motivation.author: Christopher Moore

motivation.quote: Read. Read anything. Read the things they say are good for you, and the things they claim are junk. You'll find what you need to find. Just read.
motivation.author: Neil Gaiman

motivation.quote: I know I'm not going to be in your head all the time. But once you know me, I'll be forever in your heart.
motivation.author: Crystal Woods

motivation.quote: Everyone is lonely, we have to remember that life is to be lived one day at a time. You cannot worry about the past or future. Happiness is in the now.
motivation.author: Claudia Gray

motivation.quote: A quitter never wins-and-a winner never quits.
motivation.author: Napoleon Hill

motivation.quote: There is force in the universe, which, if we permit it, will flow through us and produce miraculous results.
motivation.author: Mahatma Gandhi

motivation.quote: Don't bother just to be better than your contemporaries or predecessors. Try to be better than yourself.
motivation.author: William Faulkner

motivation.quote: May the fleas of a thousand camels invade the crotch of the person that ruins your day. And may their arms be to short too scratch
motivation.author: Keisha Keenleyside

motivation.quote: We are constantly invited to be what we are.
motivation.author: Henry David Thoreau

motivation.quote: You are a human with one life and its up to you to make it the best life you can.
motivation.author: Dan Howell

motivation.quote: The less you reveal, the more people can wonder.
motivation.author: Emma Watson

motivation.quote: Make your interactions with people transformational, not just transactional.
motivation.author: Patti Smith

motivation.quote: You will have to make up for the smallness of your size by your courage and selfless devotion to duty, for it is not life that matters, but the courage, fortitude and determination you bring to it.
motivation.author: Muhammad Ali Jinnah

motivation.quote: The greatest blessing granted to mankind come by way of madness, which is a divine gift.
motivation.author: Socrates

motivation.quote: Total paranoia is just total awareness.
motivation.author: Charles Manson

motivation.quote: To exist in this vast universe for a speck of time is the great gift of life. Our tiny sliver of time is our gift of life. It is our only life. The universe will go on, indifferent to our brief existence, but while we are here we touch not just part of that vastness, but also the lives around us. Life is the gift each of us has been given. Each life is our own and no one else's. It is precious beyond all counting. It is the greatest value we can have. Cherish it for what it truly is..... Your life is yours alone. Rise up and live it.
motivation.author: Terry Goodkind

motivation.quote: God helps those who strut their stuff.
motivation.author: Dan Sofer

motivation.quote: It's okay to be a loser, it just depends on how good you are at being one.
motivation.author: Billie Joe Armstrong

motivation.quote: We never know how high we are till we are called to rise. Then if we are true to form our statures touch the skies.
motivation.author: Emily Dickinson

motivation.quote: Do not love half lovers Do not entertain half friends  Do not indulge in works of the half talented Do not live half a life  and do not die a half death If you choose silence, then be silent When you speak, do so until you are finished Do not silence yourself to say something And do not speak to be silent If you accept, then express it bluntly Do not mask it If you refuse then be clear about it  for an ambiguous refusal is but a weak acceptance Do not accept half a solution Do not believe half truths Do not dream half a dream Do not fantasize about half hopes Half a drink will not quench your thirst Half a meal will not satiate your hunger Half the way will get you no where Half an idea will bear you no results Your other half is not the one you love It is you in another time yet in the same space It is you when you are not Half a life is a life you didn't live,  A word you have not said A smile you postponed  A love you have not had A friendship you did not know To reach and not arrive Work and not work Attend only to be absent What makes you a stranger to them closest to you and they strangers to you The half is a mere moment of inability but you are able for you are not half a being You are a whole that exists to live a life  not half a life
motivation.author: Gibran Khalil Gibran

motivation.quote: I don't think we get answers to every question. We don't get all the whys. But I think when we look back to the end of our lives, if we do the best we can, and we will see that the things we begged God to take from us, the things we cursed him for, the things that made us turn our backs on him, are the things that were the biggest blessings, the biggest opportunities for growth.
motivation.author: Amy Harmon

motivation.quote: People are always telling me that i'm not like other girls...that i dont dress like other girls...that i dont act like other girls. But i'm my OWN person...i go to the beat of my own drum.
motivation.author: Miley Cyrus

motivation.quote: To separate oneself from the burden, the angst, the anguish that we all encounter everyday. To say I am alive, I am wonderful, I am. I am. That is something to aspire to.
motivation.author: Garth Stein

motivation.quote: In the end, everything is a gag.
motivation.author: Charlie Chaplin

motivation.quote: So what? You're another person, so of course you look different. What do you need to be ashamed for?
motivation.author: Yana Toboso

motivation.quote: Man jadda wajadaSiapa yang bersungguh - sungguh, akan berhasil
motivation.author: Ahmad Fuadi

motivation.quote: Appreciate the moment of a first kiss; it may be the last time you own your heart.
motivation.author: robert m drake

motivation.quote: It is foolish to tear one’s hair in grief, as though sorrow would be made less by baldness.
motivation.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

motivation.quote: Society will always be too fragile to accept us for all that makes us beautiful.
motivation.author: robert m drake

motivation.quote: Things will change: you won't feel this way forever. And anyway, sometimes the hardest lessons to learn are the ones your soul needs most.
motivation.author: Kelly Cutrone

motivation.quote: It occurred to me by intuition, and music was the driving force behind that intuition. My discovery was the result of musical perception.
motivation.author: Albert Einstein

motivation.quote: The strength of a man isn't seen in the power of his arms. It's seen in the love with which he EMBRACES you.
motivation.author: Steve Maraboli

motivation.quote: Indeed, the more we find to love, the more we add to the measure of our hearts.
motivation.author: Lloyd Alexander

motivation.quote: The More we value things, the less we value ourselves
motivation.author: Bruce Lee

motivation.quote: I don't think you should wait. I think you should speak now.
motivation.author: Taylor Swift

motivation.quote: Strength is Life, Weakness is Death.Expansion is Life, Contraction is Death.Love is Life, Hatred is Death.
motivation.author: Swami Vivekananda

motivation.quote: A thing worth having is a thing worth cheating for.
motivation.author: W.C. Fields

motivation.quote: Love feels no burden, thinks nothing of its trouble, attempts what is above its strength, pleads no excuse for impossibility, for it thinks all things are lawful for itself and all things are possible
motivation.author: Thomas A. Kempis

motivation.quote: It has always seemed to me that a coward is a person who cares more about what people say than about what is right. Bravery isn't about what people call you, Spensa. It's about who you know yourself to be.
motivation.author: Brandon Sanderson

motivation.quote: God is God. He knows what he is doing. When you can’t trace his hand, trust his heart.
motivation.author: Max Lucado (Grace for the Moment)

motivation.quote: Watch for the thing that will show itself to you. Because that thing, when you find it, will be your future.
motivation.author: Arthur Golden

motivation.quote: Read books. Care about things. Get excited. Try not to be too down on youself. Enjoy the ever present game of knowing.
motivation.author: Hank Green

motivation.quote: You don't win races by wishing, you win them by running faster than everyone else does.
motivation.author: Philip Pullman

motivation.quote: الحقيقة صعبة وموحشة، لذلك يفضل الناس ألّا يعرفوها ويكتفون بما يفترضونه عنها، مكتفين بالصورة أو الظاهر منها!
motivation.author: فايز غازي، Fayez Ghazi

motivation.quote: Happiness is the only thing worth fighting for in life.
motivation.author: Lilly Singh

motivation.quote: If there never was a night or day and memories could fade away, then we'd be nothing left but the dreams we made
motivation.author: Selena Gomez

motivation.quote: Education develops the intellect; and the intellect distinguishes man from other creatures. It is education that enables man to harness nature and utilize her resources for the well-being and improvement of his life. The key for the betterment and completeness of modern living is education. But, ' Man cannot live by bread alone '. Man, after all, is also composed of intellect and soul. Therefore, education in general, and higher education in particular, must aim to provide, beyond the physical, food for the intellect and soul. That education which ignores man's intrinsic nature, and neglects his intellect and reasoning power can not be considered true education.
motivation.author: Haile Selassie I

motivation.quote: To do something that you feel in your heart that's great, you need to make a lot of mistakes. Anything that's successful is a series of mistakes.
motivation.author: Billie Joe Armstrong

motivation.quote: Don't go on discussing what a good person should be. Just be one.
motivation.author: Marcus Aurelius

motivation.quote: Fourscore and seven years ago our fathers brought forth on this continent, a new nation, conceived in Liberty, and dedicated to the proposition that all men are created equal.
motivation.author: Abraham Lincoln

motivation.quote: To every problem, there is a most simple solution.
motivation.author: Agatha Christie

motivation.quote: There are not enough days in forever to allow me to fully express the depth of my love for you.
motivation.author: Steve Maraboli

motivation.quote: Day after day, day after day,We stuck, nor breath nor motion;As idle as a painted shipUpon a painted ocean.
motivation.author: Samuel Taylor Coleridge

motivation.quote: Successful people have libraries. The rest have big screen TVs
motivation.author: Jim Rohn

motivation.quote: I don’t want anyone to hold back who they are. It’s not okay… it’s not a good thing
motivation.author: Connor Franta

motivation.quote: As for what it's against - the story is against those who pervert and misuse religion, or any other kind of doctrine with a holy book and a priesthood and an apparatus of power that wields unchallengeable authority, in order to dominate and suppress human freedoms.
motivation.author: Philip Pullman

motivation.quote: My life is very monotonous," the fox said. "I hunt chickens: men hunt me. All the chickens are just alike, and all the men are just alike. And, in consequence, I am a little bored. But if you tame me, it will be as if the sun came to shine on my life. I shall know the sound of a step that will be different from all the others. Other steps send me hurrying back underneath the ground. Yours will call me, like music, out of my burrow. And then look: you see the grain fields down yonder? [...] The wheat fields have nothing to say to me. And that is sad. But you have hair that is the color of gold. Think how wonderful that will be when you have tamed me! The grain, which is also golden, will bring me back to the thought of you. And I shall love to listen to the wheat in the wind...
motivation.author: Antoine St

motivation.quote: Storms make trees take deeper roots.
motivation.author: Dolly Parton

motivation.quote: Nobody is exempt from the trials of life, but everyone can always find something positive in everything even in the worst of times.
motivation.author: Roy T. Bennett

motivation.quote: You can fail at what you don't want, so you might as well take a chance on doing what you love.
motivation.author: Jim Carrey

motivation.quote: When life doesn't meet your expectations, it was important to take it with grace.
motivation.author: Patricia Briggs

motivation.quote: Vote for the man who promises least; he'll be the least disappointing.
motivation.author: Bernard Baruch

motivation.quote: Once for all, then, a short precept is given thee: Love, and do what thou wilt: whether thou hold thy peace, through love hold thy peace; whether thou cry out, through love cry out; whether thou correct, through love correct; whether thou spare, through love do thou spare: let the root of love be within, of this root can nothing spring but what is good.
motivation.author: Augustine of Hippo

motivation.quote: When I try, I fail. When I trust, He succeeds.
motivation.author: Corrie ten Boom

motivation.quote: Realize that true happiness lies within you. Waste no time and effort searching for peace and contentment and joy in the world outside. Remember that there is no happiness in having or in getting, but only in giving. Reach out. Share. Smile. Hug. Happiness is a perfume you cannot pour on others without getting a few drops on yourself.
motivation.author: Og Mandino

motivation.quote: The heart is like a woman, and the head is like a man, and although man is the head of woman, woman is the heart of man, and she turns man's head because she turns his heart.
motivation.author: Peter Kreeft

motivation.quote: Do not fear the thorns in your path, for they draw only corrupt blood.
motivation.author: Kahlil Gibran

motivation.quote: The trouble with fiction," said John Rivers, "is that it makes too much sense. Reality never makes sense.
motivation.author: Aldous Huxley

motivation.quote: O love, O fire! once he drewWith one long kiss my whole soul throughMy lips, as sunlight drinketh dew.
motivation.author: Alfred Lord Tennyson

motivation.quote: Because people don't have wings... We look for ways to fly.
motivation.author: Haruichi Furudate

motivation.quote: In imagination she sailed over storied seas that wash the distant shining shores of "faëry lands forlorn," where lost Atlantis and Elysium lie, with the evening star for pilot, to the land of Heart's Desire. And she was richer in those dreams than in realities; for things seen pass away, but the things that are unseen are eternal.
motivation.author: L.M. Montgomery

motivation.quote: There is no illusion greater than fear.
motivation.author: Lao Tzu Tao Teh Ching

motivation.quote: My atheism, like that of Spinoza, is true piety towards the universe and denies only gods fashioned by men in their own image, to be servants of their human interests.
motivation.author: George Santayana

motivation.quote: Distance was a dangerous thing, she knew. Distance changed people.
motivation.author: Rohinton Mistry

motivation.quote: Don't let anyone take care of you. Can you maybe leave that for me to do? I mean, take care of you? Feel free to take care of me in return... because I think I'll need you to do that.
motivation.author: Melina Marchetta

motivation.quote: Don't be afraid of the shadows, that only means there's a light nearby.
motivation.author: Evanescence

motivation.quote: REMEMBER YOUR GREATNESSBefore you were born,And were still too tiny forThe human eye to see,You won the race for lifeFrom among 250 million competitors.And yet,How fast you have forgottenYour strength,When your very existenceIs proof of your greatness.You were born a winner,A warrior,One who defied the oddsBy surviving the most gruesomeBattle of them all.And now that you are a giant,Why do you even doubt victoryAgainst smaller numbers,And wider margins?The only walls that exist,Are those you have placed in your mind.And whatever obstacles you conceive,Exist only because you have forgottenWhat you have alreadyAchieved.Poetry by Suzy Kassem
motivation.author: Suzy Kassem

motivation.quote: I wish that all nations may recover and retain their independence; that those which are overgrown may not advance beyond safe measures of power, that a salutary balance may be ever maintained among nations, and that our peace, commerce, and friendship, may be sought and cultivated by all. It is our business to manufacture for ourselves whatever we can, to keep our markets open for what we can spare or want; and the less we have to do with the amities or enmities of Europe, the better. Not in our day, but at no distant one, we may shake a rod over the heads of all, which may make the stoutest of them tremble. But I hope our wisdom will grow with our power, and teach us, that the less we use our power, the greater it will be.
motivation.author: Thomas Jefferson

motivation.quote: Those who travel to mountain-tops are half in love with themselves, and half in love with oblivion.
motivation.author: Robert Macfarlane

motivation.quote: For the world is in a bad state, but everything will become still worse unless each of us does his best.
motivation.author: Viktor E. Frankl

motivation.quote: Each day is God's gift to you. What you do with it is your gift to Him.
motivation.author: T.D. Jakes

motivation.quote: We have to pray with our eyes on God, not on the difficulties.
motivation.author: Oswald Chambers

motivation.quote: Integrity is doing what is right and truthful, and doing as you say you would do.
motivation.author: Roy T. Bennett

motivation.quote: Not only is there often a right and wrong, but what goes around does come around, Karma exists, chickens do come home to roost, and as my mother, Phyllis, liked to say, "There is always a day of reckoning." The good among the great understand that every choice we make adds to the strength or weakness of our spirits—ourselves, or to use an old fashioned word for the same idea, our souls. That is every human’s life work: to construct an identity bit by bit, to walk a path step by step, to live a life that is worthy of something higher, lighter, more fulfilling, and maybe even everlasting.
motivation.author: Donald Van de Mark

motivation.quote: I am fallen, flawed and imperfect. Yet drenched in the grace and mercy that is found in Jesus Christ, there is strength
motivation.author: Adam Young

motivation.quote: Scars show us where we have been, they do not dictate where we are going.
motivation.author: David Rossi

motivation.quote: May my heart be kind, my mind fierce, and my spirit brave.
motivation.author: Kate Forsyth

motivation.quote: Act as if! Act as if you're a wealthy man, rich already, and then you'll surely become rich. Act as if you have unmatched confidence and then people will surely have confidence in you. Act as if you have unmatched experience and then people will follow your advice. And act as if you are already a tremendous success, and as sure as I stand here today - you will become successful.
motivation.author: Jordan Belfort

motivation.quote: Speak with integrity. Say only what you mean. Avoid using the word to speak against yourslef or to gossip about others. Use your power of your word in the direction of truth and love.
motivation.author: Don Miguel Ruiz

motivation.quote: And I think that's what our world is desperately in need of - lovers, people who are building deep, genuine relationships with fellow strugglers along the way, and who actually know the faces of the people behind the issues they are concerned about.
motivation.author: Shane Claiborne

motivation.quote: The most difficult thing is the decision to act, the rest is merely tenacity. The fears are paper tigers. You can do anything you decide to do. You can act to change and control your life; and the procedure, the process is its own reward.
motivation.author: Amelia Earhart

motivation.quote: Life is suffering Love is the desire to see unnecessary suffering amelioratedTruth is the handmaiden of loveDialogue is the pathway to truth Humility is recognition of personal insufficiency and the willingness to learn To learn is to die voluntarily and be born again, in great ways and smallSo speech must be untrammeled So that dialogue can take placeSo that we can all humbly learn So that truth can serve loveSo that suffering can be amelioratedSo that we can all stumble forward to the Kingdom of God
motivation.author: Jordan B. Peterson

motivation.quote: Don't turn over the rocks if you don't want to see the pale creatures who live under them.
motivation.author: Janet Fitch

motivation.quote: Were I a Roman Catholic, perhaps I should on this occasion vow to build a chapel to some saint, but as I am not, if I were to vow at all, it should be to build a light-house.[Letter to his wife, 17 July 1757, after narrowly avoiding a shipwreck; often misquoted as "Lighthouses are more helpful than churches."]
motivation.author: Benjamin Franklin

motivation.quote: Difficulties increase the nearer we get to the goal.
motivation.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

motivation.quote: Don't feel stupid if you don't like what everyone else pretends to love.
motivation.author: Emma Watson

motivation.quote: You can never cross the ocean until you have the courage to lose sight of the shore
motivation.author: André Gide

motivation.quote: He who speaks without an attentive ear is mute.
motivation.author: Stephen King

motivation.quote: If freedom is short of weapons, we must compensate with willpower.
motivation.author: Adolf Hitler

motivation.quote: I attribute my success to this:—I never gave or took an excuse.
motivation.author: Florence Nightingale

motivation.quote: I have met some highly intelligent believers, but history has no record to say that [s]he knew or understood the mind of god. Yet this is precisely the qualification which the godly must claim—so modestly and so humbly—to possess. It is time to withdraw our 'respect' from such fantastic claims, all of them aimed at the exertion of power over other humans in the real and material world.
motivation.author: Christopher Hitchens

motivation.quote: Become the leader of your life. Lead yourself to where you want to be. Breathe life back into your ambitions, your desires, your goals, your relationships.
motivation.author: Steve Maraboli

motivation.quote: What men and women need is encouragement. Their natural resisting powers should be strengthened, not weakened ... Instead of always harping on a man's faults, tell him of his virtues. Try to pull him out of his rut ... Hold up to him his better self, his real self that can dare and do and win out! ... People radiate what is in their minds and in their hearts.
motivation.author: Eleanor H. Porter

motivation.quote: A sailor chooses the wind that takes the ship from a safe port. Ah, yes, but once you're abroad, as you have seen, winds have a mind of their own. Be careful, Charlotte, careful of the wind you choose.
motivation.author: Avi

motivation.quote: I wish I could make him understand that a loving good heart is riches enough, and that without it intellect is poverty.
motivation.author: Mark Twain

motivation.quote: You can't change the wind but you can set your sails.
motivation.author: Billie Joe Armstrong

motivation.quote: Be yourself. Don't worry about what other people are thinking of you, because they're probably feeling the same kind of scared, horrible feelings that everyone does.
motivation.author: Phil Lester

motivation.quote: This world is your best teacher. There is a lesson in everything. There is a lesson in each experience. Learn it and become wise. Every failure is a stepping stone to success. Every difficulty or disappointment is a trial of your faith. Every unpleasant incident or temptation is a test of your inner strength. Therefore nil desperandum. March forward hero!
motivation.author: Sivananda

motivation.quote: The purpose of life is not to be happy—but to matter, to be productive, to be useful, to have it make some difference that you lived at all.
motivation.author: Leo Rosten

motivation.quote: Life is ours to be spent, not tobe saved.
motivation.author: D.H. Lawrence

motivation.quote: Your world is a living expression of how you are using and have used your mind.
motivation.author: Earl Nightingale

motivation.quote: Undisturbed calmness of mind is attained by cultivating friendliness toward the happy, compassion for the unhappy, delight in the virtuous, and indifference toward the wicked.
motivation.author: Patanjali

motivation.quote: Libraries store the energy that fuels the imagination. They open up windows to the world and inspire us to explore and achieve, and contribute to improving our quality of life. Libraries change lives for the better.
motivation.author: Sidney Sheldon

motivation.quote: Many people pray to be kept out of unexpected problems. Some people pray to be able to confront and overcome them.
motivation.author: Toba Beta [Betelgeuse Incident]

motivation.quote: Books. They are lined up on shelves or stacked on a table. There they are wrapped up in their jackets, lines of neat print on nicely bound pages. They look like such orderly, static things. Then you, the reader come along. You open the book jacket, and it can be like opening the gates to an unknown city, or opening the lid of a treasure chest. You read the first word and you're off on a journey of exploration and discovery.
motivation.author: David Almond

motivation.quote: Hindi ako naniniwalang kailangan ng tao mangarap dahil gusto n’ya ng pera, o gusto n’yang sumikat, o gusto n’ya ng impluwensya. Side effects na lang ang mga ‘to, sa tingin ko. Nangangarap ang tao dahil binigyan s’ya ng Diyos ng kakayanang mangarap at tumupad nito. Tungkulin n’yang pagbutihin ang pagkatao n’ya at mag-ambag ng tulong sa mundo. At wala na s’yang iba pang magagawang mas malaking kasalanan sa sarili bukod sa talikuran ang tungkuling yon…
motivation.author: Bob Ong

motivation.quote: Today is the oldest you've ever been, and the youngest you'll ever be again.
motivation.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

motivation.quote: Fortune does favor the bold and you'll never know what you're capable of if you don't try.
motivation.author: Sheryl Sandberg

motivation.quote: When someone is trying very hard to get something, they don't. And when they're running away from something as hard as they can, it usually catches up with them.
motivation.author: Haruki Murakami

motivation.quote: When you are living the best version of yourself, you inspire others to live the best versions of themselves.
motivation.author: Steve Maraboli

motivation.quote: Happiness in marriage is entirely a matter of chance. If the dispositions of the parties are ever so well known to each other or ever so similar beforehand, it does not advance their felicity in the least. They always continue to grow sufficiently unlike afterwards to have their share of vexation; and it is better to know as little as possible of the defects of the person with whom you are to pass your life.
motivation.author: Jane Austen

motivation.quote: God will not have his work made manifest by cowards
motivation.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

motivation.quote: It had never occurred to me that our lives, which had been so closely interwoven, could unravel with such speed.
motivation.author: Kazuo Ishiguro

motivation.quote: All I have is all I need and all I need is all I have in this moment.
motivation.author: Byron Katie

motivation.quote: Life has no limitations, except the ones you make.
motivation.author: Les Brown

motivation.quote: Me, I want to bloody kick this moronic bloody world in the bloody teeth over and over till it bloody understands that not hurting people is ten bloody thousand times more bloody important than being right.
motivation.author: David Mitchell

motivation.quote: Dancing in all its forms cannot be excluded from the curriculum of all noble education; dancing with the feet, with ideas, with words, and, need I add that one must also be able to dance with the pen?
motivation.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

motivation.quote: I should have learned this, she thought. I wanted to learn fire, and pain, but I should have learned people.
motivation.author: Terry Pratchett

motivation.quote: Fear not the path of Truth for the lack of People walking on it.
motivation.author: Robert F. Kennedy

motivation.quote: My goal is this: always to put myself in the place in which I am best able to serve, wherever my gifts and qualities find the best soil to grow, the widest field of action. There is no other goal.
motivation.author: Hermann Hesse

motivation.quote: The question is very understandable, but no one has found a satisfactory answer to it so far. Yes, why do they make still more gigantic planes, still heavier bombs and, at the same time, prefabricated houses for reconstruction? Why should millions be spent daily on the war and yet there's not a penny available for medical services, artists, or for poor people?Why do some people have to starve, while there are surpluses rotting in other parts of the world? Oh, why are people so crazy?
motivation.author: Anne Frank

motivation.quote: You don't always have to kiss a lot of frogs to recognize a prince when you find one -Henrietta Barett
motivation.author: Julia Quinn

motivation.quote: Life is 10 percent what happens to you and ninety percent how you respond to it.
motivation.author: Lou Holtz

motivation.quote: The road of life is strewn with the bodies of promising people. People who show promise, yet lack the confidence to act. People who make promises they are unable to keep. People who promise to do tomorrow what they could do today. Promising young stars, athletes, entrepreneurs who wait for promises to come true. Promise without a goal and a plan is like a barren cow. You know what she could do if she could do it, but she can't. Turn your promise into a plan. Make no promise for tomorrow if you are able to keep it today. And if someone calls you promising, know that you are not doing enough today.
motivation.author: Iyanla Vanzant

motivation.quote: Man is a being in search of meaning.
motivation.author: Plato

motivation.quote: Di jalan cinta para pejuang, biarkan cinta berhenti di titik ketaatan.. Meloncati rasa suka dan tidak suka.. Melampaui batas cinta dan benci.. Karena hikmah sejati tak selalu terungkap di awal pagi.. Karena seringkali kebodohan merabunkan kesan sesaat.. Maka taat adalah prioritas yang kadang membuat perasaan-perasaan terkibas.. Tapi yakinlah, di jalan cinta para pejuang, Alloh lebih tahu tentang kita..
motivation.author: Salim A. Fillah

motivation.quote: It is better to live one day as a lion than 100 years as a sheep.
motivation.author: Benito Mussolini

motivation.quote: If you care about someone enough, you’ll always be there for them no matter what.
motivation.author: Roy T. Bennett

motivation.quote: I believe in some blending of hope and sunshine sweetening the worst lots. I believe that this life is not all; neither the beginning nor the end. I believe while I tremble; I trust while I weep.
motivation.author: Charlotte Bronte

motivation.quote: What you do is what matters, not what you think or say or plan.
motivation.author: Jason Fried

motivation.quote: It is our wounds that create in us a desire to reach for miracles. The fulfillment of such miracles depends on whether we let our wounds pull us down or lift us up towards our dreams.
motivation.author: Jocelyn Soriano

motivation.quote: Never let anybody guess that you have a mind of your own. Above all be pure
motivation.author: Virginia Woolf

motivation.quote: Onward and Upward! To Narnia and the North!
motivation.author: C.S. Lewis

motivation.quote: One of the lessons that I grew up with was to always stay true to yourself and never let what somebody else says distract you from your goals. And so when I hear about negative and false attacks, I really don't invest any energy in them, because I know who I am.
motivation.author: Michelle Obama

motivation.quote: I do like the world quite a lot.
motivation.author: Shannon Hale

motivation.quote: I can't understand why people are frightened of new ideas. I'm frightened of the old ones.
motivation.author: John Cage

motivation.quote: Go and get your things,' he said. 'Dreams mean work.
motivation.author: Paulo Coelho

motivation.quote: Fear defeats more people than any other one thing in the world.
motivation.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

motivation.quote: Everything will be alright in the end so if it is not alright it is not the end.
motivation.author: Deborah Moggach

motivation.quote: God is whispering in your heart, in the whole existence, just tune your ears.
motivation.author: Amit Ray

motivation.quote: Everyone kept telling me not to worry someone will do something. No one did so I became someone and did something.
motivation.author: Mark A. Cooper

motivation.quote: Me plus you. (Imma tell you one time) Me plus you. (Imma tell you one time)Me plus you. (Imma tell you one time)One time. When I met ya girl my heart when knock (knock knock) Now them butterflies in my stomach won't stop (stop stop) Even love is a struggle and it's all we got. So we gun keep keep climbing to the mountain top. 'Cause your world, is my world, and my breath is your breath, and my heart is yours...
motivation.author: Justin Bieber

motivation.quote: she lived with hurricane eyes and fell in love with the way the waves collapsed against her cheeks.
motivation.author: Christopher Poindexter

motivation.quote: A successful marriage requires falling in love many times -- always with the same person.
motivation.author: Mignon McLaughlin

motivation.quote: In your own life it's important to know how spectacular you are.
motivation.author: Steve Maraboli

motivation.quote: But there's always a first time for everything
motivation.author: Melissa de la Cruz

motivation.quote: You have forgotten the Onewho doesn't care about ownership,who doesn't try to turn a profitfrom every human exchange.
motivation.author: Mawlana Jalal-al-Din Rumi

motivation.quote: For too many centuries women have been being muses to artists. I wanted to be the muse, I wanted to be the wife of the artist, but I was really trying to avoid the final issue — that I had to do the job myself.
motivation.author: Anaïs Nin

motivation.quote: When I was One,I had just begun.When I was Two,I was nearly new.When I was ThreeI was hardly me.When I was Four,I was not much more.When I was Five, I was just alive.But now I am Six, I'm as clever as clever,So I think I'll be six now for ever and ever.
motivation.author: A.A. Milne

motivation.quote: Do not let the hero in your soul parish, in lonely frustration, for the life you deserved but never have been able to reach. Check your road and the nature of your battle. The world you desired can be won. It exists, it is real, it is possible, it is yours.
motivation.author: Ayn Rand

motivation.quote: This was not a fearie tale. This was not the movies. This was life. It hurt more. It was excruciating. It was excruciatingly beautiful.
motivation.author: Francesca Lia Block

motivation.quote: No matter who we are, no matter what our circumstances, our feelings and emotions are universal. And music has always been a great way to make people aware of that connection. It can help you open up a part of yourself and express feelings you didn't know you were feeling. It's risky to let that happen. But it's a risk you have to take-because only then will you find you're not alone.
motivation.author: Josh Groban

motivation.quote: It is this belief in a power larger than myself and other than myself which allows me to venture into the unknown and even the unknowable.
motivation.author: Maya Angelou

motivation.quote: Tuhan kan nggak mungkin langsung sedekah ke orang-orang, ya kalianlah sedekah duit kalau punya duit, sedekah ilmu, sedekah senyum.Masa sih kalau sudah gitu Tuhan gak bales cintamu? Tapi gak mungkin dia belai-belai langsung rambutmu, sentuh bibirmu.Maka Tuhan ciptakan "wakil"nya, yaitu pacarmu. Maka doalah, "Tuhan, semoga pacarku ini betul-betul orang yang kau pilihkan untukku.
motivation.author: Sujiwo Tejo

motivation.quote: We don’t truly appreciate what we have until it’s gone… We don’t really appreciate something until we have experienced some events; we don't really appreciate our parents until we ourselves have become parents. Be grateful for what you have now, and nothing should be taken for granted.
motivation.author: Roy T. Bennett

motivation.quote: A revolution is coming – a revolution which will be peaceful if we are wise enough; compassionate if we care enough; successful if we are fortunate enough – but a revolution which is coming whether we will it or not. We can affect its character; we cannot alter its inevitability.[Report to the United States Senate on his trip to Latin America and the Alliance for Progress, May 9-10 1966]
motivation.author: Robert F. Kennedy

motivation.quote: Evil exists in us all, Torak. Some fight it. Some feed it. That's how it's always been.
motivation.author: Michelle Paver

motivation.quote: No matter how safe and beautiful it is, a cage is still a cage.
motivation.author: Jessica Spotswood

motivation.quote: The doubters said, "Man can not fly," The doers said, "Maybe, but we'll try," And finally soared In the morning glow While non-believers Watched from below.
motivation.author: Bruce Lee

motivation.quote: Kung matatakot kang harapin ang totoo at sabihin ang talagang nararamdaman mo dahil baka masaktan ka, isa lang ibig sabihin noon: ipinagkait mo na sa sarili mo ang pagiging masaya at kinarir mo ang magpakatanga.
motivation.author: bob ong

motivation.quote: On no subject are our ideas more warped and pitiable than on death. ... Let children walk with nature, let them see the beautiful blendings and communions of death and life, their joyous inseparable unity, as taught in woods and meadows, plains and mountains and streams of our blessed star, and they will learn that death is stingless indeed, and as beautiful as life, and that the grave has no victory, for it never fights.
motivation.author: John Muir

motivation.quote: You are old beyond your years Zoeybird. Believe in yourself and you will find a way. But remember darkness does not always equate to evil just like light does not always bring good.
motivation.author: P.C. Cast

motivation.quote: We crave for new sensations but soon become indifferent to them. The wonders of yesterday are today common occurrences
motivation.author: Nikola Tesla

motivation.quote: You have a unique gift to offer this world. Be true to yourself, be kind to yourself, read and learn about everything that interests you and keep away from people who bring you down. When you treat yourself kindly and respect the uniqueness of those around you, you will be giving this world an amazing gift... YOU!
motivation.author: Steve Maraboli

motivation.quote: Most don't deserve your tears... and the ones that do will never make you cry.
motivation.author: T. Rafael Cimino

motivation.quote: Let's start a new tomorrow, today.
motivation.author: Neil Gaiman

motivation.quote: After all, if you do not resist the apparently inevitable, you will never know how inevitable the inevitable was.
motivation.author: Terry Eagleton

motivation.quote: Why am I compelled to write?... Because the world I create in the writing compensates for what the real world does not give me. By writing I put order in the world, give it a handle so I can grasp it. I write because life does not appease my appetites and anger... To become more intimate with myself and you. To discover myself, to preserve myself, to make myself, to achieve self-autonomy. To dispell the myths that I am a mad prophet or a poor suffering soul. To convince myself that I am worthy and that what I have to say is not a pile of shit... Finally I write because I'm scared of writing, but I'm more scared of not writing.
motivation.author: Gloria Anzaldúa

motivation.quote: Then hate me when thou wilt; if ever, now;Now, while the world is bent my deeds to cross,Join with the spite of fortune, make me bow,And do not drop in for an after-loss:Ah! do not, when my heart hath ‘scaped this sorrow,Come in the rearward of a conquered woe;Give not a windy night a rainy morrow,To linger out a purposed overthrow.If thou wilt leave me, do not leave me last,When other petty griefs have done their spite,But in the onset come: so shall I tasteAt first the very worst of fortune’s might;And other strains of woe, which now seem woe,Compared with loss of thee, will not seem so.
motivation.author: William Shakespeare

motivation.quote: What I’ve realized is that life doesn’t count for much unless you’re willing to do your small part to leave our children — all of our children — a better world. Any fool can have a child. That doesn’t make you a father. It’s the courage to raise a child that makes you a father.
motivation.author: Barack Obama

motivation.quote: If I am truly to become an autonomous woman, then I must take over that role of being my own guardian...I not only have to become my own husband, but I need to be my own father, too.
motivation.author: Elizabeth Gilbert

motivation.quote: Blessed are the weird people: poets, misfits, writersmystics, painters, troubadoursfor they teach us to see the world through different eyes.
motivation.author: Jacob Nordby

motivation.quote: Feel your emotions,Live true your passions,Keep still your mind.
motivation.author: Geoffrey M. Gluckman

motivation.quote: Though we tremble before uncertain futuresmay we meet illness, death and adversity with strengthmay we dance in the face of our fears.
motivation.author: Gloria Anzaldúa

motivation.quote: Courtesy costs nothing, but buys everything.
motivation.author: Hazrat Ali ibn Abu-Talib A.S

motivation.quote: Rogerson," I asked him sweetly as we sat watching a video in the pool house, "where would I find the pelagic zone?"In the open sea," he said. "Now shut up and eat your Junior Mints.
motivation.author: Sarah Dessen

motivation.quote: If you hear how wonderful you are often enough, you begin to believe it, no matter how you try to resist it.
motivation.author: Ben Carson

motivation.quote: I marveled at the beauty of all life and savored the power and possibilities of my imagination. In these rare moments, I prayed, I danced, and I analyzed. I saw that life was good and bad, beautiful and ugly. I understood that I had to dwell on the good and beautiful in order to keep my imagination, sensitivity, and gratitude intact. I knew it would not be easy to maintain this perspective. I knew I would often twist and turn, bend and crack a little, but I also knew that…I would never completely break.
motivation.author: Maria Nhambu

motivation.quote: Loneliness and the feeling of being unwanted is the most terrible poverty.
motivation.author: Mother Teresa

motivation.quote: There is no such thing as a great talent without great willpower.
motivation.author: Honoré de Balzac

motivation.quote: Teachers are the one and only people who save nations.
motivation.author: Mustafa Kemal Atatürk

motivation.quote: Yet, even amidst the hatred and carnage, life is still worth living. It is possible for wonderful encounters and beautiful things to exist.
motivation.author: Hayao Miyazaki

motivation.quote: There's no point in wishing. We can't change anything about the past. We can only remember. We can only move forward.
motivation.author: Emily X.R. Pan

motivation.quote: impossible is not a word
motivation.author: Obert Skye

motivation.quote: Yet, at the same time, as the Eastern sages also knew, man is a worm and food for worms. This is the paradox: he is out of nature and hopelessly in it; he is dual, up in the stars and yet housed in a heart-pumping, breath-gasping body that once belonged to a fish and still carries the gill-marks to prove it. His body is a material fleshy casing that is alien to him in many ways—the strangest and most repugnant way being that it aches and bleeds and will decay and die. Man is literally split in two: he has an awareness of his own splendid uniqueness in that he sticks out of nature with a towering majesty, and yet he goes back into the ground a few feet in order to blindly and dumbly rot and disappear forever. It is a terrifying dilemma to be in and to have to live with. The lower animals are, of course, spared this painful contradiction, as they lack a symbolic identity and the self-consciousness that goes with it. They merely act and move reflexively as they are driven by their instincts. If they pause at all, it is only a physical pause; inside they are anonymous, and even their faces have no name. They live in a world without time, pulsating, as it were, in a state of dumb being. This is what has made it so simple to shoot down whole herds of buffalo or elephants. The animals don't know that death is happening and continue grazing placidly while others drop alongside them. The knowledge of death is reflective and conceptual, and animals are spared it. They live and they disappear with the same thoughtlessness: a few minutes of fear, a few seconds of anguish, and it is over. But to live a whole lifetime with the fate of death haunting one's dreams and even the most sun-filled days—that's something else.
motivation.author: Ernest Becker

motivation.quote: To me, when someone wrongs you, you both share the burden of that wrongdoing - the pain of it weighs on both of you. Forgiveness, then, means choosing to bear the full weight all by yourself. Caleb's betrayal is something we both carry, and since he did it, all I've wanted is for him to take its weight away from me. I am not sure that I'm capable of shouldering it all myself - not sure that I am strong enough, or good enough.
motivation.author: Veronica Roth

motivation.quote: We live out our lives as we are meant to live them-with some choice, with some chance, but mostly as a result of the persons we are.
motivation.author: Terry Brooks

motivation.quote: With an eye made quiet by the power of harmony, and the deep power of joy, we see into the life of things.
motivation.author: William Wordsworth

motivation.quote: To be kind, honest and have positive thoughts; to forgive those who harm us and treat everyone as a friend; to help those who are suffering and never to consider ourselves superior to anyone else: even if this advice seems rather simplistic, make the effort of seeing whether by following it you can find greater happiness.
motivation.author: Dalai Lama XIV

motivation.quote: Happiness comes when your work and words are of benefit to others.
motivation.author: Buddha

motivation.quote: In the beginner’s mind there are many possibilities, but in the expert’s there are few
motivation.author: Shunryu Suzuki

motivation.quote: A lot of the conflict you have in your life exists simply because you're not living in alignment; you're not be being true to yourself.
motivation.author: Steve Maraboli

motivation.quote: I'd heard of Evergreen Care Center before. Cass and I had always made fun of the stupid ads they ran on TV, featuring some dragged-out woman with a limp perm and big, painted-on circles under her eyes, downing vodka and sobbing uncontrollably. "We can't heal you at Evergreen", the very somber voiceover said. "But we can help you to heal yourself." It had become our own running joke, applicable to almost anything. "Hey Cass, "I'd say, "hand me that toothpaste." "Caitlin," she'd say, her voice dark and serious. "I can't hand you the toothpaste. But I CAN help you hand the toothpaste to yourself.
motivation.author: Sarah Dessen

motivation.quote: No matter what your history has been, your destiny is what you create today. What are you going to create?
motivation.author: Steve Maraboli

motivation.quote: What the society thinks is of no interest to me. All that's important is how I see myself. I know who who I am. I know the value of my work.
motivation.author: Robin Sharma

motivation.quote: The true miracle lies in our eagerness to allow, appreciate, and honor the uniqueness, and freedom of each sentient being to sing the song of their heart.
motivation.author: Amit Ray

motivation.quote: the purpose of life is the life of purpose
motivation.author: Robin Sharma

motivation.quote: There is only one day left, always starting over: It is given to us at dawn and taken away from us at dusk.
motivation.author: Jean-Paul Sartre

motivation.quote: Small is the number of them that see with their own eyes and feel with their own hearts.
motivation.author: Albert Einstein

motivation.quote: If you think your boss is stupid, remember: you wouldn’t have a job if he was any smarter.
motivation.author: John Gottman (

motivation.quote: How would your life be different if…You stopped validating your victim mentality? Let today be the day…You shake off your self-defeating drama and embrace your innate ability to recover and achieve.
motivation.author: Steve Maraboli

motivation.quote: A good plan violently executed now is better than a perfect plan executed at some indefinite time in the future.
motivation.author: George S. Patton Jr.

motivation.quote: Plants are more courageous than almost all human beings: an orange tree would rather die than produce lemons, whereas instead of dying the average person would rather be someone they are not.
motivation.author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

motivation.quote: He who jumps into the void owes no explanation to those who stand and watch.
motivation.author: Jean-Luc Godard

motivation.quote: Grace is what picks me up and lifts my wings high above and I fly! Grace always conquers! Be graceful in everything; in anger, in sadness, in joy, in kindness, in unkindness, retain grace with you!
motivation.author: C. JoyBell C.

motivation.quote: In the east," she says after a time, her gaze still downcast, "there is a tradition known as kintsukuroi. It is the practice of mending broken ceramic pottery using lacquer dusted with gold and silver and other precious metals. It is meant to symbolize that things can be more beautiful for having been broken."Why are you telling me this?" I ask.At last she looks at me. Her irises are polished obsidian in the moonlight. "Because I want you to know," she says, "that there is life after survival.
motivation.author: Mackenzi Lee

motivation.quote: Your opinion is not my reality.
motivation.author: Steve Maraboli

motivation.quote: She is delightfully chaotic; a beautiful mess. Loving her is a splendid adventure.
motivation.author: Steve Maraboli

motivation.quote: Fairness does not mean everyone gets the same. Fairness means everyone gets what they need.
motivation.author: Rick Riordan

motivation.quote: 90% of the game is half mental.
motivation.author: Yogi Berra

motivation.quote: I've done my best, and I begin to understand what is meant by 'the joy of strife'. Next to trying and winning, the best thing is trying and failing.
motivation.author: L.M. Montgomery

motivation.quote: Books fall open, you fall in
motivation.author: David McCord

motivation.quote: A rose can never be a sunflower, and a sunflower can never be a rose.All flowers are beautiful in their own way, and that’s like women too. I want to encourage women to embrace their own uniqueness.
motivation.author: Miranda Kerr

motivation.quote: You start by writing to live. You end by writing so as not to die.
motivation.author: Carlos Fuentes

motivation.quote: Leaders are limited by their vision rather than by their abilities.
motivation.author: Roy T. Bennett

motivation.quote: For what it's worth, I think happiness is a fleeting condition, not a permanent state of goddamn mind. I've learned that if you chase after moments of bliss here and there, sometimes those moments will sustain you through the shit.
motivation.author: Tiffanie DeBartolo

motivation.quote: A dream you dream alone is only a dream. A dream you dream together is reality.
motivation.author: Yoko Ono

motivation.quote: Pesimistik tidak lebih daripada sikap takbur mendahului nasib.
motivation.author: Andrea Hirata

motivation.quote: Maybe 'Okay' will be our 'always'...
motivation.author: John Green

motivation.quote: What would you attempt to do if you knew you could not fail?
motivation.author: Robert Schuller

motivation.quote: It used to be about trying to do something. Now it's about trying to be someone.
motivation.author: Margaret Thatcher

motivation.quote: Sometimes we know in our bones what we really need to do, but we're afraid to do it. Taking a chance and stepping beyond the safety of the world we've always known is the only way to grow, though and without risk there is no reward.
motivation.author: Wil Wheaton

motivation.quote: The word 'listen' contains the same letters as the word 'silent'.
motivation.author: Alfred Brendel

motivation.quote: The atheist staring from his attic window is often nearer to God than the believer caught up in his own false image of God.
motivation.author: Martin Buber

motivation.quote: You will write if you will write without thinking of the result in terms of a result, but think of the writing in terms of discovery, which is to say that creation must take place between the pen and the paper, not before in a thought or afterwards in a recasting... It will come if it is there and if you will let it come.
motivation.author: Gertrude Stein

motivation.quote: Don't lose heart if it's very difficult at times, everything will come out all right and nobody can in the beginning do as he wishes.
motivation.author: Vincent Willem van Gogh

motivation.quote: I shut my eyes in order to see.
motivation.author: Paul Gauguin

motivation.quote: We had the experience but missed the meaning. And approach to the meaning restores the experience in a different form.
motivation.author: T.S. Eliot

motivation.quote: If I lived a million lives, I would've felt a million feelings and I still would've fallen a million times for you.
motivation.author: robert m drake

motivation.quote: It was stupid to hope, she knew. But sometimes hope was all you had.
motivation.author: Cassandra Clare

motivation.quote: The cause of most of man's unhappiness is sacrificing what he wants most for what he wants now.
motivation.author: Gordon B. Hinckley

motivation.quote: It’s funny, for all it took was a broken heart and that alone was enough, enough for her to do everything she ever dreamed of.
motivation.author: robert m drake

motivation.quote: Tell all the Truth but tell it slant--Success in Circuit liesToo bright for our infirm DelightThe Truth's superb surpriseAs Lightning to the Children easedWith explanation kindThe Truth must dazzle graduallyOr every man be blind--
motivation.author: Emily Dickinson

motivation.quote: If you're waiting until you feel talented enough to make it, you'll never make it.
motivation.author: Criss Jami

motivation.quote: Never miss an opportunity to show your love, especially to those close to you, because we are always at our most cautious with them for fear of being hurt.
motivation.author: Paulo Coelho

motivation.quote: A truth that no one knows is still the truth.
motivation.author: Sharon Shinn

motivation.quote: I had to learn to live without you and I couldn't make sense of it, because I left so much of me inside of you.
motivation.author: robert m drake

motivation.quote: Books have a way of finding their way into our lives, usually, right when we need them the most.
motivation.author: Richard Denney

motivation.quote: If you can’t believe in miracles, then believe in yourself. When you want something bad enough, let that drive push you to make it happen. Sometimes you’ll run into brick walls that are put there to test you. Find a way around them and stay focused on your dream. Where there’s a will, there’s a way.
motivation.author: Isabel  Lopez

motivation.quote: Small-minded people blame others. Average people blame themselves. The wise see all blame as foolishness
motivation.author: Epictetus

motivation.quote: Blind, broke, jobless, and frustrated, Kevin found it difficult to get through the following few months. But he had one big thing going for him. He was sober. It was a new beginning.
motivation.author: Traci Medford-Rosow

motivation.quote: Let us labor for an inward stillness--An inward stillness and an inward healing.That perfect silence where the lips and heartAre still, and we no longer entertainOur own imperfect thoughts and vain opinions,But God alone speaks to us and we waitIn singleness of heart that we may knowHis will, and in the silence of our spirits,That we may do His will and do that only
motivation.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

motivation.quote: It is beautiful to discover our wings and learn how to fly; flight is a beautiful process. But then to rest on the wings of God as He flies: this is divine.
motivation.author: C. JoyBell C.

motivation.quote: The more clearly we can focus our attention on the wonders and realities of the universe about us the less taste we shall have for the destruction of our race. Wonder and humility are wholesome emotions, and they do not exist side by side with a lust for destruction.{Speech accepting the John Burroughs Medal}
motivation.author: Rachel Carson

motivation.quote: Good ideas stay with you until you eventually write the story.
motivation.author: Brian Keene

motivation.quote: Those who use religion for their own benefit are detestable. We are against such a situation and will not allow it. Those who use religion in such a manner have fooled our people; it is against just such people that we have fought and will continue to fight.
motivation.author: Mustafa Kemal Atatürk

motivation.quote: People don't believe what you tell them.They rarely believe what you show them.They often believe what their friends tell them.They always believe what they tell themselves.
motivation.author: Seth Godin

motivation.quote: As Kevin climbed the three flights of stairs to his apartment, his brain formulated a vague plan of action. He could not have explained it to anyone or even to himself in coherent sentences. But the outline was there in Kevin’s subconscious. It would not only change his life, but many others, as well. A Call to Action had been born.
motivation.author: Traci Medford-Rosow

motivation.quote: Time is what keeps things from happening all at once.
motivation.author: Ann Brashares

motivation.quote: You know my name, not my story. You've heard what I've done, but not what I've been through.
motivation.author: Jonathan Anthony Burkett

motivation.quote: Do what you love, think what you feel and live the way you want.
motivation.author: Santosh Kalwar

motivation.quote: The dictionary is the only place that success comes before work. work is the key to success, and hard work can help you accomplish anything.
motivation.author: Vince Lombardi

motivation.quote: It does not matter how long you live, but how well you do it.
motivation.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

motivation.quote: God only allows us to see such things when he wants something to change
motivation.author: Paulo Coelho

motivation.quote: If your actions inspire others to dream more, learn more, do more and become more, you are a leader.
motivation.author: John Quincy Adams

motivation.quote: You do not have to sit outside in the dark. If, however, you want to look at the stars, you will find that darkness is necessary. But the stars neither require nor demand it.
motivation.author: Annie Dillard

motivation.quote: People who love themselves come across as very loving, generous and kind; they express their self-confidence through humility, forgiveness and inclusiveness.
motivation.author: Sanaya Roman

motivation.quote: If your life is worth thinking about,it is worth writing about.
motivation.author: Robin Sharma

motivation.quote: A child fish asks mother fish, 'Mother, why cannot we live on the Earth?' Mother fish replied, 'Dear… it is not the place for fish, it is the place for selfish
motivation.author: Santosh Kalwar

motivation.quote: I would not sit waiting for some vague tomorrow, nor for something to happen. One could wait a lifetime, and find nothing at the end of the waiting. I would begin here, I would make something happen.
motivation.author: Louis L'Amour

motivation.quote: Inner peace is impossible without patience. Wisdom requires patience. Spiritual growth implies the mastery of patience. Patience allows the unfolding of destiny to proceed at its won unhurried pace.
motivation.author: Brian Weiss

motivation.quote: I define vulnerability as uncertainty, risk and emotional exposure. With that definition in mind, let’s think about love. Waking up every day and loving someone who may or may not love us back, whose safety we can’t ensure, who may stay in our lives or may leave without a moment’s notice, who may be loyal to the day they die or betray us tomorrow—that’s vulnerability.
motivation.author: Brené Brown

motivation.quote: A wise man always has something to say, whereas a fool always needs to say something.
motivation.author: Hazrat Ali Ibn Abu-Talib A.S

motivation.quote: there is no moment more precious than the exact moment you are living now
motivation.author: Obert Skye

motivation.quote: Beware of speaking too much, for it increases mistakes and engenders boredom.
motivation.author: Hazrat Ali Ibn Abu-Talib A.S

motivation.quote: To be human is to be broken and broken is its own kind of beautiful.
motivation.author: robert m drake

motivation.quote: When was the last time you woke up and realized that today could be the best day of your life?
motivation.author: Steve Maraboli

motivation.quote: Accidents happen. Our bones shatter, our skin splits, our hearts break. We burn, we drown, we stay alive.
motivation.author: Moïra Fowley-Doyle

motivation.quote: Sanctify yourself and you will sanctify society.
motivation.author: Francis Of Assisi

motivation.quote: There's no reason to have a plan B because it distracts from plan A.
motivation.author: Will Smith

motivation.quote: The night before brain surgery, I thought about death. I searched out my larger values, and I asked myself, if I was going to die, did I want to do it fighting and clawing or in peaceful surrender? What sort of character did I hope to show? Was I content with myself and what I had done with my life so far? I decided that I was essentially a good person, although I could have been better--but at the same time I understood that the cancer didn't care.I asked myself what I believed. I had never prayed a lot. I hoped hard, I wished hard, but I didn't pray. I had developed a certain distrust of organized religion growing up, but I felt I had the capacity to be a spiritual person, and to hold some fervent beliefs. Quite simply, I believed I had a responsibility to be a good person, and that meant fair, honest, hardworking, and honorable. If I did that, if I was good to my family, true to my friends, if I gave back to my community or to some cause, if I wasn't a liar, a cheat, or a thief, then I believed that should be enough. At the end of the day, if there was indeed some Body or presence standing there to judge me, I hoped I would be judged on whether I had lived a true life, not on whether I believed in a certain book, or whether I'd been baptized. If there was indeed a God at the end of my days, I hoped he didn't say, 'But you were never a Christian, so you're going the other way from heaven.' If so, I was going to reply, 'You know what? You're right. Fine.'I believed, too, in the doctors and the medicine and the surgeries--I believed in that. I believed in them. A person like Dr. Einhorn [his oncologist], that's someone to believe in, I thought, a person with the mind to develop an experimental treatment 20 years ago that now could save my life. I believed in the hard currency of his intelligence and his research.Beyond that, I had no idea where to draw the line between spiritual belief and science. But I knew this much: I believed in belief, for its own shining sake. To believe in the face of utter hopelessness, every article of evidence to the contrary, to ignore apparent catastrophe--what other choice was there? We do it every day, I realized. We are so much stronger than we imagine, and belief is one of the most valiant and long-lived human characteristics. To believe, when all along we humans know that nothing can cure the briefness of this life, that there is no remedy for our basic mortality, that is a form of bravery.To continue believing in yourself, believing in the doctors, believing in the treatment, believing in whatever I chose to believe in, that was the most important thing, I decided. It had to be.Without belief, we would be left with nothing but an overwhelming doom, every single day. And it will beat you. I didn't fully see, until the cancer, how we fight every day against the creeping negatives of the world, how we struggle daily against the slow lapping of cynicism. Dispiritedness and disappointment, these were the real perils of life, not some sudden illness or cataclysmic millennium doomsday. I knew now why people fear cancer: because it is a slow and inevitable death, it is the very definition of cynicism and loss of spirit.So, I believed.
motivation.author: Lance Armstrong

motivation.quote: Blindness separates people from things;deafness separates people from people.
motivation.author: Helen Keller

motivation.quote: The boy and his heart had become friends, and neither was capable now of betraying the other.
motivation.author: Paulo Coelho

motivation.quote: Remember your humanity, and forget the rest.
motivation.author: Bertrand Russell

motivation.quote: Regret is counterproductive. It's looking back on a past that you can't change. Questioning things as they occur can prevent regret in the future.
motivation.author: Colleen Hoover

motivation.quote: And the only way to do great work is to love what you do.... Don't settle
motivation.author: Steve Jobs

motivation.quote: The most important thing is this: to be able at any moment to be free to choose a life that makes you happy.
motivation.author: Roy T. Bennett
