motivation.quote: The best way to predict the future is to invent it.

motivation.author: Hillel the Elder
motivation.quote: If not us, who? If not now, when?

motivation.author: George Burns
motivation.quote: You know you’re getting old when you stoop to tie your shoelaces and wonder what else you could do while you’re down there.

motivation.author: Judy Garland
motivation.quote: For it was not into my ear you whispered, but into my heart. It was not my lips you kissed, but my soul.

motivation.author: Polish Proverb
motivation.quote: When opportunity knocks, some people are in the backyard looking for four-leaf clovers.

motivation.author: Franklin Jones
motivation.quote: A bargain is something you don’t need at a price you can’t resist.

motivation.author: Robert Brault
motivation.quote: Enjoy the little things, for one day you may look back and realize they were the big things.

motivation.author: Roy L. Goodman
motivation.quote: Remember that happiness is a way of travel, not a destination.

motivation.author: Anonymous
motivation.quote: We live in a society where pizza gets to your house before the police.

motivation.author: Ingvar Kamprad
motivation.quote: The most dangerous poison is the feeling of achievement. The antidote is to every evening think what can be done better tomorrow.

motivation.author: Helen Keller
motivation.quote: The only thing worse than being blind is having sight but no vision.

motivation.author: Denis Waitley
motivation.quote: There are two primary choices in life: to accept conditions as they exist, or accept the responsibility for changing them.

motivation.author: Franklin P. Jones
motivation.quote: The trouble with being punctual is that nobody’s there to appreciate it.

motivation.author: Victor Hugo
motivation.quote: Life is the flower for which love is the honey.

motivation.author: Charlie Viracola
motivation.quote: Christmas always sucked when I was a kid because I believed in Santa Claus. Unfortunately, so did my parents. So I never got anything.

motivation.author: Mark Twain
motivation.quote: A habit cannot be tossed out the window; it must be coaxed down the stairs a step at a time.

motivation.author: John Wilmot (Earl of Rochester)
motivation.quote: Before I got married I had six theories about bringing up children; now I have six children and no theories.

motivation.author: George Eliot
motivation.quote: It is never too late to be what you might have been.

motivation.author: Pablo Picasso
motivation.quote: I am always doing that which I cannot do, in order that I may learn how to do it.

motivation.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.
motivation.quote: We can never forget that everything Adolf Hitler did in Germany was “legal” and everything the Hungarian freedom fighters did in Hungary was “illegal.”

motivation.author: Al McGuire
motivation.quote: The only mystery in life is why the kamikaze pilots wore helmets.

motivation.author: Anonymous
motivation.quote: Don’t walk in front of me, I may not follow. Don’t walk behind me, I may not lead. Just walk beside me and be my friend.

motivation.author: Anne Frank
motivation.quote: No one has ever become poor by giving.

motivation.author: Oscar Wilde
motivation.quote: Always forgive your enemies; nothing annoys them so much.

motivation.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
motivation.quote: To be yourself in a world that is constantly trying to make you something else is the greatest accomplishment.

motivation.author: Theodor Seuss Geisel (Dr. Seuss)
motivation.quote: Don’t cry because it’s over, smile because it happened.

motivation.author: Marilyn Monroe
motivation.quote: I’m selfish, impatient and a little insecure. I make mistakes, I am out of control, and at times hard to handle. But if you can’t handle me at my worst, you sure as hell don’t deserve me at my best.

motivation.author: William Watson Purkey
motivation.quote: You’ve gotta’ dance like there’s nobody watching, Love like you’ll never be hurt, Sing like there’s nobody listening, And live like it’s heaven on earth.

motivation.author: Oscar Wilde
motivation.quote: Be yourself; everyone else is already taken.

motivation.author: Albert Einstein
motivation.quote: Two things are infinite, the universe and human stupidity, and I am not yet completely sure about the universe.

motivation.author: Theodor Seuss Geisel (Dr. Seuss)
motivation.quote: You know you’re in love when you can’t fall asleep because reality is finally better than your dreams.

motivation.author: William Lyon Phelps
motivation.quote: This is the first test of a gentleman: his respect for those who can be of no possible value to him.

motivation.author: Pierre-Marc-Gaston de Lévis
motivation.quote: It is easier to judge the mind of a man by his questions rather than his answers.

motivation.author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.
motivation.quote: Twenty years from now you will be more disappointed by the things that you didn’t do than by the ones you did do. So throw off the bowlines. Sail away from the safe harbor. Catch the trade winds in your sails. Explore. Dream. Discover.

motivation.author: Peter Marshall
motivation.quote: Unless we stand for something, we shall fall for anything.

motivation.author: J. K. Rowling
motivation.quote: It is our choices . . . that show what we truly are, far more than our abilities.

motivation.author: William Shakespeare
motivation.quote: Love all, trust a few, do wrong to none.

motivation.author: Neil Gaiman
motivation.quote: Fairy tales are more than true–not because they tell us dragons exist, but because they tell us dragons can be beaten.

motivation.author: Albert Einstein
motivation.quote: If you can’t explain it simply, you don’t understand it well enough.

motivation.author: Mother Teresa
motivation.quote: Don’t look for big things, just do small things with great love.

motivation.author: Dwight D. Eisenhower
motivation.quote: What counts is not necessarily the size of the dog in the fight–it’s the size of the fight in the dog.

motivation.author: Epictetus
motivation.quote: A ship ought not to be held by one anchor, nor life by a single hope.

motivation.author: Friedrich Nietzsche
motivation.quote: Without music, life would be a mistake.

motivation.author: Oscar Wilde
motivation.quote: I am so clever that sometimes I don’t understand a single word of what I am saying.

motivation.author: Elbert Hubbard
motivation.quote: A friend is someone who knows all about you and still loves you.

motivation.author: Mark Twain
motivation.quote: If you tell the truth, you don’t have to remember anything.

motivation.author: Oscar Wilde
motivation.quote: To live is the rarest thing in the world. Most people exist, that is all.

motivation.author: C. S. Lewis
motivation.quote: Friendship is born at that moment when one person says to another: “What! You, too? I thought I was the only one.”

motivation.author: Henry David Thoreau
motivation.quote: If you have built castles in the air, your work need not be lost; that is where they should be. Now put the foundations under them.

motivation.author: Robert Frost
motivation.quote: In three words I can sum up everything I’ve learned about life — It goes on.

motivation.author: Mohandas Karamchand Gandhi
motivation.quote: You must be the change that you wish to see in the world.

motivation.author: Mae West
motivation.quote: You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough.

motivation.author: G. K. Chesterton
motivation.quote: Men do not differ much about what things they will call evils; they differ enormously about what evils they will call excusable.

motivation.author: Joseph Campbell
motivation.quote: The cave you fear to enter holds the treasure you seek.

motivation.author: Ethel Mumford
motivation.quote: God gave us our relatives; thank God we can choose our friends.

motivation.author: Mignon McLaughlin
motivation.quote: In the arithmetic of love, one plus one equals everything, and two minus one equals nothing.

motivation.author: Wayne Walter Dyer
motivation.quote: When you judge another, you do not define them, you define yourself.

motivation.author: Billy Sunday
motivation.quote: Going to church doesn’t make you a Christian any more than standing in a garage makes you a car.

motivation.author: Bill Clinton
motivation.quote: There is nothing wrong with America that cannot be cured by what is right with America.

motivation.author: David Gardner
motivation.quote: The only foolproof path to wealth is inheritance.

motivation.author: Jerry Seinfeld
motivation.quote: If aliens are watching us through telescopes, they’re going to think the dogs are the leaders of the planet. If you see two life forms, one of them’s making a poop, the other one’s carrying it for him, who would you assume is in charge?

motivation.author: Caskie Stinnett
motivation.quote: A diplomat is someone who can tell you to go to hell in such a way that you will look forward to the trip.

motivation.author: Josh Billings
motivation.quote: Life consists not in holding good cards but in playing those you hold well.

motivation.author: William Makepeace Thackeray
motivation.quote: To love and win is the best thing. To love and lose, the next best.

motivation.author: Rodney Dangerfield
motivation.quote: I’m at the age where I want two girls. In case I fall asleep they will have someone to talk to.

motivation.author: Mother Teresa
motivation.quote: There is more hunger for love and appreciation in this world than for bread.

motivation.author: Robert Frost
motivation.quote: By working faithfully eight hours a day you may eventually get to be boss and work twelve hours a day.

motivation.author: Thomas Edison
motivation.quote: Opportunity is missed by most people because it is dressed in overalls and looks like work.

motivation.author: Caroline Rhea
motivation.quote: My favorite machine at the gym is the vending machine.

motivation.author: Swedish Proverb
motivation.quote: Love me when I least deserve it, because that’s when I really need it.

motivation.author: Louisa May Alcott
motivation.quote: I’m not afraid of storms, for I’m learning how to sail my ship.

motivation.author: Anne Sullivan
motivation.quote: The best and most beautiful things in the world cannot be seen nor even touched, but just felt in the heart.

motivation.author: John F. Kennedy
motivation.quote: Ask not what your country can do for you — ask what you can do for your country.

motivation.author: Steve Jobs
motivation.quote: Being the richest man in the cemetery doesn’t matter to me. Going to bed at night saying we’ve done something wonderful, that’s what matters to me.

motivation.author: Francis David
motivation.quote: We need not think alike to love alike.

motivation.author: Bob Hope
motivation.quote: I grew up with six brothers. That’s how I learned to dance–waiting for the bathroom.

motivation.author: Eleanor Roosevelt
motivation.quote: Do what you feel in your heart to be right — for you’ll be criticized anyway. You’ll be ‘damned if you do, and damned if you don’t.’

motivation.author: Thomas Jefferson
motivation.quote: In matters of style, swim with the current; in matters of principle, stand like a rock.

motivation.author: Wilson Mizner
motivation.quote: If you steal from one author, it’s plagiarism; if you steal from many, it’s research.

motivation.author: George Jessel
motivation.quote: The human brain is a wonderful thing. It starts working the moment you are born, and never stops until you stand up to speak in public.

motivation.author: Martha Washington
motivation.quote: I’ve learned from experience that the greater part of our happiness or misery depends on our dispositions and not on our circumstances.

motivation.author: John Wooden
motivation.quote: Be more concerned with your character than with your reputation. Your character is what you really are while your reputation is merely what others think you are.

motivation.author: Henry David Thoreau
motivation.quote: Do not hire a man who does your work for money, but him who does it for love of it.

motivation.author: Douglas Adams
motivation.quote: I love deadlines. I love the whooshing noise they make as they go by.

motivation.author: Henri Frédéric Amiel
motivation.quote: The man who insists upon seeing with perfect clearness before he decides, never decides. Accept life, and you must accept regret.

motivation.author: Anonymous
motivation.quote: Challenge yourself with something you know you could never do, and what you’ll find is that you can overcome anything.

motivation.author: Winston Churchill
motivation.quote: I am an optimist — it does not seem to be much use being anything else.

motivation.author: Ashleigh Brilliant
motivation.quote: My opinions may have changed, but not the fact that I am right.

motivation.author: Indira Gandhi
motivation.quote: You cannot shake hands with a clenched fist.

motivation.author: Jon Stewart
motivation.quote: I celebrated Thanksgiving in an old-fashioned way. I invited everyone in my neighborhood to my house, we had an enormous feast, and then I killed them and took their land.

motivation.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.
motivation.quote: Darkness cannot drive out darkness: only light can do that. Hate cannot drive out hate: only love can do that.

motivation.author: Plato
motivation.quote: The madness of love is the greatest of heaven’s blessings.

motivation.author: Elayne Boosler
motivation.quote: I have six locks on my door all in a row. When I go out, I lock every other one. I figure no matter how long somebody stands there picking the locks, they are always locking three.

motivation.author: Mary Kay Ash
motivation.quote: Aerodynamically, the bumblebee shouldn’t be able to fly, but the bumblebee doesn’t know that so it goes on flying anyway.

motivation.author: E. Joseph Cossman
motivation.quote: If you want to test your memory, try to recall what you were worrying about one year ago today.

motivation.author: Erica Jong
motivation.quote: Advice is what we ask for when we already know the answer but wish we didn’t.

motivation.author: Hasidic Proverb
motivation.quote: The man who has confidence in himself gains the confidence of others.

motivation.author: Zig Ziglar
motivation.quote: The real opportunity for success lies within the person and not in the job.

motivation.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe
motivation.quote: If we treat people as they are, we make them worse. If we treat people as they ought to be, we help them become what they are capable of becoming.

motivation.author: Elizabeth Gilbert
motivation.quote: Stop wearing your wishbone where your backbone ought to be.

motivation.author: Germaine de Staël
motivation.quote: Love is the emblem of eternity; it confounds all notion of time; effaces all memory of a beginning, all fear of an end.

motivation.author: Mark Twain
motivation.quote: There is nothing so annoying as to have two people go right on talking when you’re interrupting.

motivation.author: Bill Cosby
motivation.quote: I don’t know the key to success, but the key to failure is trying to please everybody.

motivation.author: Jeremy Taylor
motivation.quote: Love is friendship set on fire.

motivation.author: J. K. Rowling
motivation.quote: It takes a great deal of courage to stand up to your enemies, but even more to stand up to your friends.

motivation.author: Peter F. Drucker
motivation.quote: Management is doing things right; leadership is doing the right things.

motivation.author: Victor Hugo
motivation.quote: Nothing else in the world . . . not all the armies . . . is so powerful as an idea whose time has come.

motivation.author: Erma Bombeck
motivation.quote: No one ever died from sleeping in an unmade bed.

motivation.author: Maya Angelou
motivation.quote: Life is not measured by the number of breaths we take, but by the moments that take our breath away.

motivation.author: Robert Bloch
motivation.quote: Friendship is like peeing on yourself: everyone can see it, but only you get the warm feeling that it brings.

motivation.author: Flip Wilson
motivation.quote: If you think nobody cares if you’re alive, try missing a couple of car payments.

motivation.author: Ovid
motivation.quote: What is harder than rock, or softer than water? Yet soft water hollows out hard rock. Persevere.

motivation.author: Josh Billings
motivation.quote: Solitude is a good place to visit but a poor place to stay.

motivation.author: Carol Burnett
motivation.quote: Giving birth is like taking your lower lip and forcing it over your head.

motivation.author: Eleanor Roosevelt
motivation.quote: Great minds discuss ideas; average minds discuss events; small minds discuss people.

motivation.author: Joe Clark
motivation.quote: Defeat is not bitter unless you swallow it.

motivation.author: Mark Twain
motivation.quote: Keep away from people who try to belittle your ambitions. Small people always do that, but the really great make you feel that you, too, can become great.

motivation.author: Stewart Brand
motivation.quote: Stay hungry. Stay foolish.

motivation.author: Henry Ford
motivation.quote: Don’t find fault. Find remedy. Anyone can complain.

motivation.author: Bill Vaughan
motivation.quote: A citizen of America will cross the ocean to fight for democracy, but won’t cross the street to vote in a national election.

motivation.author: Eleanor Roosevelt
motivation.quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.

motivation.author: Mark Russell
motivation.quote: The scientific theory I like best is that the rings of Saturn are composed entirely of lost airline luggage.

motivation.author: Anonymous
motivation.quote: How do you get a sweet little 80-year-old lady to say the F word? Get another sweet little 80-year-old lady to yell “BINGO!”

motivation.author: Frank Zappa
motivation.quote: A mind is like a parachute. It doesn’t work if it isn’t open.

motivation.author: Henry Ford
motivation.quote: Failure is simply the opportunity to begin again, this time more intelligently.

motivation.author: Maya Angelou
motivation.quote: People will forget what you said. People will forget what you did. But people will never forget how you made them feel.

motivation.author: T. H. Thompson
motivation.quote: A filing cabinet is a place where you can lose things systematically.

motivation.author: Emily P. Bissell
motivation.quote: Great thoughts speak only to the thoughtful mind, but great actions speak to all mankind.

motivation.author: Chinese Proverb
motivation.quote: The man who removes a mountain begins by carrying away small stones.

motivation.author: Sid Caeser
motivation.quote: In between goals is a thing called life, that has to be lived and enjoyed.

motivation.author: Judy Castrina
motivation.quote: A committee takes hours to put into minutes what can be done in seconds.

motivation.author: J. M. Power
motivation.quote: If you want to make your dreams come true, the first thing you have to do is wake up.

motivation.author: Robert Purvis
motivation.quote: A graduation ceremony is an event where the commencement speaker tells thousands of students dressed in identical caps and gowns that ‘individuality’ is the key to success.

motivation.author: Harry S. Truman
motivation.quote: You want a friend in Washington? Get a dog.

motivation.author: Cyril Northcote Parkinson
motivation.quote: Work expands to fill the time available for its completion.

motivation.author: Woody Allen
motivation.quote: Having sex is like playing bridge. If you don’t have a good partner, you’d better have a good hand.

motivation.author: Anonymous
motivation.quote: Love is grand; divorce is a hundred grand.

motivation.author: Henry Hazlitt
motivation.quote: Government can’t give us anything without depriving us of something else.

motivation.author: John A. Shedd
motivation.quote: A ship in harbor is safe, but that is not what ships are built for.

motivation.author: Robert Fulghum
motivation.quote: We could learn a lot from crayons; some are sharp, some are pretty, some are dull, while others bright, some have weird names, but they all have learned to live together in the same box.

motivation.author: Winston Churchill
motivation.quote: The best argument against democracy is a five-minute conversation with the average voter.

motivation.author: Euripides
motivation.quote: It is a good thing to be rich and a good thing to be strong, but it is a better thing to be loved by many friends.

motivation.author: George Carlin
motivation.quote: I went to a bookstore and asked the saleswoman, “Where’s the self-help section?” She said if she told me, it would defeat the purpose.

motivation.author: Zsa Zsa Gabor
motivation.quote: I am a marvelous housekeeper. Every time I leave a man, I keep his house.

motivation.author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.
motivation.quote: You can get by on charm for about 15 minutes. After that, you better know something.

motivation.author: Jerry Seinfeld
motivation.quote: According to most studies, people’s number one fear is public speaking. Number two is death. Death is number two! Does that sound right? That means to the average person, if you go to a funeral, you’re better off in the casket than doing the eulogy.

motivation.author: George Burns
motivation.quote: When I was a boy the Dead Sea was only sick.

motivation.author: Charles M. Schulz
motivation.quote: All you need is love. But a little chocolate now and then doesn’t hurt.

motivation.author: Yogi Berra
motivation.quote: Always go to other people’s funerals, otherwise they won’t come to yours.

motivation.author: Ronald Reagan
motivation.quote: It’s true hard work never killed anybody, but I figure, why take the chance?

motivation.author: Cathy Guisewite
motivation.quote: All mothers have intuition. The great ones have radar.

motivation.author: Anonymous
motivation.quote: Tell a man there are 300 billion stars in the universe and he’ll believe you. Tell him a bench has wet paint on it and he’ll have to touch it to be sure.

motivation.author: Richard Armour
motivation.quote: Adolescence is when children start trying to bring up their parents.

motivation.author: Oscar Wilde
motivation.quote: Some cause happiness wherever they go; others, whenever they go.

motivation.author: Ernst Berg
motivation.quote: Blessed is the Second mouse for he shall inherit the Cheese.

motivation.author: Emiliano Zapata
motivation.quote: I’d rather die on my feet, than live upon my knees.

motivation.author: Katharine Hepburn
motivation.quote: If you want to sacrifice the admiration of many men for the criticism of one, go ahead, get married.

motivation.author: Linda Furney
motivation.quote: If it has tires or testicles, you’re going to have trouble with it.

motivation.author: Adlai E. Stevenson II
motivation.quote: He who slings mud generally loses ground.

motivation.author: W. C. Fields
motivation.quote: It ain’t what they call you, it’s what you answer to.

motivation.author: Coleman Cox
motivation.quote: I am a great believer in luck. The harder I work, the more of it I seem to have.

motivation.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
motivation.quote: For every minute you are angry you lose sixty seconds of happiness.

motivation.author: Elizabeth Kenny
motivation.quote: He who angers you conquers you.

motivation.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
motivation.quote: No change of circumstances can repair a defect of character.

motivation.author: Socrates
motivation.quote: The only true wisdom is knowing that you know nothing.

motivation.author: Fred Rogers
motivation.quote: Who we are in the present includes who we were in the past.

motivation.author: Irving Kristol
motivation.quote: Democracy does not guarantee equality of conditions. It only guarantees equality of opportunity.

motivation.author: Sigismund
motivation.quote: Do I not effectually destroy my enemies, in making them my friends?

motivation.author: Steve Irwin
motivation.quote: Crocodiles are easy. They try to kill and eat you. People are harder. Sometimes they pretend to be your friend first.

motivation.author: A. Whitney Brown
motivation.quote: That is the saving grace of humor: If you fail no one is laughing at you.

motivation.author: Robert Heinlein
motivation.quote: Love is that condition in which the happiness of another person is essential to your own.

motivation.author: Jean Anouilh
motivation.quote: Love is, above all else, the gift of oneself.

motivation.author: George Gordon Byron
motivation.quote: Friendship may, and often does, grow into love, but love never subsides into friendship.

motivation.author: Robert Frost
motivation.quote: A diplomat is a man who always remembers a woman’s birthday but never remembers her age.

motivation.author: Warren Buffett
motivation.quote: I will tell you how to become rich. Close the doors. Be fearful when others are greedy. Be greedy when others are fearful.

motivation.author: Robert Frost
motivation.quote: A bank is a place where they lend you an umbrella in fair weather and ask for it back when it begins to rain.

motivation.author: Ed Gardner
motivation.quote: Opera is when a guy gets stabbed in the back and, instead of bleeding, he sings.

motivation.author: Victor Hugo
motivation.quote: Music expresses that which cannot be said and on which it is impossible to be silent.

motivation.author: George Carlin
motivation.quote: Fighting for peace is like screwing for virginity.

motivation.author: Eleanor Roosevelt
motivation.quote: It isn’t enough to talk about peace. One must believe in it. And it isn’t enough to believe in it. One must work at it.

motivation.author: Ronald Reagan
motivation.quote: Politics is supposed to be the second oldest profession. I have come to realize that it bears a very close resemblance to the first.

motivation.author: Albert Einstein
motivation.quote: I don’t know [what weapons will be used in the Third World War]. But I can tell you what they’ll use in the Fourth — rocks!

motivation.author: George Carlin
motivation.quote: Those who dance are considered insane by those who cannot hear the music.

motivation.author: William Arthur Ward
motivation.quote: The pessimist complains about the wind; the optimist expects it to change; the realist adjusts the sails.

motivation.author: George R. R. Martin
motivation.quote: When you know what a man wants, you know who he is, and how to move him.

motivation.author: Napoleon Bonaparte
motivation.quote: Death is nothing, but to live defeated and inglorious is to die daily.

motivation.author: Jimi Hendrix
motivation.quote: When the power of love overcomes the love of power, the world will know peace.

motivation.author: Anonymous
motivation.quote: When you have no winds, take to the oars.

motivation.author: Howard W. Hunter
motivation.quote: One of the greatest things a father can do for his children is to love their mother.

motivation.author: Napoleon Hill
motivation.quote: Whatever the mind of man can conceive and believe, it can achieve.

motivation.author: Babe Ruth
motivation.quote: Every strike brings me closer to the next home run.

motivation.author: André Gide
motivation.quote: One doesn’t discover new lands without consenting to lose sight, for a very long time, of the shore.

motivation.author: Zig Ziglar
motivation.quote: People often say that motivation doesn’t last. Well, neither does bathing. That’s why we recommend it daily.

motivation.author: Henry Ford
motivation.quote: Obstacles are those frightful things you see when you take your eyes off the goal.

motivation.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
motivation.quote: The only person you are destined to become is the person you decide to be.

motivation.author: Erma Bombeck
motivation.quote: When I stand before God at the end of my life, I would hope that I would not have a single bit of talent left, and could say, “I used everything you gave me.”

motivation.author: Arthur Ashe
motivation.quote: Start where you are. Use what you have. Do what you can.

motivation.author: Lao Tzu
motivation.quote: When I let go of what I am, I become what I might be.

motivation.author: Joshua J. Marine
motivation.quote: Challenges are what make life interesting and overcoming them is what makes life meaningful.

motivation.author: Ann Landers
motivation.quote: It is not what you do for your children, but what you have taught them to do for themselves, that will make them successful human beings.

motivation.author: Abigail Van Buren
motivation.quote: If you want your children to turn out well, spend twice as much time with them, and half as much money.

motivation.author: Ayn Rand
motivation.quote: The question isn’t who is going to let me; it’s who is going to stop me.

motivation.author: Billy Crystal
motivation.quote: Women need a reason to have sex. Men just need a place.

motivation.author: Werner Finck
motivation.quote: Everybody wants to eat at the government’s table, but nobody wants to do the dishes.

motivation.author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.
motivation.quote: Let the refining and improving of your own life keep you so busy that you have little time to criticize others.

motivation.author: Tony Blair
motivation.quote: A simple way to take the measure of a country is to look at how many want in . . . and how many want out.

motivation.author: Catherine Aird
motivation.quote: If you can’t be a good example, then you’ll just have to be a horrible warning.

motivation.author: William Penn
motivation.quote: Justice is the insurance we have on our lives, and obedience is the premium we pay for it.

motivation.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.
motivation.quote: That old law about “an eye for an eye” leaves everybody blind.

motivation.author: Voltaire
motivation.quote: It is better to risk saving a guilty man than to condemn an innocent one.

motivation.author: Diana Krall
motivation.quote: Happiness is the best facelift.

motivation.author: Eric Shinseki
motivation.quote: If you don’t like change, you’re going to like irrelevance even less.

motivation.author: Mark Twain
motivation.quote: The difference between the right word and the almost right word is the difference between lightning and a lightning bug.

motivation.author: Alan Kay
motivation.quote: The best way to predict the future is to invent it.

motivation.author: Diane Ackerman
motivation.quote: I don’t want to get to the end of my life and find that I have lived just the length of it. I want to have lived the width of it as well.

motivation.author: Albert Einstein

motivation.quote: I am so clever that sometimes I don't understand a single word of what I am saying.

motivation.quote: Twenty years from now you will be more disappointed by the things that you didn't do than by the ones you did do. So throw off the bowlines. Sail away from the safe harbor. Catch the trade winds in your sails. Explore. Dream. Discover.
